original: zhes bya ba ni slob ma dam pa dang sa dang snying rje dang shes rab la sogs phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa'i zhal ni gdong ngo //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni slob ma dam pa dang sa dang snying rje dang shes rab la sogs phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa'i zhal ni gdong ngo //
translated: That is called the vajra, because it is the cause of the arising of the vajra of the body, etc.üîΩThat is called the vajra, because it is the cause of the arising of the vajra of

original: man ngag gi don zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor ma'i mtshan nyid can gyi bla ma dang 'brel pa can no //
analyzed: man ngag gi don zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor ma'i mtshan nyid can gyi bla ma dang 'brel pa can no //
translated: The meaning of the esoteric instructions is the one who is related to the guru who has the characteristics of a yoginƒ´.

original: snod ces bya ba ni snod du gyur pa ste /
analyzed: snod ces bya ba ni snod du gyur pa ste /
translated: The vessel is the one who is a suitable vessel.

original: padma ltar dga' bar bya ba nyid kyi phyir rnyog pa dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: padma ltar dga' bar bya ba nyid kyi phyir rnyog pa dang bral ba'o //
translated: It is free from turbidity because it is delightful like a lotus.

original: snod kyi skyon rnam pa gsum dang bral ba ste /
analyzed: snod kyi skyon rnam pa gsum dang bral ba ste /
translated: It is free from the three faults of a vessel.

original: snod nas snod du byo ba'i rnam pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: snod nas snod du byo ba'i rnam pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: It is the one who is like a vessel that is poured from one vessel to another.

original: de gnyis zhes bya ba ni bla ma dang slob ma dag go //
analyzed: de gnyis zhes bya ba ni bla ma dang slob ma dag go //
translated: The two are the guru and the disciple.

original: rnal 'byor kun bdag nyid ces bya ba ni lhag ma ma lus par byas nas so //
analyzed: rnal 'byor kun bdag nyid ces bya ba ni lhag ma ma lus par byas nas so //
translated: The one who is the nature of all yogas is the one who has made everything else into a remainder.

original: yang dag de nyid @103b don mthong byed //
analyzed: yang dag de nyid @103b don mthong byed //
translated: The one who sees the meaning of reality

original: ces bya ba ni nyams su myong bar byed pa'i bla ma'i drin gyis rang gi rig pa nyid kyi de kho na nyid nyams su myong ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni nyams su myong bar byed pa'i bla ma'i drin gyis rang gi rig pa nyid kyi de kho na nyid nyams su myong ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: is the one who experiences the reality of one's own awareness through the kindness of the guru.

original: de ltar don rnam pa bzhis rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'brangs nas rdo rje dang padma mnyam par sbyor ba la snyoms par 'jug pa bshad nas gnyis ka'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'brangs nas rdo rje dang padma mnyam par sbyor bar byed par 'dod pas de'i
analyzed: de ltar don rnam pa bzhis rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'brangs nas rdo rje dang padma mnyam par sbyor ba la snyoms par 'jug pa bshad nas gnyis ka'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'brangs nas rdo rje dang padma mnyam par sbyor bar byed par 'dod pas de'i
translated: Having explained the equipoise of union of the vajra and lotus in the yoginƒ´ tantras through four topics, now, in order to generate the union of the vajra and lotus in the tantras of both, the following is stated.

original: yan lag tu thabs dang shes rab kyi ngo bo nyid kyi bshad pa ni /
analyzed: yan lag tu thabs dang shes rab kyi ngo bo nyid kyi bshad pa ni /
translated: Having thus explained the meditative absorption in the union of vajra and lotus in accordance with the Yoginƒ´ Tantras through four topics, now, in order to effect the union of vajra and lotus in accordance with the Yoga Tantras, he explains the nature of method and wisdom as a branch of that.

original: blo ldan zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: blo ldan zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: The wise one, etc.

original: khyad par can gyi shes rab phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa la'o //
analyzed: khyad par can gyi shes rab phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa la'o //
translated: The wise one is endowed with the perfection of special wisdom.

original: rnam rtog bral ba'i zhes bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: rnam rtog bral ba'i zhes bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba'o //
translated: Free from conceptuality means free from all conceptualization.

original: rdo rje zhes bya ba ni thabs kyi yan lag gi rnam pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje zhes bya ba ni thabs kyi yan lag gi rnam pa'o //
translated: Vajra means the aspect of the branch of method.

original: ling+ga zhes ni bshad ces bya ba ni ling+ga ni 'gro ba'i don to zhes bya ba bye dpa'i khams kyis so //
analyzed: ling+ga zhes ni bshad ces bya ba ni ling+ga ni 'gro ba'i don to zhes bya ba bye dpa'i khams kyis so //
translated: It is explained as li·πÖga means the meaning of li·πÖga is ‚Äúgoing,‚Äù by the element of discrimination.

original: blo ldan zhes bya ba ni sngags kyi theg pa'i snod du gyur pa la'o //üîΩrnam par mi rtog ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: blo ldan zhes bya ba ni sngags kyi theg pa'i snod du gyur pa la'o // rnam par mi rtog ces bya ba ni /
translated: The wise is one who is a vessel for the Mantra Vehicle.

original: tshogs kyi 'khor lo la sogs pa'i dus so'o //
analyzed: tshogs kyi 'khor lo la sogs pa'i dus so'o //
translated: The non-conceptual is the time of the ga·πáacakra, and so on.

original: bha ga zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags la sogs pa bcom pa nyid kyis so //
analyzed: bha ga zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags la sogs pa bcom pa nyid kyis so //
translated: The bhaga is the very destruction of desire, and so on.

original: padma zhes bya ba ni de'i nang du padma'i dbyibs dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //üîΩdam tshig gzung ba'i rnal 'byor ma //
analyzed: padma zhes bya ba ni de'i nang du padma'i dbyibs dang ldan pa'i phyir ro // dam tshig gzung ba'i rnal 'byor ma //
translated: The lotus is because it has the shape of a lotus inside.

original: zhes bya ba ni dam tshig gi don du 'dzin pa ni gzung ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni dam tshig gi don du 'dzin pa ni gzung ba'o //
translated: The yoginƒ´ who holds the pledge is the one who holds the pledge for the sake of the pledge.

original: de gnyis ni thabs dang shes rab kyi mtshan nyid can no //
analyzed: de gnyis ni thabs dang shes rab kyi mtshan nyid can no //
translated: Those two have the characteristic of method and wisdom.

original: dngos gcig yang dag sbyor zhes bya ba ni lhan cig skyes pa dang 'brel pa'o //
analyzed: dngos gcig yang dag sbyor zhes bya ba ni lhan cig skyes pa dang 'brel pa'o //
translated: The union of the one thing is the connection with the connate.

original: byang chub sems ni zhes bya ba ni kun rdzob pas so //
analyzed: byang chub sems ni zhes bya ba ni kun rdzob pas so //
translated: The awakened mind is the conventional.

original: gnyis med ye shes che zhes bya ba ni don mthong bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: gnyis med ye shes che zhes bya ba ni don mthong bar byed pa'o //
translated: The great nondual intuition is the one that causes the meaning to be seen.

original: de ltar thabs dang shes rab kyi ngo bo rdo rje dang padma mnyam par sbyor ba bshad nas /
analyzed: de ltar thabs dang shes rab kyi ngo bo rdo rje dang padma mnyam par sbyor ba bshad nas /
translated: Having thus explained the nature of method and wisdom as the union of vajra and lotus,üîΩnow, in order to explain that by the nature of the channels and constituents,

original: rtsa dang khams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis de bshad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtsa dang khams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis de bshad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: he says,

original: stong phrag gnyis dang bdun cu yi //üîΩzhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: stong phrag gnyis dang bdun cu yi // zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: two thousand and seventy

original: rang gi lus sam gzhan gyi lus la'o //
analyzed: rang gi lus sam gzhan gyi lus la'o //
translated: in one's own body or another's body.

original: rdo rje zhes ni brjod ces bya ba ni thabs kyi ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: rdo rje zhes ni brjod ces bya ba ni thabs kyi ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: It is called vajra because it is the nature of method.

original: byang chub sems ni 'bab pa'i rtsa //
analyzed: byang chub sems ni 'bab pa'i rtsa //
translated: The channel through which the bodhicitta flows

original: zhes bya ba ni la la n'a'i ngo bo'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni la la n'a'i ngo bo'o //
translated: is called lalana by nature.

original: padma zhes ni yongs su grags //
analyzed: padma zhes ni yongs su grags //
translated: It is renowned as lotus

original: zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems ni padmar spros pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems ni padmar spros pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the bodhicitta is emitted into the lotus.

original: yang na rtsa de nyid ni padma ste /
analyzed: yang na rtsa de nyid ni padma ste /
translated: Alternatively, that very channel is a lotus

original: byang chub sems dang sbyor ba la yang 'dod chags kyi skyon gyis ma gos pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: byang chub sems dang sbyor ba la yang 'dod chags kyi skyon gyis ma gos pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not soiled by the faults of desire in the union with bodhicitta.

original: de la zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems rgyu ba'i rtsa la'o //
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems rgyu ba'i rtsa la'o //
translated: There means in the channel through which the bodhicitta moves.

original: de rnams zhes bya ba @104a * //
analyzed: de rnams zhes bya ba @104a * //
translated: Those are the seventy-two thousand

original: ni stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis rtsa'i grangs so //
analyzed: ni stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis rtsa'i grangs so //
translated: channels.

original: kun du sbyor ba zhes bya ba ni de dang 'brel ba'o //
analyzed: kun du sbyor ba zhes bya ba ni de dang 'brel ba'o //
translated: The ‚Äúunion‚Äù is the connection with them.

original: dga' ba skyed par byed pa'i rgyu //
analyzed: dga' ba skyed par byed pa'i rgyu //
translated: The cause of the generation of joy

original: zhes bya ba ni phyi rol gyi thabs shes rab la snyoms par 'jug pa la brten nas zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni phyi rol gyi thabs shes rab la snyoms par 'jug pa la brten nas zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: means that it is based on the external union of method and wisdom.

original: de ltar rtsa dang khams kyi ngo bo nyid kyi bshad pa bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar rtsa dang khams kyi ngo bo nyid kyi bshad pa bstan nas /
translated: Thus, having explained the nature of the channels and elements,

original: rten dang brten pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis de'i bshad pa ni /
analyzed: rten dang brten pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis de'i bshad pa ni /
translated: the explanation of that by way of the nature of the support and the supported

original: rdo rje yi yang nyams dga'i stan //üîΩzhes gsungs te /
analyzed: rdo rje yi yang nyams dga'i stan // zhes gsungs te /
translated: is the vajra seat of bliss.

original: phyi rol gyi mngon par byang chub pa'i gnas kyi rdo rje gdan la'o //
analyzed: phyi rol gyi mngon par byang chub pa'i gnas kyi rdo rje gdan la'o //
translated: The vajra seat of external manifest enlightenment.

original: rim pa 'dis ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i steng du rdo rje'i gdan no //
analyzed: rim pa 'dis ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i steng du rdo rje'i gdan no //
translated: By this process, the vajra seat is on top of the moon ma·πá·∏çala, and so on.

original: nyams dga'i zhes bya ba ni phigs par dka' ba nyid dang ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid kyis so //
analyzed: nyams dga'i zhes bya ba ni phigs par dka' ba nyid dang ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid kyis so //
translated: Bliss is difficult to penetrate and is the nature of gnosis.

original: rang nyid rdo rje padma 'chang //
analyzed: rang nyid rdo rje padma 'chang //
translated: One should hold the vajra and lotus oneself.

original: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
translated: This is the Great Vajradhara.

original: rang nyid ces bya ba ni bdag nyid kyi 'dod chags dang bcas pa dang 'dod chags dang bral ba nyid kyi padma zhes brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: rang nyid ces bya ba ni bdag nyid kyi 'dod chags dang bcas pa dang 'dod chags dang bral ba nyid kyi padma zhes brjod par bya ste /
translated: One should hold the lotus oneself, that is, one should hold the lotus of one's own passion and dispassion.

original: phyi rol gyi padma ltar byams pa bsgom pas bdud la sogs pa bcom pa nyid kyi phyir dang / de las gzhan la 'dod chags la sogs pa rnams kyis ma gos pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phyi rol gyi padma ltar byams pa bsgom pas bdud la sogs pa bcom pa nyid kyi phyir dang / de las gzhan la 'dod chags la sogs pa rnams kyis ma gos pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because one conquers the demons, etc. by cultivating love, as if it were an external lotus, and because one is not defiled by passion, etc. by that.

original: de la zhes bya ba ni gdan de la'o //
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba ni gdan de la'o //
translated: On that, means on that seat.

original: de zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'chang chen pos so //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'chang chen pos so //
translated: That, means the Great Vajradhara.

original: mnyam sbyor ba zhes bya ba ni 'brel pa'o //
analyzed: mnyam sbyor ba zhes bya ba ni 'brel pa'o //
translated: The union, means the connection.

original: sangs rgyas ye shes go 'phang gsal //
analyzed: sangs rgyas ye shes go 'phang gsal //
translated: The state of Buddha-intuition is clear.

original: zhes bya ba ni sgrib pa dang bral ba dang rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i ngo bo'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sgrib pa dang bral ba dang rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i ngo bo'o //
translated: This is the nature of being free from obscurations and naturally radiant.

original: gsal zhes bya ba ni bsgo par 'gyur ba nyid kyis gsal ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: gsal zhes bya ba ni bsgo par 'gyur ba nyid kyis gsal ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Clear, means clear because of being radiant by being cultivated.

original: de ltar rten dang brten pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis de'i bshad pa bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar rten dang brten pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis de'i bshad pa bstan nas /
translated: Thus, having explained that by the nature of the support and the supported,

original: dbang bskur ba dang / dbang bskur bar bya ba nyid kyis de bshad pa ni /
analyzed: dbang bskur ba dang / dbang bskur bar bya ba nyid kyis de bshad pa ni /
translated: he explains that by the consecration and the consecration itself.

original: dbang bskur mchog ni rdo rje ste //
analyzed: dbang bskur mchog ni rdo rje ste //
translated: The consecration is the supreme vajra.

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: He says this.

original: dri ma mtha' dag 'khru bar byed pa'i bdag nyid can gyi phyir ro //
analyzed: dri ma mtha' dag 'khru bar byed pa'i bdag nyid can gyi phyir ro //
translated: Because it has the nature of washing away all stains.

original: mchog ni phyi rol gyi mtshan nyid dang bral ba nyid kyis mchog nyid kyi phyir mchog go //
analyzed: mchog ni phyi rol gyi mtshan nyid dang bral ba nyid kyis mchog nyid kyi phyir mchog go //
translated: The supreme is the supreme because it is free from external characteristics.

original: de nyid ni rdo rje zhes brjod de rdo rje bzhin du mi mthun pa'i phyogs 'byed par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid ni rdo rje zhes brjod de rdo rje bzhin du mi mthun pa'i phyogs 'byed par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: That itself is called the vajra, because it is the cleaver of the discordant class, like a vajra.

original: padma slob ma dbang bskur bar bya ste /
analyzed: padma slob ma dbang bskur bar bya ste /
translated: The disciple should be consecrated with the lotus.

original: padma ltar 'dus bya ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: padma ltar 'dus bya ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because it is the nature of the lotus.

original: snod bzang po zhes bya ba ni dam tshig dang sdom pa 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: snod bzang po zhes bya ba ni dam tshig dang sdom pa 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The good vessel is because it holds the commitments and vows.

original: de gnyis mchog tu yang dag sbyor //
analyzed: de gnyis mchog tu yang dag sbyor //
translated: Those two are the supreme union.

original: zhes bya ba ni dbang bskur par bya ba dang dbang bskur bar byed pa dag la'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni dbang bskur par bya ba dang dbang bskur bar byed pa dag la'o //
translated: This is with regard to the one who is to be consecrated and the one who consecrates.

original: mchog tu yang dag par sbyor ba zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: mchog tu yang dag par sbyor ba zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Supreme union is said to be

original: mchog tu yang dag par 'brel pa ste /
analyzed: mchog tu yang dag par 'brel pa ste /
translated: supreme connection.

original: sbyang bya dang / @104b sbyong byed gnyis kyis so //
analyzed: sbyang bya dang / @104b sbyong byed gnyis kyis so //
translated: It is with regard to the two, the object of purification and the means of purification.

original: yang dag ces bya ba ni phyin ci ma log pa nyid kyis so //
analyzed: yang dag ces bya ba ni phyin ci ma log pa nyid kyis so //
translated: Correct is said to be non-erroneous.

original: de nyid kyis zhes bya ba ni ji lta ba bzhin du rtog pa'i mtshan nyid can rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba la'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyis zhes bya ba ni ji lta ba bzhin du rtog pa'i mtshan nyid can rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba la'o //
translated: By that itself is with regard to natural luminosity, which has the characteristic of being conceived just as it is.

original: rgyu ni rgyu'o //
analyzed: rgyu ni rgyu'o //
translated: Cause is the reason.

original: de ltar dbang bskur bar bya ba dang skur bar byed pa de'i bshad pa brjod nas /
analyzed: de ltar dbang bskur bar bya ba dang skur bar byed pa de'i bshad pa brjod nas /
translated: Thus, having described the one who is to be consecrated and the one who consecrates,

original: ae bam rnam pa'i ngo bos de bshad pa ni /
analyzed: ae bam rnam pa'i ngo bos de bshad pa ni /
translated: the explanation of that in the form of E and VAM is:

original: ae ni padma zhes gsungs te //
analyzed: ae ni padma zhes gsungs te //
translated: E is said to be the lotus.

original: zhes bya ba ni lha mo'i chu skyes la ae yig gi rnam pa'i dbyibs dang ldan ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni lha mo'i chu skyes la ae yig gi rnam pa'i dbyibs dang ldan ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: This is because the goddess's lotus has the shape of the letter E.

original: yi ge bam ni rdo rje nyid //
analyzed: yi ge bam ni rdo rje nyid //
translated: The letter VAM is the vajra.

original: ces bya ba ni rdo rje'i dang po sa bon nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni rdo rje'i dang po sa bon nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: This is because the seed of the vajra is the first.

original: thig le de nyid mi shigs pa //
analyzed: thig le de nyid mi shigs pa //
translated: That drop itself is indestructible.

original: zhes bya ba ni rigs pa'i ngang tshul can nyid kyi phyir thig le ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rigs pa'i ngang tshul can nyid kyi phyir thig le ste /
translated: This is because of the nature of reasoning, the drop.

original: de nyid mi shigs pa zhes bya ba ni mi 'jigs pa de kho na nyid kyi rang bzhin don dam pa dang kun rdzob kyi rnam pa can no //
analyzed: de nyid mi shigs pa zhes bya ba ni mi 'jigs pa de kho na nyid kyi rang bzhin don dam pa dang kun rdzob kyi rnam pa can no //
translated: That itself is indestructible, which is the nature of the reality of fearlessness, having the aspect of ultimate and conventional.üîΩThe union of those two is the supreme wonder.

original: de gnyis sbyor ba ngo mtshar mchog / ces bya ba ni don dam pa dang kun rdzob des so ;
analyzed: de gnyis sbyor ba ngo mtshar mchog / ces bya ba ni don dam pa dang kun rdzob des so ;
translated: This is because of those two, ultimate and conventional.

original: / sbyor ba ni 'brel pa'o //
analyzed: / sbyor ba ni 'brel pa'o //
translated: Union is connection.

original: ngo mtshar zhes bya ba ni shin tu yang ngo mtshar skyed par byed pa ste /
analyzed: ngo mtshar zhes bya ba ni shin tu yang ngo mtshar skyed par byed pa ste /

original: 'dod chags kyi skyed pas byang chub mngon du byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dod chags kyi skyed pas byang chub mngon du byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of the production of passion, enlightenment is manifested.

original: de ltar don rnam pa gsum gyis rdo rje dang padma mnyam par sbyor pa bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar don rnam pa gsum gyis rdo rje dang padma mnyam par sbyor pa bstan nas /
translated: Thus, having taught the union of the vajra and lotus through three topics,

analyzed: de nye bar bsdu ba brjod pa'i phyir de ltar sbyor ba gsungs pa /
translated: in order to state their summary, he says, thus, the union.

original: de ltar sbyor ba zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de ltar sbyor ba zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Thus, it is called ‚Äúunion.‚Äù

original: rdo rje dang padma mnyam par sbyor ba'i mtshan nyid can no //
analyzed: rdo rje dang padma mnyam par sbyor ba'i mtshan nyid can no //
translated: It has the nature of the union of the vajra and lotus.

original: mchog tu zhes bya ba ni mchog gi ngo bo nyid do //
analyzed: mchog tu zhes bya ba ni mchog gi ngo bo nyid do //
translated: ‚Äú Supreme‚Äù means having the nature of the supreme.

original: shes zhes bya ba ni shes par bya'o //
analyzed: shes zhes bya ba ni shes par bya'o //
translated: ‚Äú One should know‚Äù means one should understand.

original: rdo rje pad don sdom pa ni //
analyzed: rdo rje pad don sdom pa ni //
translated: The meaning of the vajra and lotusüîΩis the vow.

original: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje dang padma gnyis ni sngags kyi theg par grags pa dag la don ni brjod par bya ba'i mtshan nyid can gyi sdom pa ni bsdus pa'i ngo bo ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje dang padma gnyis ni sngags kyi theg par grags pa dag la don ni brjod par bya ba'i mtshan nyid can gyi sdom pa ni bsdus pa'i ngo bo ste /
translated: The vajra and lotus, which are renowned in the Mantra Vehicle, have the nature of the vow, which is characterized by the object to be expressed.

original: sna tshogs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis de'i don bshad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sna tshogs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis de'i don bshad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The meaning of that is explained by its various natures.

original: bla ma'i drin gyis zhes bya ba ni rdo rje slob dpon gyi bka' drin gyis so //
analyzed: bla ma'i drin gyis zhes bya ba ni rdo rje slob dpon gyi bka' drin gyis so //
translated: ‚Äú By the kindness of the guru‚Äù means by the kindness of the vajra master.

original: yongs su zhes bya ba ni shes par bya ba'o //
analyzed: yongs su zhes bya ba ni shes par bya ba'o //
translated: ‚Äú Fully‚Äù means completely.

original: rnal 'byor ma yi man ngag gis //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma yi man ngag gis //
translated: ‚Äú By the esoteric instructions of the yoginƒ´s‚Äù

original: zhes bya ba ni ye shes mkha' 'gro rnams kyi man ngag gi brgyud pas so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ye shes mkha' 'gro rnams kyi man ngag gi brgyud pas so //
translated: means by the lineage of the esoteric instructions of the wisdom ·∏çƒÅkinƒ´s.

original: rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i rgya cher 'grel pa /
analyzed: rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i rgya cher 'grel pa /
translated: The Commentary on the Glorious Vajra Garland, a Yoga Tantra,

original: pandi ta aa langka ka la shas mdzad pa /
analyzed: pandi ta aa langka ka la shas mdzad pa /
translated: by the pa·πá·∏çita Ala·πÉkakala≈õa,

original: zab mo'i don shin tu gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba las le'u bcu bzhi pa'i rgya cher bshad pa'o /
analyzed: zab mo'i don shin tu gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba las le'u bcu bzhi pa'i rgya cher bshad pa'o /
translated: called Clarifying the Profound Meaning, explains the fourteenth chapter.

original: // / de ltar le'u bcu bzhi pas rdo rje dang padma mnyam par sbyor ba'i yul la 'dri ba'i lan brjod nas /üîΩda ni sngags kyi de kho na nyid kyi yul la @105a * //
analyzed: // / de ltar le'u bcu bzhi pas rdo rje dang padma mnyam par sbyor ba'i yul la 'dri ba'i lan brjod nas / da ni sngags kyi de kho na nyid kyi yul la @105a * //
translated: Thus, having stated the reply to the question about the object of union of the vajra and lotus in the fourteenth chapter,

original: dri ba'i lan brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: dri ba'i lan brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: now, in order to state the reply to the question about the object of the reality of mantra,

original: le'u bco lnga pa nye bar ston cing /
analyzed: le'u bco lnga pa nye bar ston cing /

original: dang por re zhig de rtsom pa ni sngags kyi de nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: dang por re zhig de rtsom pa ni sngags kyi de nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /

original: 'chad par 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid can no //
analyzed: 'chad par 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid can no //

analyzed: bshad kyis zhes bya ba ni brjod par bya zhes bya ba dang 'brel to //

original: khyod nyon cig ces bya ba ni phyag na rdo rje nyan pa la sbyar ba'o //
analyzed: khyod nyon cig ces bya ba ni phyag na rdo rje nyan pa la sbyar ba'o //
translated: The phrase listen! connects VajrapƒÅ·πái to listening.

original: ci lta bus she na /
analyzed: ci lta bus she na /
translated: How is it?

original: de'i phyir ye shes mchog ces bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir ye shes mchog ces bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, it is said to be the supreme intuition,

original: rdo rje bzlas pa'i rim pa'i rgyur gyur pa gnyis kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: rdo rje bzlas pa'i rim pa'i rgyur gyur pa gnyis kyi phyir ro //
translated: because it is the cause of the stage of vajra repetition, and because it is the cause of the two.

original: gang dang 'brel pa zhe na /
analyzed: gang dang 'brel pa zhe na /

analyzed: de'i phyir rdo rje can zhes gsungs te / rdo rje can zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Therefore, it is said to be the vajra-holder,üîΩthe vajra-holder

original: rdo rje 'chang gi rnam pa'i rnal 'byor pa //üîΩzhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang gi rnam pa'i rnal 'byor pa // zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: is the yogi/nƒ´ in the form of Vajradhara.

original: des ci zhig byed ce na /
analyzed: des ci zhig byed ce na /
translated: What does it do?

original: gang gis myur du dngos grub 'gyur //üîΩzhes gsungs te /üîΩsngags kyi de kho na nyid gang gis so //
analyzed: gang gis myur du dngos grub 'gyur // zhes gsungs te / sngags kyi de kho na nyid gang gis so //
translated: By which there is rapid success.üîΩBy which there is success in the mantra reality.

original: dngos grub 'gyur zhes bya ba ni rdo rje'i bzlas pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
analyzed: dngos grub 'gyur zhes bya ba ni rdo rje'i bzlas pa'i mtshan nyid can no //

original: myur du zhes bya ba ni myur ba nyid du'o //
analyzed: myur du zhes bya ba ni myur ba nyid du'o //
translated: Rapid means quickly.

original: gang gis 'gyur zhe na ;üîΩde'i phyir / sngags kyi spyod pa rnams gnas pa //
analyzed: gang gis 'gyur zhe na ; de'i phyir / sngags kyi spyod pa rnams gnas pa //
translated: By what is it?

original: zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, it is said to be the abode of the mantra conduct.

original: sngags kyi spyod pa ni spros bcas la sogs pa'i spyod pa'i rang bzhin rnam pa gsum gyis gnas pas na sngags kyi spyod pa rnam par gnas pa ste de rnams la'o //
analyzed: sngags kyi spyod pa ni spros bcas la sogs pa'i spyod pa'i rang bzhin rnam pa gsum gyis gnas pas na sngags kyi spyod pa rnam par gnas pa ste de rnams la'o //
translated: The conduct of mantra is the three types of conduct, elaborate and so forth, and since it is based on those, it is the conduct of mantra.

original: de ltar sngags kyi de kho na nyid kyi yul la dri ba'i lan rtsom pa bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar sngags kyi de kho na nyid kyi yul la dri ba'i lan rtsom pa bstan nas /
translated: Thus, having explained the composition of the reply to the question regarding the domain of the reality of mantra,

original: dngos su de bshad pa'i phyir de'i yan lag tu sngags kyi de kho na nyid kyi mdor bstan pa ni /
analyzed: dngos su de bshad pa'i phyir de'i yan lag tu sngags kyi de kho na nyid kyi mdor bstan pa ni /
translated: in order to explain that directly, the summary of the reality of mantra is stated as a branch of that:

original: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje rnams //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje rnams //
translated: The vajras of body, speech, and mind

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: are the three syllables.

original: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnam pa gsum gyi'o //
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnam pa gsum gyi'o //
translated: The three syllables are the three types of transcendent lords, Vairochana and so forth.

original: sngags ni zhes bya ba ni /üîΩ'chad par 'gyur ba'i rim pas btus pa'i yi ge gsum gyi ngo bo'o //
analyzed: sngags ni zhes bya ba ni / 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rim pas btus pa'i yi ge gsum gyi ngo bo'o //
translated: The mantra isüîΩthe essence of the three syllables, which are collected by the process that will be explained.

original: sbyar bar bya zhes bya ba ni 'jug pa dang / gnas pa dang / ldang ba'i mtshan nyid can gyi dbugs rnam pa gsum la'o //
analyzed: sbyar bar bya zhes bya ba ni 'jug pa dang / gnas pa dang / ldang ba'i mtshan nyid can gyi dbugs rnam pa gsum la'o //
translated: It is applied to the three types of breath, which are characterized by entry, abiding, and arising.

original: de rnams la ni yi ge gsum gyi rim pas nye bar mtshon pas so //
analyzed: de rnams la ni yi ge gsum gyi rim pas nye bar mtshon pas so //
translated: They are indicated by the three syllables.

original: yang na gang gis bzlas zhes byung ste /
analyzed: yang na gang gis bzlas zhes byung ste /
translated: Or else, by whom is the recitation?

original: de la yang 'jug pa la sogs pa'i ngo bos mos bar bya zhes bya ba sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: de la yang 'jug pa la sogs pa'i ngo bos mos bar bya zhes bya ba sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: And there, one should add, ‚Äúone should be devoted by the nature of the entry, etc.‚Äù

original: de yis myur du dngos grub 'gyur //
analyzed: de yis myur du dngos grub 'gyur //
translated: By that, there is swift success.

original: zhes bya ba ni sngags bzla ba de la myur ba nyid du rlung gi de kho na nyid dang sngags kyi de kho na nyid dag gis ma ning gi bzlas pa'i ngo bos dngos grub tu 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sngags bzla ba de la myur ba nyid du rlung gi de kho na nyid dang sngags kyi de kho na nyid dag gis ma ning gi bzlas pa'i ngo bos dngos grub tu 'gyur ba'o //
translated: That recitation of the mantra, by the nature of the recitation of the neutral state, by the reality of the wind and the reality of the mantra, there is success.

original: ji @105b lta bus she na /üîΩde'i phyir / rlung gi de nyid pha rol phyin //
analyzed: ji @105b lta bus she na / de'i phyir / rlung gi de nyid pha rol phyin //
translated: How is that?üîΩTherefore, it is said,

original: zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes gsungs te /
translated: The reality of the wind is the perfection.

original: le'u bcu gnyis pa bstan pa ste /
analyzed: le'u bcu gnyis pa bstan pa ste /
translated: The twelfth chapter is taught.

original: pha rol phyin ces bya ba ni pha rol tu son pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: pha rol phyin ces bya ba ni pha rol tu son pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The perfection is the meaning of ‚Äúhaving gone to the other side.‚Äù

original: de ltar sngags kyi de kho na nyid kyi mdor bstan pa bshad nas /
analyzed: de ltar sngags kyi de kho na nyid kyi mdor bstan pa bshad nas /
translated: Thus, having explained the summary of the reality of the mantra,

original: de rgyas par bshad pa brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de rgyas par bshad pa brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: in order to explain its extensive version,

original: rdo rje'i phyag rgya don sdom pa //üîΩzhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: rdo rje'i phyag rgya don sdom pa // zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: The vajra-seal is the summary of the meaning.

original: rdo rje ni yan lag ma nyams pa'i bzlas pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi rdo rje bzlas pas so //
analyzed: rdo rje ni yan lag ma nyams pa'i bzlas pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi rdo rje bzlas pas so //
translated: The vajra is the vajra repetition, which has the characteristic of the repetition without loss of limbs.

original: phyag rgya ni ma ning gi bzlas pa'i gnas skabs rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya ni ma ning gi bzlas pa'i gnas skabs rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: The seal is the vajra seal in the state of the neuter repetition.

original: de'i go 'phang ni 'dug pa'i gnas te /
analyzed: de'i go 'phang ni 'dug pa'i gnas te /
translated: Its state is the place of sitting.

original: gnas rdo rje'i phyag rgya go 'phang ngo //
analyzed: gnas rdo rje'i phyag rgya go 'phang ngo //
translated: The state of the seal is the place of the vajra seal.

original: zhi zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin gyi tshogs brgya rtsa brgyad nye bar zhi bas so //
analyzed: zhi zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin gyi tshogs brgya rtsa brgyad nye bar zhi bas so //
translated: Peace is due to the pacification of the collection of the eighty natural families.

original: phyag rgya chen po'i don sdom pa //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po'i don sdom pa //
translated: The meaning of the great seal is the summary.

original: zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i rnam pa'o //üîΩdon ni rnam par rtog pa thams cad nye bar zhi ba'i mtshan nyid can no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i rnam pa'o // don ni rnam par rtog pa thams cad nye bar zhi ba'i mtshan nyid can no //
translated: The meaning is the nature of the clear light.

original: sdom pa ni bsdus pa'i ngo bo'o //
analyzed: sdom pa ni bsdus pa'i ngo bo'o //
translated: The summary is the nature of the collection.

original: mchog gi de nyid ces bya ba ni ngag gi de kho na nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: mchog gi de nyid ces bya ba ni ngag gi de kho na nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The supreme reality is the nature of the reality of speech.

original: ye shes che zhes bya ba ni ngag gi rnam par rtog pa'i sgra'i rnam par yongs su shes pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: ye shes che zhes bya ba ni ngag gi rnam par rtog pa'i sgra'i rnam par yongs su shes pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúGreat intuition‚Äù means the intuition of the sound-image of verbal ideation.

original: sngags kyi de nyid la brten pa ni zhes bya ba ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid can brjod pa'o //
analyzed: sngags kyi de nyid la brten pa ni zhes bya ba ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid can brjod pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúBased on the reality of mantra‚Äù means expressed by the characteristics to be explained.

original: dmigs pa med pa'i go 'phang zhes bya ba ni thams cad kyi rten rnam par rtog pa bzlog pas don dam pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: dmigs pa med pa'i go 'phang zhes bya ba ni thams cad kyi rten rnam par rtog pa bzlog pas don dam pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúThe state of non-objectification‚Äù means the ultimate nature because it turns back the conceptualization that is the basis of everything.

original: gsal ba zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor pa'i shes pa la gsal bar snang bas so //
analyzed: gsal ba zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor pa'i shes pa la gsal bar snang bas so //
translated: ‚ÄúClear‚Äù means appearing clearly in the consciousness of the yogin.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' nyid kyi rgyu //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' nyid kyi rgyu //
translated: ‚ÄúThe cause of Vajrasattva himself‚Äù

original: zhes bya ba ni sngags kyi de kho na nyid la brten nas stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid can rdo rje sems dpa'i go 'phang thob pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sngags kyi de kho na nyid la brten nas stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid can rdo rje sems dpa'i go 'phang thob pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: means that based on the reality of mantra, one attains the state of Vajrasattva, which has the characteristic of emptiness.

original: tshig 'di nyid kyi bshad pa gsungs pa ni /
analyzed: tshig 'di nyid kyi bshad pa gsungs pa ni /
translated: He explains just this verse,

original: sngags kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: sngags kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: beginning with ‚Äúmantra‚Äù and so on.

original: ye shes kyis bsdus pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa rnal 'byor pa gsal ba nyid du nye bar song ba'o //
analyzed: ye shes kyis bsdus pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa rnal 'byor pa gsal ba nyid du nye bar song ba'o //
translated: The ten powers, the four confidences, etc., which are included in the intuition, are the very nearness of the clear light of the yogi.

original: de nyid kyi phyir yid skyabs pas na sngags zhes brjod do //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir yid skyabs pas na sngags zhes brjod do //
translated: And for that very reason, it is called mantra, because it protects the mind.

original: lus ngag yid kyi sa sdom pa'o //
analyzed: lus ngag yid kyi sa sdom pa'o //
translated: It is the restraint of body, speech, and mind.

original: zhes bya ba ni ma dag pa'i lus la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa spangs nas rnam par dag pa'i lus la sogs pa snang ba bskyed pa de rnams nyid la sdom pa ni bde ba mchog ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ma dag pa'i lus la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa spangs nas rnam par dag pa'i lus la sogs pa snang ba bskyed pa de rnams nyid la sdom pa ni bde ba mchog ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of parama-sukha is that, having abandoned the impure conceptualizations of body, etc., one generates the appearance of the pure body, etc., and restrains those very [appearances].

original: de nyid ces bya ba ni de'i dngos po ni de nyid de phyin ci ma log pa'o //üîΩde skyes ye shes mchog ces bya ba ni de ma thag @106a * //
analyzed: de nyid ces bya ba ni de'i dngos po ni de nyid de phyin ci ma log pa'o // de skyes ye shes mchog ces bya ba ni de ma thag @106a * //
translated: Tathata means that reality is just that, i.e., non-erroneous.

original: par bshad pa'i sngags yon tan thams cad kyis brgyan pa las gang zhig skyes pa'i yon tan ni mchog ces bya'o //
analyzed: par bshad pa'i sngags yon tan thams cad kyis brgyan pa las gang zhig skyes pa'i yon tan ni mchog ces bya'o //
translated: The meaning of uttama-jnana is that the quality which arises from the mantra just explained, which is adorned with all good qualities, is called uttama.

original: ye shes mchog ni mchog gi yul dang yul can gyi rnam par rtog pa bzlog pa'i bdag nyid can no //
analyzed: ye shes mchog ni mchog gi yul dang yul can gyi rnam par rtog pa bzlog pa'i bdag nyid can no //
translated: The supreme intuition is the nature of the reversal of the conceptualization of the supreme object and subject.

original: de nyid kun gyi don bsdus pa //
analyzed: de nyid kun gyi don bsdus pa //
translated: That itself is the summary of the meaning of all.

original: zhes bya ba ni kun gyi ni lus la sogs pa'i de kho na nyid zung 'jug gi mthar thug pa rnams kyi don ni brjod par bya ba'i mtshan nyid can gyis bsdus pa zhes bya ba ni bsdus par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni kun gyi ni lus la sogs pa'i de kho na nyid zung 'jug gi mthar thug pa rnams kyi don ni brjod par bya ba'i mtshan nyid can gyis bsdus pa zhes bya ba ni bsdus par gyur pa'o //
translated: The meaning of all, of the reality of the body, etc., which culminates in the state of union, is summarized by the definition of the object of expression.

original: sngags kyi de kho na nyid la brten pa nyid kyi rim gyis zung 'jug gi go 'phang dngos su byas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sngags kyi de kho na nyid la brten pa nyid kyi rim gyis zung 'jug gi go 'phang dngos su byas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The state of union is actually made the ground by the process of relying on the reality of mantra.

original: de lta bu'i sngags kyi de kho na nyid gnas gang du bsgom par bya zhe na /
analyzed: de lta bu'i sngags kyi de kho na nyid gnas gang du bsgom par bya zhe na /
translated: In what place should the reality of mantra, which is like that, be cultivated?

original: de'i phyir snying ga'i padma mchog tu zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir snying ga'i padma mchog tu zhes gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, it is said, in the supreme heart-lotus.

original: snying gar gnas pa'i padma kha sbyar ba'i dbus su'o //
analyzed: snying gar gnas pa'i padma kha sbyar ba'i dbus su'o //
translated: In the middle of the conjoined lotus located in the heart.

original: mchog tu zhes bya ba ni h'um yig gi rnam pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: mchog tu zhes bya ba ni h'um yig gi rnam pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Supreme means that it is in the form of the syllable hum.

original: gsal ba zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor pa la gsal ba'i ngo bos snang ba'i phyir ro ;
analyzed: gsal ba zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor pa la gsal ba'i ngo bos snang ba'i phyir ro ;
translated: ‚ÄúClear‚Äù means that it appears to the yogi/nƒ´ by the nature of clarity.

original: / ye shes de nyid bla na med //üîΩces bya ba la /
analyzed: / ye shes de nyid bla na med // ces bya ba la /
translated: That very intuition is unsurpassed.

original: ye shes zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor pa'o //
analyzed: ye shes zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIntuition‚Äù means the yogi/nƒ´.

original: de nyid ces bya ba ni phyin ci ma log pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis so //
analyzed: de nyid ces bya ba ni phyin ci ma log pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis so //
translated: ‚ÄúThat very‚Äù means by the nature of non-erroneousness.

original: bla na med ces bya ba ni h'um yig la cha shas su brtags pas thig le la sems 'dzin par phyag rgya chen po'i ngo bo mngon du byas pas de las gong du gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bla na med ces bya ba ni h'um yig la cha shas su brtags pas thig le la sems 'dzin par phyag rgya chen po'i ngo bo mngon du byas pas de las gong du gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúUnsurpassed‚Äù means that there is nothing higher than that, since by analyzing the parts of the letter h≈´·πÉ, one focuses the mind on the drop, and by actualizing the nature of the great seal, there is nothing higher than that.

original: zla drug bzlas pas zhes bya ba ni dus de srid du nye bar mtshon pas so //
analyzed: zla drug bzlas pas zhes bya ba ni dus de srid du nye bar mtshon pas so //
translated: ‚ÄúIn six months by repetition‚Äù means that the time is indicated by that.

original: 'grub par ni zhes bya ba ni sngags kyi de kho na nyid kyis thob par bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'grub par ni zhes bya ba ni sngags kyi de kho na nyid kyis thob par bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúOne will succeed‚Äù means that one will attain by the reality of the mantra.

original: 'gyur te zhes bya ba ni skye bar 'gyur ba'o gzhan du ma yin no zhes bya ba ni de las gong du ni ma yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'gyur te zhes bya ba ni skye bar 'gyur ba'o gzhan du ma yin no zhes bya ba ni de las gong du ni ma yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: ‚ÄúOne will become‚Äù means that one will be born. ‚ÄúNot otherwise‚Äù means that there is nothing higher than that.

original: thabs dang ni zhes bya ba ni sngags kyi de kho na nyid kyi mtshan nyid 'di nyid do //
analyzed: thabs dang ni zhes bya ba ni sngags kyi de kho na nyid kyi mtshan nyid 'di nyid do //
translated: ‚ÄúMeans‚Äù is the characteristic of the reality of mantra.

original: mchog gi zhes bya ba ni dam pa'o //
analyzed: mchog gi zhes bya ba ni dam pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúSupreme‚Äù is the highest.

original: rnal 'byor zhes bya ba ni rdo rje bzlas pa'i dngos grub kyi rten du gyur pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: rnal 'byor zhes bya ba ni rdo rje bzlas pa'i dngos grub kyi rten du gyur pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúYoga‚Äù is the support for the power of vajra repetition.

original: rnal 'byor pa ni zhes bya ba ni sngags kyi de kho na nyid sgom pa po rnams la'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa ni zhes bya ba ni sngags kyi de kho na nyid sgom pa po rnams la'o //
translated: ‚ÄúFor yogis‚Äù is for those who cultivate the reality of mantra.

original: yongs su grags zhes bya ba ni brjod pa'o //
analyzed: yongs su grags zhes bya ba ni brjod pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúWell known‚Äù is expressed.

original: dmigs pa med pa'i tshig bshad pa'i don du dmigs med tshig ni zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: dmigs pa med pa'i tshig bshad pa'i don du dmigs med tshig ni zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: For the purpose of explaining the word ‚Äúnon-apprehension,‚Äù he says, ‚ÄúThe word ‚Äònon-apprehension‚Äô . . .‚ÄùüîΩ.

original: gang sngon du bstan pa'i'o //
analyzed: gang sngon du bstan pa'i'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThat‚Äù refers to what was taught previously.

original: de ni don dam par ni zhes bya ba ni aa yig gi rang bzhin sngags kyi de kho na nyid do //
analyzed: de ni don dam par ni zhes bya ba ni aa yig gi rang bzhin sngags kyi de kho na nyid do //
translated: ‚ÄúThat is ultimately‚Äù is the reality of mantra, which has the nature of the letter A.

original: brjod ces bya ba ni brjod pa'o //
analyzed: brjod ces bya ba ni brjod pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúExpressed‚Äù is expressed.

original: ngag gi spros pa @106b thams cad aa yig ni nang du bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: ngag gi spros pa @106b thams cad aa yig ni nang du bsdus pa'o //
translated: All elaborations of speech are included in the letter A.

original: sprul la sogs pa'i rim pa'i dbye bas kun rdzob tu sbrul dang / mgo med pa dang / mtha' med pa dang / btu ba'i dbye bas so //
analyzed: sprul la sogs pa'i rim pa'i dbye bas kun rdzob tu sbrul dang / mgo med pa dang / mtha' med pa dang / btu ba'i dbye bas so //
translated: The conventional is divided into the emanation and so on.üîΩ

original: mi zlos pa zhes bya ba ni bzlas par mi bya ba'o //
analyzed: mi zlos pa zhes bya ba ni bzlas par mi bya ba'o //
translated: The conventional is the snake, etc. ,

original: rlung gsum po nyid la nye bar 'brel pa'i yi ge gsum gyi ngo bo nyid kyis dbugs kyi 'khor lo mtshon par bya'o //
analyzed: rlung gsum po nyid la nye bar 'brel pa'i yi ge gsum gyi ngo bo nyid kyis dbugs kyi 'khor lo mtshon par bya'o //
translated: The three winds themselves are to be understood as the wheel of breath by means of the three syllables which are their essence.

original: slar yang phyi rol gyi phreng ba bzung nas ngag gis bzlas pa mi bya ste /
analyzed: slar yang phyi rol gyi phreng ba bzung nas ngag gis bzlas pa mi bya ste /
translated: Moreover, one should not perform vocal repetition with an external rosary.

original: 'dir de skabs ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dir de skabs ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because that is not the occasion here.

original: gal te phyi'i bzlas pa mi byed na /
analyzed: gal te phyi'i bzlas pa mi byed na /
translated: If one does not perform external repetition,

original: 'o na ji ltar bzlas par bya zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ji ltar bzlas par bya zhe na /
translated: then how does one repeat?

original: de'i phyir gnyis su med ces bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir gnyis su med ces bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Therefore he says, ‚Äúwithout duality. ‚Äù

original: rlung dang sngags dang / lha dang dkyil 'khor la sogs pa rnams la ji ltar gnyis su rtogs par mi 'gyur bar de ltar zhes bya ba'i dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: rlung dang sngags dang / lha dang dkyil 'khor la sogs pa rnams la ji ltar gnyis su rtogs par mi 'gyur bar de ltar zhes bya ba'i dgongs pa'o //
translated: The idea is that one should not conceive of the winds, mantras, deities, ma·πá·∏çalas, etc. ,

original: gal te gnyis su med par zlos na /
analyzed: gal te gnyis su med par zlos na /
translated: If one repeats without duality,

original: ji ltar yi ge gsum gyi ngo bo nyid kyi sa dbye bar byed ce na /
analyzed: ji ltar yi ge gsum gyi ngo bo nyid kyi sa dbye bar byed ce na /
translated: How does one divide the stage by means of the nature of the three syllables?

original: 'on kyang zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: 'on kyang zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Nevertheless is stated.

original: 'jug pa dang / gnas pa dang / ldang ba'i rnam pas rlung rnams nye bar mtshon pa'i don du de nyid gsum ni lus ngag yid gsum sa bon gyi rang bzhin gyis mi phyed pa ni ro mnyam pa'o //
analyzed: 'jug pa dang / gnas pa dang / ldang ba'i rnam pas rlung rnams nye bar mtshon pa'i don du de nyid gsum ni lus ngag yid gsum sa bon gyi rang bzhin gyis mi phyed pa ni ro mnyam pa'o //
translated: The three realities are indicated by the winds in the aspect of entering, abiding, and rising. The three, body, speech, and mind, are of the nature of seeds, indivisible, of equal taste.

original: sngags zhes bya ba ni sngags kyi de kho na nyid kyi ngo bo'o //
analyzed: sngags zhes bya ba ni sngags kyi de kho na nyid kyi ngo bo'o //
translated: Mantras is the nature of the reality of mantras.

original: don kun bsdus pa'o zhes bya ba ni thams cad ni chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong gi ngon gang yin pa'i brjod par bya ba'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: don kun bsdus pa'o zhes bya ba ni thams cad ni chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong gi ngon gang yin pa'i brjod par bya ba'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: The collection of all meanings is the characteristic of the object to be expressed, which is all the meanings of the eighty-four thousand aggregates of Dharma.

original: de'i bsdus pa ni de bsdus pa'i bdag nyid can zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de'i bsdus pa ni de bsdus pa'i bdag nyid can zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Its collection is its nature of being collected, meaning its nature of being gathered.

original: de ltar sngags kyi de nyid rgyas par bshad nas /
analyzed: de ltar sngags kyi de nyid rgyas par bshad nas /
translated: Having thus explained the reality of mantras extensively,

original: de'i phan yon bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de'i phan yon bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: in order to teach its benefits,

original: bzlas pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: bzlas pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: [the BhagavƒÅn] declares recitation, etc.

original: yi ge gsum dgod pas dbugs gsum nye bar mtshon par byas nas dngos grub mtshungs pa med pa zhes bya ba dang 'brel lo //
analyzed: yi ge gsum dgod pas dbugs gsum nye bar mtshon par byas nas dngos grub mtshungs pa med pa zhes bya ba dang 'brel lo //
translated: The three syllables are set forth, and the three breaths are well indicated, and this is connected with the ‚Äúunexcelled power. ‚Äù

original: rdo rje bzlas pa'i ngo bo ni dngos grub bo //
analyzed: rdo rje bzlas pa'i ngo bo ni dngos grub bo //
translated: The nature of vajra repetition is power.

original: 'gro ba ni thob par 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'gro ba ni thob par 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: One should go to it, that is, one should attain it.

original: ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is it like?

original: mtshungs pa med pa zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: mtshungs pa med pa zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: It is said to be ‚Äúunexcelled. ‚Äù

original: bzlas pa'i rim pa'i mtshan nyid dang phral ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bzlas pa'i rim pa'i mtshan nyid dang phral ba'i phyir ro //
translated: It is free from the characteristics of the stage of repetition.

original: su zhig 'gro zhe na ;üîΩde'i phyir / yang dag mnyam par gzhag bzlas na //
analyzed: su zhig 'gro zhe na ; de'i phyir / yang dag mnyam par gzhag bzlas na //
translated: Who goes to it?

original: zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes gsungs te /
translated: Therefore it is said:üîΩ‚ÄúOne who repeats with perfect equipoise. ‚Äù

original: phyin ci ma log pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la sems chags pa ste /
analyzed: phyin ci ma log pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la sems chags pa ste /
translated: The mind is attached to the samƒÅdhi of non-error.

original: ting nge 'dzin gyi skyon drug po rnams spong bar byed pa'i 'du byed brgyad po bsgoms pas zil gyi sa gnon pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gyi skyon drug po rnams spong bar byed pa'i 'du byed brgyad po bsgoms pas zil gyi sa gnon pa'i phyir ro //
translated: By cultivating the eight applications that abandon the six faults of samƒÅdhi, one conquers them.

original: ji ltar 'gro zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar 'gro zhe na /
translated: How does one go to it?

original: de'i phyir / @107a * //
analyzed: de'i phyir / @107a * //
translated: Therefore it is said:

original: rnam dag go 'phang bzang po gsal //
analyzed: rnam dag go 'phang bzang po gsal //
translated: ‚ÄúThe clear, excellent state of purity. ‚Äù

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /üîΩrnam dag go 'phang ni ngag gi spros pa rnam pa bzhi bzlog pa'i bdag nyid can ngag gi 'od gsal ba'i ngo bo la shin tu gsal ba nyid ni mi gsal ba nyid las bzlog pa ji ltar 'gyur ba de ltar bzla zhes bya ba ni bya ba'i
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te / rnam dag go 'phang ni ngag gi spros pa rnam pa bzhi bzlog pa'i bdag nyid can ngag gi 'od gsal ba'i ngo bo la shin tu gsal ba nyid ni mi gsal ba nyid las bzlog pa ji ltar 'gyur ba de ltar bzla zhes bya ba ni bya ba'i
translated: Thus it is said.

original: khyad par ro //
analyzed: khyad par ro //
translated: The state of purity is the nature of the clear light of speech, which has the nature of the reversal of the four discursive elaborations of speech. Its extreme clarity is the opposite of non-clarity. It should be reversed just as it is. This is the particular action.

original: gang zhes bya ba ni sgom pa po'o //
analyzed: gang zhes bya ba ni sgom pa po'o //
translated: The one who is called he is the meditator.

original: shes zhes bya ba ni rig pa'o //
analyzed: shes zhes bya ba ni rig pa'o //
translated: The word knows is awareness.

original: de ni 'gro ba'i bla ma zhes bya ba ni khams gsum pa'i slob dpon du 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de ni 'gro ba'i bla ma zhes bya ba ni khams gsum pa'i slob dpon du 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: He becomes the guru of migrating beings means he becomes the master of the three realms. This is the meaning.

original: de ltar rnam pa gnyis kyis sngags kyi de kho na nyid bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar rnam pa gnyis kyis sngags kyi de kho na nyid bstan nas /
translated: Thus, having taught the reality of mantra in two ways,

original: de'i rab tu dbye ba bstan pa'i phyir sngags don zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i rab tu dbye ba bstan pa'i phyir sngags don zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: in order to teach its divisions, he says the meaning of mantra, etc.

original: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi mtshan nyid can te /
analyzed: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi mtshan nyid can te /
translated: It has the characteristic of nondual intuition,

original: don dam pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: don dam pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because it is the nature of ultimate bodhicitta.

original: ji skad du 'chad par 'gyur ba las /
analyzed: ji skad du 'chad par 'gyur ba las /
translated: As will be explained:üîΩThe meaning of mantra, the supreme name,

original: sngags kyi don dang ming mchog dang // gnyis med ye shes mtshan nyid can //üîΩzhes gsungs te /
analyzed: sngags kyi don dang ming mchog dang // gnyis med ye shes mtshan nyid can // zhes gsungs te /
translated: characterized by nondual intuition.

original: yid skyob par byed pas na sngags so //
analyzed: yid skyob par byed pas na sngags so //
translated: Mantra is so called because it protects the mind.

original: de'i don ni dgongs pa ste /
analyzed: de'i don ni dgongs pa ste /
translated: Its meaning is the transcendent,

original: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes zhes bya bar byas nas so //
analyzed: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes zhes bya bar byas nas so //
translated: having been made into the so-called nondual intuition.

original: sngags kyi de nyid dang zhes bya ba ni sngags ni de ma thag par gsungs pa'i rigs pas so //
analyzed: sngags kyi de nyid dang zhes bya ba ni sngags ni de ma thag par gsungs pa'i rigs pas so //
translated: The reality of mantra is the mantra itself, as just explained, by the reasoning.

original: de kho na nyid ni don dam pa'i rnam pa nyid kyi rdo rje 'chang gi rnam pa ni sngags kyi de nyid do ;
analyzed: de kho na nyid ni don dam pa'i rnam pa nyid kyi rdo rje 'chang gi rnam pa ni sngags kyi de nyid do ;
translated: Reality is the ultimate aspect itself, the aspect of Vajradhara, which is the reality of mantra.

original: / ji skad du 'chad par 'gyur ba las /
analyzed: / ji skad du 'chad par 'gyur ba las /
translated: As will be explained:

original: rten pa med cing snang ba med //
analyzed: rten pa med cing snang ba med //
translated: Without support, without appearance,

original: ces bya ba dang de bzhin du /
analyzed: ces bya ba dang de bzhin du /
translated: and likewise:

original: de nyid de ni don dam yang //üîΩzhes gsungs so //
analyzed: de nyid de ni don dam yang //üîΩzhes gsungs so //
translated: That itself is the ultimate.

original: sngags kyi man ngag ces bya ba ni gnas kyi dbye ba dang 'khor ba'i dbye bas bla ma'i drung nas sngags kyi man ngag gi mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: sngags kyi man ngag ces bya ba ni gnas kyi dbye ba dang 'khor ba'i dbye bas bla ma'i drung nas sngags kyi man ngag gi mtshan nyid do //
translated: The so-called mantra instruction is the characteristic of the mantra instruction from the guru by way of the division of the places and the division of the wheels.

original: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa ni ;
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa ni ;
translated: Therefore it is said:

original: zhal nas zhal du zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: zhal nas zhal du zhes bya ba ste /
translated: from mouth to mouth.

original: bla ma'i zhal nas slob ma'i khar //
analyzed: bla ma'i zhal nas slob ma'i khar //
translated: From the mouth of the guru to the mouth of the disciple.

original: zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning.

original: sngags kyi nyams myong zhes bya ba ni sngags la btu ba'i rim pas so //
analyzed: sngags kyi nyams myong zhes bya ba ni sngags la btu ba'i rim pas so //
translated: The so-called mantra experience is by way of the stages of extracting the mantra.

original: nyams su myong ba ni yang dag pa'i ye shes te /
analyzed: nyams su myong ba ni yang dag pa'i ye shes te /
translated: Experience is true wisdom.

original: sngags kyi nyams su myong ba'o //
analyzed: sngags kyi nyams su myong ba'o //
translated: It is the mantra experience.

original: mi gsal ba zhes bya ba ni phyi mo las yang dag par bsdus par gyur pa nyid kyi phyir mi gsal ba'o //
analyzed: mi gsal ba zhes bya ba ni phyi mo las yang dag par bsdus par gyur pa nyid kyi phyir mi gsal ba'o //
translated: The so-called unclear is unclear because it is truly included in the original.

original: gang zhes bya ba ni sgom pa po'o //
analyzed: gang zhes bya ba ni sgom pa po'o //
translated: The so-called one is the meditator.

original: shes zhes bya ba ni rig pa'o //
analyzed: shes zhes bya ba ni rig pa'o //
translated: The so-called knower is the knower.

original: de ni 'gro ba'i bla zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten gsum gyi mchod pa zhes bya ba'i don to //

analyzed: 'bras bu ni lus rnam par dben pa ste /

original: de'i bdag nyid ni de'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid ni de'i rang bzhin no //
translated: The nature of that is its essence.

analyzed: sems rnam par dben pa'i rim pa la rnal 'byor rnam pa gsum po ni /

original: de'i bdag nyid can no //
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid can no //

original: sgyu ma'i lus la rnal 'byor rnam pa gsum ni /
analyzed: sgyu ma'i lus la rnal 'byor rnam pa gsum ni /

original: de'i bdag nyid ni de'i rang bzhin no ;
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid ni de'i rang bzhin no ;
translated: Its nature is its essence.

original: / de bzhin du zung du 'jug pa'i rim pa la rnal 'byor rnam pa gsum ni /
analyzed: / de bzhin du zung du 'jug pa'i rim pa la rnal 'byor rnam pa gsum ni /
translated: Similarly, the three kinds of yoga in the stage of union areüîΩthe entities of cause, result, and their nonduality.

analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu dang / de gnyis su med pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi 'bras bu ni gnyis su med pa'i mtshan nyid can no //

original: de'i bdag nyid ni de'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid ni de'i rang bzhin no //

analyzed: de ltar don rnam pa gsum gyis de la mkho ba'i don brjod nas /
