analyzed: snang ba med ces bya ba ni rdo rje bzlas pa'i rim pa la brten nas 'jug pa dang gnas pa dang ldang ba spangs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The meaning of the mantra is ‚Äúgood fortune.‚ÄùüîΩThe meaning of the mantra is ‚Äúgood fortune.‚ÄùüîΩThe meaning of the mantra is ‚Äúgood fortune.‚ÄùüîΩThe meaning of the mantra is ‚Äúgood fortune.‚ÄùüîΩThe meaning of the mantra is ‚Äúgood fortune.‚ÄùüîΩThe meaning of the mantra is ‚Äúgood fortune.‚ÄùüîΩThe meaning of the mantra is ‚Äúgood fortune.‚ÄùüîΩThe meaning of the mantra is ‚Äúgood fortune.‚ÄùüîΩThe meaning of the mantra is ‚Äúgood fortune.‚ÄùüîΩThe meaning of the mantra is ‚Äúgood fortune.‚ÄùüîΩThe meaning of the mantra is ‚Äúgood fortune.‚ÄùüîΩThe meaning of the mantra is ‚Äúgood fortune.‚Äù

original: rang bzhin med pa zhes bya ba ni sems rnam par dag pa'i rim pas rang bzhin dang snang ba rnams la rang bzhin med par rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin med pa zhes bya ba ni sems rnam par dag pa'i rim pas rang bzhin dang snang ba rnams la rang bzhin med par rtogs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúWithout intrinsic nature‚Äù means that by the stage of the pure mind, one realizes that intrinsic natures and appearances are without intrinsic nature.

original: mchog gi mchog ces bya ba ni mchog ni snang ba la sogs pa gsum pa'i mtshan nyid las so //
analyzed: mchog gi mchog ces bya ba ni mchog ni snang ba la sogs pa gsum pa'i mtshan nyid las so //
translated: ‚ÄúSupreme of the supreme‚Äù means that the supreme is from the characteristic of the third stage, appearance, and so on.

original: mchog ni bzhi ba'i rnam pa'o //üîΩmed ces bya ba ni bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i @109a * //
analyzed: mchog ni bzhi ba'i rnam pa'o // med ces bya ba ni bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i @109a * //
translated: The supreme is the aspect of the fourth stage.

original: rim pas rjod byed spangs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rim pas rjod byed spangs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúNonexistent‚Äù means that by the stage of self-consecration, the expression is abandoned.

original: rnam pa med pa dang zhes bya ba ni mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pas rags pa dang phra ba'i rnam pa thams cad spangs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam pa med pa dang zhes bya ba ni mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pas rags pa dang phra ba'i rnam pa thams cad spangs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúWithout aspect‚Äù means that by the stage of manifest enlightenment, all coarse and subtle aspects are abandoned.

original: 'gyur ba med pa'i zhes bya ba ni tha dad pa'i rnam par rtog pa ma lus pa thams cad med pas zung 'jug gi rnam pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: 'gyur ba med pa'i zhes bya ba ni tha dad pa'i rnam par rtog pa ma lus pa thams cad med pas zung 'jug gi rnam pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúWithout change‚Äù means that because all conceptual thoughts of difference are absent, there is only the aspect of union.

original: chen po'i mchog ces bya ba ni mi slob pa'i lam gyi rang bzhin nyid kyis shin tu yang mchog nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: chen po'i mchog ces bya ba ni mi slob pa'i lam gyi rang bzhin nyid kyis shin tu yang mchog nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The ‚Äúsupreme of the great‚Äù is the nature of the path of no-more-learning, because it is the very highest.

original: gnyis pa thams cad rnam spangs pa //
analyzed: gnyis pa thams cad rnam spangs pa //
translated: The second is the complete abandonment of duality.

original: zhes bya ba ni dngos po dang dngos po med pa dang / yod pa dang med pa'i spros pa nye bar zhi bas so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni dngos po dang dngos po med pa dang / yod pa dang med pa'i spros pa nye bar zhi bas so //
translated: This is because the elaborations of entity and non-entity, existence and non-existence, are completely pacified.

original: bde ba yang dga' 'phel bar byed //
analyzed: bde ba yang dga' 'phel bar byed //
translated: It increases the bliss of joy.

original: ces bya ba ni lus dang sems kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba'i 'dod pa med pa dag la 'phel bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni lus dang sems kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba'i 'dod pa med pa dag la 'phel bar byed pa'o //
translated: This is because it increases the desire for the bliss and mental bliss of body and mind.

original: shes bya thams cad cha dang bral //
analyzed: shes bya thams cad cha dang bral //
translated: It is free from the parts of all objects of knowledge.

original: zhes bya ba ni shes bya'i rnam par rtog pa ma lus pa rnams kyis ma gos pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni shes bya'i rnam par rtog pa ma lus pa rnams kyis ma gos pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because it is unstained by any of the conceptualizations of objects of knowledge.

original: shes bya'i rtog pa thams cad las 'das pa snyam du byas nas so //
analyzed: shes bya'i rtog pa thams cad las 'das pa snyam du byas nas so //
translated: It is beyond all conceptualizations of objects of knowledge.

original: gnyis med ye shes rnal 'byor skyes //
analyzed: gnyis med ye shes rnal 'byor skyes //
translated: It is the yoga of non-dual wisdom.

original: zhes bya ba ni sngags kyi de kho na nyid kyi mtshan nyid de chos thams cad la aa yig gi chos nyid kyi rjes su 'byed pa'i phyir /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sngags kyi de kho na nyid kyi mtshan nyid de chos thams cad la aa yig gi chos nyid kyi rjes su 'byed pa'i phyir /
translated: This is the definition of the reality of mantra, because all phenomena are differentiated by the reality of the letter A.

original: gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba ni chos nyid kyi rnam pas skyes pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba ni chos nyid kyi rnam pas skyes pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The nondual yoga is born of the aspect of reality, this is the meaning.

original: 'dis ni sngags kyi tshig bshad do //
analyzed: 'dis ni sngags kyi tshig bshad do //
translated: By this, the word mantra is explained.

original: de kho na nyid kyi tshig bshad pa ni /
analyzed: de kho na nyid kyi tshig bshad pa ni /
translated: The explanation of the word reality is as follows:üîΩThat itself is that,

original: de nyid de ni zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: de nyid de ni zhes gsungs te /
translated: it is said.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: don dam yang zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: don dam yang zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The ultimate, it is said.

original: mchog gi ye shes kyi yul nyid kyi phyir dang / rang nyid kyang mchog yin pa'i phyir dang / mchog ni dgos pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: mchog gi ye shes kyi yul nyid kyi phyir dang / rang nyid kyang mchog yin pa'i phyir dang / mchog ni dgos pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because it is the object of supreme intuition, because it is supreme itself, and because the supreme is the goal.

original: de ni de bzhin zhes bya ba ni rtag tu bcos ma ma yin pa'i ngo bos gnas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni de bzhin zhes bya ba ni rtag tu bcos ma ma yin pa'i ngo bos gnas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is just so, it is said, because it always abides in its unfabricated nature.

original: gzhan nyid min zhes bya ba ni 'khrul pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan nyid min zhes bya ba ni 'khrul pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is not other, it is said, because it is nonerroneous.

original: de nyid rdo rje 'chang ba'i dngos //
analyzed: de nyid rdo rje 'chang ba'i dngos //
translated: It is the reality of Vajradhara.

original: zhes bya ba ni spros pa med pa nyid kyis rdo rje 'chang gi dbugs 'dzin pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni spros pa med pa nyid kyis rdo rje 'chang gi dbugs 'dzin pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: This is because, by being free from conceptual elaboration, he is the essence of the vajra-holder's breath.

original: ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin ni //
analyzed: ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin ni //
translated: The nature of the five intuitions

original: zhes bya ba ni me 'ong lta bu'i la sogs pa ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni me 'ong lta bu'i la sogs pa ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin no //
translated: This is the nature of the five intuitions, beginning with the intuition of the fire of gnosis.üîΩPervading all,

original: khyab pa'i zhes bya ba ni chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong la khyab par byed pa'o //
analyzed: khyab pa'i zhes bya ba ni chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong la khyab par byed pa'o //
translated: it pervades the eighty-four thousand heaps of Dharma.üîΩIn all,

original: kun la zhes bya ba ni don dam pa'i rang bzhin med pas chos thams cad la 'gro ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: kun la zhes bya ba ni don dam pa'i rang bzhin med pas chos thams cad la 'gro ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: it is in all things, because it is the nature of the ultimate, and because it is the absence of going in all things.üîΩEmptiness,

original: stong pa nyid ces bya ba ni rdzas su yod pa la mngon par zhen @109b pa bzlog pas so //
analyzed: stong pa nyid ces bya ba ni rdzas su yod pa la mngon par zhen @109b pa bzlog pas so //
translated: it is emptiness, because it is the reversal of attachment to substantial existence.üîΩIt utterly destroys all addictions,

original: nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu 'joms zhes bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa thams cad 'joms par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu 'joms zhes bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa thams cad 'joms par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it destroys all conceptualizations.üîΩStainless,

original: dri med ces bya ba ni khyab bya'i ngo bo chos rnams kyi skyon gyis ma gos pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: dri med ces bya ba ni khyab bya'i ngo bo chos rnams kyi skyon gyis ma gos pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: it is stainless, because it is the nature of the pervasion, and because it is not sullied by the faults of things.

original: dri bral zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dri ma dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: dri bral zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dri ma dang bral ba'o //
translated: Free from stains means being free from stains by virtue of having a nature that is pure by its very essence.

original: dang ba dang zhes bya ba ni dag pa'i shel lta bu nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: dang ba dang zhes bya ba ni dag pa'i shel lta bu nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Clear means being like a clear crystal.

original: rang gi rtogs pa'i go 'phangs zhes bya ba ni rang ni chos kyi dbyings te /
analyzed: rang gi rtogs pa'i go 'phangs zhes bya ba ni rang ni chos kyi dbyings te /
translated: The level of realization means that the nature is the basic space of phenomena.

original: rtogs pa ni mngon du byed pa'o //
analyzed: rtogs pa ni mngon du byed pa'o //
translated: Realization means to make that fully evident.

original: de'i go 'phang ni 'dug pa'i gnas so //
analyzed: de'i go 'phang ni 'dug pa'i gnas so //
translated: The level of that is the place where one rests.

original: mchog ces bya ba ni kun nas nyon mongs pa'i chos kyi mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mchog ces bya ba ni kun nas nyon mongs pa'i chos kyi mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Supreme means being free from the characteristics of phenomena that are afflictive.

original: dang po'i sangs rgyas zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'i ngo bos gdod ma nas chos thams cad rtogs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: dang po'i sangs rgyas zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'i ngo bos gdod ma nas chos thams cad rtogs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The primordial buddha means that, by virtue of having a nature that is pure by its very essence, all phenomena are realized from the very beginning.

original: shin tu dgyes zhes bya ba ni dri ma med pa'i rnam par dag pas shin tu yang dga' ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: shin tu dgyes zhes bya ba ni dri ma med pa'i rnam par dag pas shin tu yang dga' ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Extremely delighted means being extremely delighted by virtue of being stainless and completely pure.

original: rigs lnga rnams ni rgyas par byed //
analyzed: rigs lnga rnams ni rgyas par byed //
translated: The five families are expanded.

original: ces bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs lnga rnams las sad par byed pa'i don to //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs lnga rnams las sad par byed pa'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning of ‚Äúawakening‚Äù from among the five families of the TathƒÅgatas.

original: de ltar sngags kyi de kho na nyid kyi don bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar sngags kyi de kho na nyid kyi don bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught the meaning of the reality of mantra,

original: sngags kyi man ngag so sor rgyas par bshad pa brjod pa'i phyir de'i yan lag rang gi ngo bo ni man ngag ces bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: sngags kyi man ngag so sor rgyas par bshad pa brjod pa'i phyir de'i yan lag rang gi ngo bo ni man ngag ces bya ba gsungs te /
translated: in order to explain the individual extensive instructions of mantra, he says the branch of its nature is ‚Äúinstruction,‚Äù

original: man ngag ni sngags kyi gdams ngag go //
analyzed: man ngag ni sngags kyi gdams ngag go //
translated: and instruction is the advice of mantra.

original: gnas kyi bye brag gis zhes bya ba ni rtsa gsum gyi gnas kyi dbye ba dang / gnas brgyad la reg pa'i dbye bas so //
analyzed: gnas kyi bye brag gis zhes bya ba ni rtsa gsum gyi gnas kyi dbye ba dang / gnas brgyad la reg pa'i dbye bas so //
translated: By the distinction of places means by the distinction of the places of the three channels and the distinction of the eight places.

original: 'khor lo'i dbye bas zhes bya ba ni phyi rol gyi 'khor lo'i dbye ba dang / me la sogs pa 'khor lo bzhi'i dbye bas so //
analyzed: 'khor lo'i dbye bas zhes bya ba ni phyi rol gyi 'khor lo'i dbye ba dang / me la sogs pa 'khor lo bzhi'i dbye bas so //
translated: By the distinction of wheels means by the distinction of the external wheels and the distinction of the four wheels of fire and so on.

original: btu bar bya zhes bya ba ni phyi rol gyi yi ge'i ngo bos so //
analyzed: btu bar bya zhes bya ba ni phyi rol gyi yi ge'i ngo bos so //
translated: One should extract means by the nature of the external syllables.

original: nang du ni 'khor lo la brten nas so //
analyzed: nang du ni 'khor lo la brten nas so //
translated: Internally, it is based on the wheels.

original: gnas kyi bye brag gis gsungs pa gang yin pa de rgyas par bshad pa'i don du rtsa dang snying ga mgrin pa bad kan zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: gnas kyi bye brag gis gsungs pa gang yin pa de rgyas par bshad pa'i don du rtsa dang snying ga mgrin pa bad kan zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: That which is taught by the particular locations is stated in order to explain the extensive meaning, ‚Äúthe nƒÅ·∏çƒ´s, heart, throat, and phlegm.‚Äù

original: gnas brgyad du yang dag par reg pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gnas brgyad du yang dag par reg pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúthe eight locations‚Äù is ‚Äúthe perfect contact.‚Äù

original: rtsol ba zhes bya ba ni sbyor ba'o //üîΩ'khor lo'i dbye bas btu bar bya //
analyzed: rtsol ba zhes bya ba ni sbyor ba'o // 'khor lo'i dbye bas btu bar bya //
translated: ‚Äú Exertion‚Äù is the application.

original: zhes bya ba rgyas par bshad pa ni /üîΩde bzhin du ni las rnams bya //üîΩzhes gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba rgyas par bshad pa ni / de bzhin du ni las rnams bya // zhes gsungs te /
translated: ‚Äú The wheels are to be gathered‚Äù is the extensive explanation.

original: de bzhin du ni las rnams bya ba ni me'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa rnams la thun phyed phyed kyi bar du dbugs gzung bas dbang du bya ba la sogs pa'i las bsgrub par bya'o //üîΩzhi @110a * //
analyzed: de bzhin du ni las rnams bya ba ni me'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa rnams la thun phyed phyed kyi bar du dbugs gzung bas dbang du bya ba la sogs pa'i las bsgrub par bya'o // zhi @110a * //
translated: ‚Äú The actions are to be performed‚Äù is the accomplishment of the actions of magnetizing and so on by holding the breath for half a period in the ma·πá·∏çalas of fire and so on.

original: ba la sogs zhes bya ba ni dbang du bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: ba la sogs zhes bya ba ni dbang du bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: ‚Äú Pacification and so on‚Äù is magnetizing and so on.

original: go rims bzhin zhes bya ba ni ji ltar srid par 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams kyi rjes su 'brangs nas so //
analyzed: go rims bzhin zhes bya ba ni ji ltar srid par 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams kyi rjes su 'brangs nas so //
translated: ‚Äú In order‚Äù is following the ma·πá·∏çalas as they occur.

original: dngos grub bzhin bya ba ni rdo rje'i bzlas pa'i dngos grub bo //
analyzed: dngos grub bzhin bya ba ni rdo rje'i bzlas pa'i dngos grub bo //
translated: The accomplishment of the vajra repetition is the accomplishment of the vajra repetition.

original: ye shes de zhes bya ba ni dus gsum du gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su mkhyen pa'o //
analyzed: ye shes de zhes bya ba ni dus gsum du gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su mkhyen pa'o //
translated: The knowledge of that is the knowledge of the Tathagatas abiding in the three times.

original: ji ltar nyams su myong mtshan nyid //
analyzed: ji ltar nyams su myong mtshan nyid //
translated: The nature of the experience is

original: ces bya ba ni me'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i dbugs rnams ni 'byung ba dang / 'jug pa dang / gnas pa'i bdag nyid can rnams kyis nyams su myong ba'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni me'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i dbugs rnams ni 'byung ba dang / 'jug pa dang / gnas pa'i bdag nyid can rnams kyis nyams su myong ba'i rim pa'o //
translated: the nature of the experience of the exhalations, inhalations, and retentions of the fire-mandala and so forth.üîΩThe nature of the perfection is

original: ji ltar rang bzhin rdzogs pa ji lta bus zhes bya ba ni aa yig dang ham yig gi bdag nyid can rang bzhin gyi bzlas pa rdzogs pa dang bskyed pa'i rim pa la /
analyzed: ji ltar rang bzhin rdzogs pa ji lta bus zhes bya ba ni aa yig dang ham yig gi bdag nyid can rang bzhin gyi bzlas pa rdzogs pa dang bskyed pa'i rim pa la /
translated: the nature of the perfection of the natural repetition which is the nature of the letter A and the letter HAM.

original: yi ge gsum yongs su gyur pa las de bzhin gshegs pa gsum rdzogs pa'o //üîΩrgyun gyi dbye ba ji bzhin du //
analyzed: yi ge gsum yongs su gyur pa las de bzhin gshegs pa gsum rdzogs pa'o // rgyun gyi dbye ba ji bzhin du //
translated: The perfection of the three syllables is the perfection of the three Tathagatas.üîΩThe division of the stream is

original: zhes bya ba ni rgyun ni rnam par ma dag pa la dbye ba ni rnam par dag pa nyid skyed pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rgyun ni rnam par ma dag pa la dbye ba ni rnam par dag pa nyid skyed pa'o //
translated: the division of the stream which is the generation of the pure state.

original: rigs pa ji bzhin zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor re re la nyi shu rtsa lnga dang bcas pa'i nyis brgya'i grangs kyis so //
analyzed: rigs pa ji bzhin zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor re re la nyi shu rtsa lnga dang bcas pa'i nyis brgya'i grangs kyis so //
translated: As to the reason, it is because of the number of two hundred, with twenty-five for each mandala.

original: sbyor ba ji bzhin zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor re re la de las gzhan pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cha brtsis pas dbugs dgu brgya'i grangs kyis so //üîΩ'bras bu ji lta ba bzhin gnas //
analyzed: sbyor ba ji bzhin zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor re re la de las gzhan pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cha brtsis pas dbugs dgu brgya'i grangs kyis so // 'bras bu ji lta ba bzhin gnas //
translated: As to the application, it is because of the number of nine hundred breaths, counting the parts of the other mandalas for each mandala.

original: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje bzlas pa'i ngo bo rnam pa bcu gcig nyi khri chig stong drug brgya'i bdag nyid can no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje bzlas pa'i ngo bo rnam pa bcu gcig nyi khri chig stong drug brgya'i bdag nyid can no //
translated: As to the result, it is because of the eleven aspects of the nature of vajra repetition, which is the essence of the result.

original: yang dag bsam gtan phyag rgya'i rim //
analyzed: yang dag bsam gtan phyag rgya'i rim //
translated: As to the right concentration, it is the stage of the seal,

original: zhes bya ba ni bskyed pa'i rim pa rnam pa gnyis bsgoms pas rang gi lus ma dmigs pas lhag mos kyi phyag rgya chen po'i ngo bo la sems pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bskyed pa'i rim pa rnam pa gnyis bsgoms pas rang gi lus ma dmigs pas lhag mos kyi phyag rgya chen po'i ngo bo la sems pa'o //
translated: which is the contemplation of the nature of the great seal of the remainder, which is the non-apprehension of one's own body through the cultivation of the two aspects of the stage of development.

original: yang dag ces bya ba ni bden pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i gnyen po nyid kyis so //
analyzed: yang dag ces bya ba ni bden pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i gnyen po nyid kyis so //
translated: As to the right, it is because of the antidote to the conception of truth.

original: de nyid kyi phyir gzugs rdzogs pa zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gzugs rdzogs pa zhes gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, it is said to be ‚Äúperfect form.‚Äù

original: sangs rgyas lnga la sogs pa'i dbye bas phyag rgya chen po'i rnam par rtog pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: sangs rgyas lnga la sogs pa'i dbye bas phyag rgya chen po'i rnam par rtog pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúthe concept of the great seal‚Äù is that it is divided into the five buddhas, and so forth.

original: de lta bur gyur pa'i sngags kyi man ngag ces bya ba ni snga ma dang 'brel par bya'o //
analyzed: de lta bur gyur pa'i sngags kyi man ngag ces bya ba ni snga ma dang 'brel par bya'o //
translated: The ‚Äúmantra instruction‚Äù that is like that should be connected with the previous [line].

original: de ltar rang gi ngo bo bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar rang gi ngo bo bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught its essence,

original: de nyid la bla ma'i gdams ngag gis thob par bya ba brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de nyid la bla ma'i gdams ngag gis thob par bya ba brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: in order to state that it is to be attained by the guru‚Äôs instruction,

original: bla ma'i zhal la gnas zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: bla ma'i zhal la gnas zhes gsungs te /
translated: it is said, ‚ÄúResides in the guru‚Äôs mouth.‚Äù

original: de lta bur gyur pa'i man ngag rdo rje slob dpon gyi @110b zhal la gnas pa'o //
analyzed: de lta bur gyur pa'i man ngag rdo rje slob dpon gyi @110b zhal la gnas pa'o //
translated: The instruction that is like that resides in the mouth of the vajra master.

original: yang dag bslab par bya zhes bya ba ni bla mas bsnyen pa la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas brtsal bar bya'o //
analyzed: yang dag bslab par bya zhes bya ba ni bla mas bsnyen pa la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas brtsal bar bya'o //
translated: ‚Äú Should be properly trained‚Äù means that it should be sought by the guru, preceded by service, and so forth.

original: rab tu 'bad pas zhes bya ba ni le lo la sogs pa spangs nas zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rab tu 'bad pas zhes bya ba ni le lo la sogs pa spangs nas zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: ‚Äú With great effort‚Äù means that laziness, and so forth, should be abandoned.

original: de ltar de nyid la bla ma'i gdams ngag thob par bya ba nyid bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar de nyid la bla ma'i gdams ngag thob par bya ba nyid bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught the very obtaining of the guru's instructions in that way,

original: bla ma mnyes par bya ba brjod pa'i phyir /üîΩgser dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: bla ma mnyes par bya ba brjod pa'i phyir / gser dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: in order to express the pleasing of the guru,üîΩ[the BhagavƒÅn] declares gold, etc.

original: gser la sogs pa rnams kyis so //
analyzed: gser la sogs pa rnams kyis so //
translated: With gold, etc.

original: do shal gos dang ni zhes bya ba ni shin tu 'jam pa'i reg bya can dar la sogs pa rnams kyis so //
analyzed: do shal gos dang ni zhes bya ba ni shin tu 'jam pa'i reg bya can dar la sogs pa rnams kyis so //

original: rin chen zhes bya ba ni aindra n'i la dang / ma ra ka ta dang / padma r'a ga la sogs pa rnams kyis so //
analyzed: rin chen zhes bya ba ni aindra n'i la dang / ma ra ka ta dang / padma r'a ga la sogs pa rnams kyis so //
translated: With jewels means with indranƒ´la, marakata, padmarƒÅga, etc.

original: sna tshogs yon tan mchog ces bya ba ni rang rang gi mthu'i che bas shin tu yon tan phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa rnams kyis so //
analyzed: sna tshogs yon tan mchog ces bya ba ni rang rang gi mthu'i che bas shin tu yon tan phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa rnams kyis so //
translated: With various supreme qualities means with those that are endowed with an abundance of excellent qualities due to the greatness of their individual powers.

original: bran dang zhes bya ba ni dus cung zad yongs su spyod pa rnams kyis so //
analyzed: bran dang zhes bya ba ni dus cung zad yongs su spyod pa rnams kyis so //

original: las byed pa zhes bya ba ni ji srid 'tsho'i bar du shin tu gus par byed pa'o //
analyzed: las byed pa zhes bya ba ni ji srid 'tsho'i bar du shin tu gus par byed pa'o //
translated: With workers means with those who are employed for as long as one lives, and who are very respectful.

original: grangs med pa dang zhes bya ba ni dpag tu med pas so //
analyzed: grangs med pa dang zhes bya ba ni dpag tu med pas so //
translated: The phrase incalculable means inconceivable.

original: dad cing gus pa la sogs kyis //
analyzed: dad cing gus pa la sogs kyis //
translated: By means of faith, devotion, etc.

original: zhes bya ba ni mi mthun pa'i dngos po spangs pa'i ngo bo khyad par can gyi dad pa nges pa la sogs pa rnams kyis so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni mi mthun pa'i dngos po spangs pa'i ngo bo khyad par can gyi dad pa nges pa la sogs pa rnams kyis so //
translated: Faith is the essence of the abandonment of adverse factors. It is a special kind of certainty, etc.

original: mnyes par bya zhes bya ba ni 'chad par 'gyur ba dang 'brel pa'o //
analyzed: mnyes par bya zhes bya ba ni 'chad par 'gyur ba dang 'brel pa'o //
translated: The phrase to please is connected with the following.

original: ci zhig gis mnyes par bya zhe na /
analyzed: ci zhig gis mnyes par bya zhe na /

original: de'i phyir ji ltar 'dod pas ster ba zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir ji ltar 'dod pas ster ba zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, it is said, by giving whatever is desired.

original: ji ltar 'dod pas slob mas mngon par 'dod pa'i don rab tu ster ba'o //üîΩston pa zhes bya ba ni slob mas dbang bskur ba la sogs pa nas brtsams nas /
analyzed: ji ltar 'dod pas slob mas mngon par 'dod pa'i don rab tu ster ba'o // ston pa zhes bya ba ni slob mas dbang bskur ba la sogs pa nas brtsams nas /
translated: Whatever is desired is the object that the disciple wishes to receive.

original: thos pa la sogs pa rnams kyi ston pa'o //
analyzed: thos pa la sogs pa rnams kyi ston pa'o //
translated: The teacher is the one who bestows the initiation, etc. to the disciple, and is the one who teaches listening, etc.

original: bla ma zhes bya ba ni khyad par can gyi yon tan la sbyor ba dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: bla ma zhes bya ba ni khyad par can gyi yon tan la sbyor ba dang ldan pa'o //
translated: The guru is the one who is endowed with the special qualities of application.

original: sngags kyi don ston zhes bya ba ni sngags kyi don de'i man ngag gi bdag nyid ston par byed ba'o //
analyzed: sngags kyi don ston zhes bya ba ni sngags kyi don de'i man ngag gi bdag nyid ston par byed ba'o //
translated: The phrase the meaning of the mantra refers to the teaching of the meaning of the mantra, which is the nature of the esoteric instructions.

original: mnyes par bya zhes bya ba ni bstan par bya ba'o //
analyzed: mnyes par bya zhes bya ba ni bstan par bya ba'o //
translated: The phrase should please means should teach.

original: rab tu 'bad pas zhes bya ba ni de dang de'i bsam pa 'dzin pa'i ngo bo brtson 'grus kyis so //
analyzed: rab tu 'bad pas zhes bya ba ni de dang de'i bsam pa 'dzin pa'i ngo bo brtson 'grus kyis so //
translated: The phrase with great effort means with the effort that is the nature of the retention of the intention of this and that.

original: chags pa bral ba'i sems kyis zhes bya ba ni zhen pa dang bral ba'i 'dzin pa la sogs pas so //
analyzed: chags pa bral ba'i sems kyis zhes bya ba ni zhen pa dang bral ba'i 'dzin pa la sogs pas so //
translated: The phrase with a mind free of attachment means with a retention free of clinging.

original: sems kyis zhes bya ba ni lhag pa'i bsam pas zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: sems kyis zhes bya ba ni lhag pa'i bsam pas zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The phrase with the mind means with the superior intention.

original: de ltar bsam pa rdzogs byas nas //
analyzed: de ltar bsam pa rdzogs byas nas //
translated: Having thus fulfilled the intention,

original: zhes bya ba la de ltar zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin du'o //üîΩbsam pa rdzogs @111a * //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la de ltar zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin du'o // bsam pa rdzogs @111a * //
translated: The phrase having thus means as before.

original: byas nas zhes bya ba ni bla ma dang 'brel ba'i sems kyis so //
analyzed: byas nas zhes bya ba ni bla ma dang 'brel ba'i sems kyis so //
translated: The phrase having fulfilled the intention means with a mind connected to the guru.

original: gang gis she na /üîΩde'i phyir / rnyed par dka' ba'i dngos rnams kyis //
analyzed: gang gis she na / de'i phyir / rnyed par dka' ba'i dngos rnams kyis //
translated: By what?üîΩ Therefore, it is said:

original: zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes gsungs te /
translated: With things that are difficult to obtain.

original: mand'a ra ba'i dngos po dbul ba'i rnam pa rnams kyis so //
analyzed: mand'a ra ba'i dngos po dbul ba'i rnam pa rnams kyis so //
translated: with the form of offering mandƒÅrava flowers.

original: phyag byas zhes bya ba ni lus la sogs pa rnams kyis so //
analyzed: phyag byas zhes bya ba ni lus la sogs pa rnams kyis so //
translated: ‚ÄúHaving bowed‚Äù means with body and so forth.

original: de zhes bya ba ni yang dag par bstan par byed pa'i bla ma las so //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni yang dag par bstan par byed pa'i bla ma las so //
translated: ‚ÄúThat‚Äù means from the guru who teaches correctly.

original: sngags zhes bya ba ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i yi ge gsum mo //
analyzed: sngags zhes bya ba ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i yi ge gsum mo //
translated: ‚ÄúThe mantra‚Äù is the three syllables that will be explained.

original: yang dag ces bya ba ni the tshom med pa'i blos so //
analyzed: yang dag ces bya ba ni the tshom med pa'i blos so //
translated: ‚ÄúCorrectly‚Äù means with a mind free of doubt.

original: bzung nas zhes bya ba ni blang bar byas pa'o //
analyzed: bzung nas zhes bya ba ni blang bar byas pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúHaving taken‚Äù means having accepted.

original: 'bras bu don gnyer zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya chen po'i mtshan nyid kyi 'bras bu mngon par 'dod pa rnams kyis so //
analyzed: 'bras bu don gnyer zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya chen po'i mtshan nyid kyi 'bras bu mngon par 'dod pa rnams kyis so //
translated: ‚ÄúThose who seek the fruit‚Äù are those who desire the fruit characterized by the great seal.

original: de tsam gyis bla ma mnyes par bya ba bstan to //
analyzed: de tsam gyis bla ma mnyes par bya ba bstan to //
translated: Just that much is taught for pleasing the guru.

original: de ltar don rnam pa gsum gyis sngags kyi man ngag so sor rgyas par bshad pa bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar don rnam pa gsum gyis sngags kyi man ngag so sor rgyas par bshad pa bstan nas /
translated: Thus, having taught the explanation of the mantra instruction with three topics,

original: sngags btu ba'i so sor rgyas par bshad pa brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: sngags btu ba'i so sor rgyas par bshad pa brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: in order to explain the explanation of the selection of the mantra,üîΩhe says, ‚Äúthe three syllables,‚Äù and so on.

original: de'i yan lag de btu ba'i don du rten la sogs pa bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de'i yan lag de btu ba'i don du rten la sogs pa bstan pa ni /
translated: The explanation of the support, etc. for the purpose of extracting that branch is as follows:

original: mi yi rus pa'i smyu gu dang // zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: mi yi rus pa'i smyu gu dang // zhes gsungs te /

original: mi'i rtsib ma'i rus pa las smyu gu byas nas so //
analyzed: mi'i rtsib ma'i rus pa las smyu gu byas nas so //
translated: Having made a pen from a human rib,

original: rin chen rab bdar ba zhes bya ba ni mu tig gi phye ma la sogs pa rnams so //
analyzed: rin chen rab bdar ba zhes bya ba ni mu tig gi phye ma la sogs pa rnams so //

original: rab bdal ba zhes bya ba ni bkram pa'o //
analyzed: rab bdal ba zhes bya ba ni bkram pa'o //

original: sa gzhi zhes bya ba ni gzhi ma'o //
analyzed: sa gzhi zhes bya ba ni gzhi ma'o //

original: dur khrod thal ba zhes bya ba ni ro bsregs pa'i thal ba'o //
analyzed: dur khrod thal ba zhes bya ba ni ro bsregs pa'i thal ba'o //

original: yang na zhes bya ba ni de med na'o //
analyzed: yang na zhes bya ba ni de med na'o //

original: las kyi dbye bas zhes bya ba ni dur khrod kyi sol ba dang / dur khrod kyi so phag la sogs pa tshon gyi bye brag gis mngon spyod la sogs pa'i dngos grub bsgrub ces bya ba'i don to //üîΩde ltar de btu ba'i don du ;
analyzed: las kyi dbye bas zhes bya ba ni dur khrod kyi sol ba dang / dur khrod kyi so phag la sogs pa tshon gyi bye brag gis mngon spyod la sogs pa'i dngos grub bsgrub ces bya ba'i don to // de ltar de btu ba'i don du ;
translated: By the division of action means that the charnel ground ash and charnel ground brick, etc. are the various colors for the accomplishment of the powers of destruction, etc.

original: rten la sogs pa bshad nas /
analyzed: rten la sogs pa bshad nas /
translated: Thus, having explained the support, etc. for the purpose of extracting that,

original: de btu ba po'i bye brag brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de btu ba po'i bye brag brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: for the sake of stating the various extractors of that,üîΩhe says:

original: thog mar dbang bskur blangs byas nas //üîΩzhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: thog mar dbang bskur blangs byas nas // zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Having first received the consecration,üîΩhe should perform the consecration of the mandala.

original: bla ma'i drung nas gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'brangs nas dbang bzhi bzung ste /üîΩthog ma ni sngags btu ba las dang por ro //
analyzed: bla ma'i drung nas gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'brangs nas dbang bzhi bzung ste / thog ma ni sngags btu ba las dang por ro //
translated: Having received the four consecrations from the guru, following the Guhyasamaja Tantra,

analyzed: dkyil 'khor la sogs mdun du byas //
translated: first, in the selection of the mantra, he should perform the preliminary practice.

original: zhes bya ba ni rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor dang / thun mong pa'i dkyil 'khor bya ba la sogs pas rnam par dag pa byas pas so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor dang / thun mong pa'i dkyil 'khor bya ba la sogs pas rnam par dag pa byas pas so //
translated: Having performed the purification by the performance of the mandala and so forth,

analyzed: bgegs mthar byed la zhes bya ba ni bdud rtsi 'khyil pa la'o //

original: gtor ma che zhes bya ba ni gtor ma chen po ste /
analyzed: gtor ma che zhes bya ba ni gtor ma chen po ste /

original: chang dang sha la sogs @111b pas rgya che ba'o //
analyzed: chang dang sha la sogs @111b pas rgya che ba'o //
translated: extensive with alcohol, meat, and so forth.

original: sbyin zhes bya ba ni sbyin pa la sogs pa'i rim pas de bsgrub sngon du 'gro ba byas nas so //
analyzed: sbyin zhes bya ba ni sbyin pa la sogs pa'i rim pas de bsgrub sngon du 'gro ba byas nas so //
translated: Having performed the preliminary practice by the process of giving and so forth,

original: lha'i khang par zhes bya ba ni lha'i khyim la sogs par ro //
analyzed: lha'i khang par zhes bya ba ni lha'i khyim la sogs par ro //
translated: in the temple of the deity, in the house of the deity and so forth,

original: sngags btu ba zhes bya ba ni de'i rjes la 'chad par 'gyur ba'i sngags so //
analyzed: sngags btu ba zhes bya ba ni de'i rjes la 'chad par 'gyur ba'i sngags so //
translated: The mantra extraction is the mantra that will be explained after that.

original: mtshungs pa med pa'i zhes bya ba ni ma btus pa'i sngags dang mtshan nyid dang bral ba nyid kyis yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: mtshungs pa med pa'i zhes bya ba ni ma btus pa'i sngags dang mtshan nyid dang bral ba nyid kyis yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: The unequalled is the complete purity by the absence of the characteristics of the extracted mantra.

original: sku gsung thugs ni sgrub byed pa'o zhes bya ba ni rnam par ma dag pa'i lus la sogs pa bzlog pas lha'i rnam pa'i lus la sogs pa sgrub par byed pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs ni sgrub byed pa'o zhes bya ba ni rnam par ma dag pa'i lus la sogs pa bzlog pas lha'i rnam pa'i lus la sogs pa sgrub par byed pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The accomplisher of body, speech, and mind means that it is the accomplisher of the divine body, etc., by the reversal of the impure body, etc. This is the meaning.

original: de ltar de btu ba po'i khyad par bstan nas sngags btu ba rang gi ngo bo bshad pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de ltar de btu ba po'i khyad par bstan nas sngags btu ba rang gi ngo bo bshad pa'i phyir /
translated: Having thus taught the distinction of the extractor, in order to explain the nature of the mantra extraction, [the BhagavƒÅn] declares,

original: dang po'i yi ge thog mar bri //üîΩzhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: dang po'i yi ge thog mar bri // zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: The first syllable is written first.

original: dang por ni dbyangs yig rnams kyi dang po aa yig bri bar bya'o //üîΩdbyangs yig lnga pa yang dag ldan //
analyzed: dang por ni dbyangs yig rnams kyi dang po aa yig bri bar bya'o // dbyangs yig lnga pa yang dag ldan //
translated: The first is the first of the vowels, the syllable a, which is to be written.üîΩEndowed with the fifth vowel.

original: zhes bya ba ni dbyangs yig lnga pa au yig yang dag par ldan pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni dbyangs yig lnga pa au yig yang dag par ldan pa'o //
translated: The fifth vowel is the syllable u, which is endowed with it.

original: de ltar na a'i yi ge pha rol du bya ste /
analyzed: de ltar na a'i yi ge pha rol du bya ste /
translated: Thus, the letter a is made into a long vowel.

original: yi ge aa ni aor 'gyur te /
analyzed: yi ge aa ni aor 'gyur te /
translated: The letter a becomes ƒÅ.

original: au yig mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: au yig mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The letter u disappears.

original: de ltar na ao zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar na ao zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, it becomes ƒÅu.

original: sde tshan mtha' ma'i mtha' can ldan //
analyzed: sde tshan mtha' ma'i mtha' can ldan //
translated: Possessing the last of the last

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: group.

original: ka la sogs pa ni sde tshan //
analyzed: ka la sogs pa ni sde tshan //
translated: The group of ka and so on is the group.

original: lnga pa'i mtha' ma ni pa'i sde tshan no //
analyzed: lnga pa'i mtha' ma ni pa'i sde tshan no //
translated: The last of the fifth is the group of pa.

original: de'i mtha' ma'i mtha' can ni ma'i yi ge ste /
analyzed: de'i mtha' ma'i mtha' can ni ma'i yi ge ste /
translated: The last of the last is the letter ma.

original: de dang ldan pa ni klad kor dang bcas pa'o ;
analyzed: de dang ldan pa ni klad kor dang bcas pa'o ;
translated: Possessing that is the anusvƒÅra.

original: / de ltar na yi ge aom zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: / de ltar na yi ge aom zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, it becomes the letter o·πÉ.

original: sku yi sa bon btu bar bya //
analyzed: sku yi sa bon btu bar bya //
translated: The seed of the body is to be extracted.

original: zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi sa bon zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi sa bon zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This means the seed of Vairocana.

original: thog ma'i yi ge zhes bya ba ni a'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: thog ma'i yi ge zhes bya ba ni a'i yi ge'o //
translated: The first letter is the letter a.

original: nyis 'gyur zhes bya ba ni a'i yi ge gnyis pas bsgyur ba'o //
analyzed: nyis 'gyur zhes bya ba ni a'i yi ge gnyis pas bsgyur ba'o //
translated: The double means the change by the second a.

original: mnyam pa ni mtshungs pa pha rol du bya ste /
analyzed: mnyam pa ni mtshungs pa pha rol du bya ste /

original: aa yig dang po ni ring por 'gyur ro //
analyzed: aa yig dang po ni ring por 'gyur ro //
translated: The first letter a becomes long.

original: aa yig gnyis pa ni mi snang bar byas te /
analyzed: aa yig gnyis pa ni mi snang bar byas te /
translated: The second A is made invisible,

original: aa ring por 'gyur ro //üîΩaushm'a na yi cha dang ldan //
analyzed: aa ring por 'gyur ro // aushm'a na yi cha dang ldan //
translated: and becomes a long A.üîΩEndowed with the part of Ushma

original: zhes bya ba ni ha'i yi ge srog med pa dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ha'i yi ge srog med pa dang ldan pa'o //
translated: means endowed with the life-force of the letter Ha.üîΩThe mantra is made

original: sngags ba tu bya zhes bya ba ni de ltar na a'a zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sngags ba tu bya zhes bya ba ni de ltar na a'a zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: means that thus it becomes A.üîΩIncomparable

original: mtshungs pa med pa'i zhes bya ba ni tshig drag gnyis kyi gnas su dbyangs yig med pa'i yi ge ha dang ldan pa'i phyir sngags gzhan gyi mtshan nyid dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: mtshungs pa med pa'i zhes bya ba ni tshig drag gnyis kyi gnas su dbyangs yig med pa'i yi ge ha dang ldan pa'i phyir sngags gzhan gyi mtshan nyid dang bral ba'o //
translated: means that it is free from the characteristics of other mantras because it is endowed with the letter Ha, which is without vowel, in the place of the two strong syllables.üîΩThe Speech Vajra

analyzed: gsung gi rdo rje zhes bya ba ni snang ba mtha' yas kyi'o //
translated: means that of Amitabha.üîΩThe essence

original: snying po zhes bya ba ni de skyed par byed pa'i sa bon no //
analyzed: snying po zhes bya ba ni de skyed par byed pa'i sa bon no //
translated: means the seed that produces it.üîΩThe supreme

original: mchog ces bya ba ni ngag rnam par dag pa skyed par byed pa'o//
analyzed: mchog ces bya ba ni ngag rnam par dag pa skyed par byed pa'o//
translated: means that which produces the purification of speech.

original: @112a * // aushm'a na yi mtha' cha ldan //üîΩzhes bya ba la /
analyzed: @112a * // aushm'a na yi mtha' cha ldan // zhes bya ba la /
translated: Endowed with the part of the end of UshmaüîΩmeans

analyzed: aushm'a na ni ha yig ste //

original: de rnams ni sha sha sa ha ste zhes bya ba'i ming gis so //
analyzed: de rnams ni sha sha sa ha ste zhes bya ba'i ming gis so //
translated: Those are the names of the syllables sha, sha, sa, and ha.

original: cha dang ldan zhes bya ba ni steng du zla tshes kyi cha dang ldan par byas so //
analyzed: cha dang ldan zhes bya ba ni steng du zla tshes kyi cha dang ldan par byas so //
translated: Endowed with a part means that the crescent moon part is placed above.

original: dbyangs yig drug pas yang dag brgyan //
analyzed: dbyangs yig drug pas yang dag brgyan //
translated: Adorned with the sixth vowel means

original: zhes bya ba ni a'u yig gis 'og tu byas pas so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni a'u yig gis 'og tu byas pas so //
translated: that the letter au is placed below.

original: sde tshan mtha' ma'i mtha' mar bcas //
analyzed: sde tshan mtha' ma'i mtha' mar bcas //
translated: The last of the last group means

original: zhes bya ba ni ma'i yi ge klad kor dang bcas par ldan pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ma'i yi ge klad kor dang bcas par ldan pa'o //
translated: that the letter ma is endowed with a dot.

original: thugs kyi rdo rje go 'phang zhes bya ba ni mi bskyod pa'i sa bon no //
analyzed: thugs kyi rdo rje go 'phang zhes bya ba ni mi bskyod pa'i sa bon no //
translated: The state of the mind vajra means the seed syllable of Akshobhya.

original: gsal zhes bya ba ni cha lnga pa grags pas gsal ba'o //
analyzed: gsal zhes bya ba ni cha lnga pa grags pas gsal ba'o //
translated: Clear means that the fifth part is clear due to fame.

original: de ltar sngags btu ba'i ngo bo bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar sngags btu ba'i ngo bo bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught the nature of the mantra extraction,

original: de rnam par dag pa'i sgo nas de nyid kyi che ba'i bdag nyid bshad pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de rnam par dag pa'i sgo nas de nyid kyi che ba'i bdag nyid bshad pa'i phyir /
translated: in order to explain the greatness of that through its purity,

original: de nyid gsum zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de nyid gsum zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: the three realities are stated.

original: lus ngag yid gsum gyi de kho na nyid kyi ngo bo'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lus ngag yid gsum gyi de kho na nyid kyi ngo bo'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is the nature of the reality of body, speech, and mind.

original: rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig ces bya ba ni rdo rje gsum ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa rnams kyi dam tshig ni thugs bskul ba'i rgyur gyur pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig ces bya ba ni rdo rje gsum ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa rnams kyi dam tshig ni thugs bskul ba'i rgyur gyur pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The ‚Äúpledge of the three vajras‚Äù is the pledge of Vairochana, etc., because it is the cause of arousing the mind.

original: 'jig rten gsum yang 'grub par byed //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum yang 'grub par byed //
translated: ‚ÄúIt accomplishes the three worlds‚Äù

original: ces bya ba ni de skyed pa po nyid kyi phyir dang spro ba dang sdud par byed pa'i rim pas de sdud par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni de skyed pa po nyid kyi phyir dang spro ba dang sdud par byed pa'i rim pas de sdud par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is the producer of those, and because it gathers them by the process of emanating and gathering.

original: rnal 'byor pa'i zhes bya ba ni rim pa gnyis bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa'i zhes bya ba ni rim pa gnyis bsgom pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThe yogi/nƒ´‚Äù is one who meditates on the two stages.

original: de nyid mchog ces bya ba ni lus ngag yid gsum rnam par dag par byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid mchog ces bya ba ni lus ngag yid gsum rnam par dag par byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúThat is the supreme‚Äù because it purifies body, speech, and mind.

original: sngags btu ba ni zhes bya ba ni sngon du gsungs pa'i rigs pas so //
analyzed: sngags btu ba ni zhes bya ba ni sngon du gsungs pa'i rigs pas so //
translated: ‚ÄúThe mantra extraction‚Äù is by the previously explained method.

original: bla na med ces bya ba ni sdig pa thams cad zad par byed pa'i rgyur gyur pa'o //
analyzed: bla na med ces bya ba ni sdig pa thams cad zad par byed pa'i rgyur gyur pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúUnsurpassed‚Äù is the cause of the exhaustion of all sins.

original: dngos grub thams cad byed ces bya ba spel ba sngon du 'gro bas las tshogs thams cad sgrub par byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: dngos grub thams cad byed ces bya ba spel ba sngon du 'gro bas las tshogs thams cad sgrub par byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: All powers means that it accomplishes all the collections of activities by way of the preliminary enhancement.

original: de nyid ces bya ba ni yi ge'i ngo bo nyid kyis snang yang chos nyid kyi ngo bo yongs su mi 'dor ba nyid kyi phyir ro //üîΩsngags rnams kun gyi don bsdus pa //
analyzed: de nyid ces bya ba ni yi ge'i ngo bo nyid kyis snang yang chos nyid kyi ngo bo yongs su mi 'dor ba nyid kyi phyir ro // sngags rnams kun gyi don bsdus pa //
translated: The suchness is the appearance by way of the nature of the syllables, but it does not abandon the nature of reality.

original: zhes bya ba ni snying po dang / nye ba'i snying po dang / phreng ba dang gzugs sngags la sogs pa rnams kyi don ni gsang ba gsum gyi rang bzhin gyis sdud pa ni de'i rang bzhin te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni snying po dang / nye ba'i snying po dang / phreng ba dang gzugs sngags la sogs pa rnams kyi don ni gsang ba gsum gyi rang bzhin gyis sdud pa ni de'i rang bzhin te /
translated: The meaning of all mantras is the meaning of the essence mantras, the near essence mantras, the garland mantras, the form mantras, and so on, which are included by way of the nature of the three secrets.

original: yi ge gsum med par de rnams med pa'i phyir ro //üîΩsngags rnams kun gyi gnas yin no //
analyzed: yi ge gsum med par de rnams med pa'i phyir ro // sngags rnams kun gyi gnas yin no //
translated: The nature of that is the nature of those, because without the three syllables, they do not exist.

original: zhes bya ba ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi gnas ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi gnas ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: The basis of all mantras is the basis of all mantras, as before.

original: rgyu dang mi rgyu nyid bzhin zhes bya ba ni ji ltar rgyu ba'i bcud kyi sems can rnams dang / mi rgyu @112b pa'i snod kyi 'jig rten no //
analyzed: rgyu dang mi rgyu nyid bzhin zhes bya ba ni ji ltar rgyu ba'i bcud kyi sems can rnams dang / mi rgyu @112b pa'i snod kyi 'jig rten no //
translated: Like the moving and unmoving, means like the moving sentient beings who are the life-force, and the unmoving world of the vessel.

original: de bzhin du yi ge gsum ni sngags thams cad kyi rten du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du yi ge gsum ni sngags thams cad kyi rten du rig par bya'o //
translated: Thus, the three syllables should be known as the basis of all mantras.

original: dngos grub rnams kyi rnal 'byor mchog / ces bya ba ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sku'i dbang phyug la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
analyzed: dngos grub rnams kyi rnal 'byor mchog / ces bya ba ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sku'i dbang phyug la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
translated: The supreme yoga of all powers, means the nature of the lordship of the supramundane body, and so forth.

original: mchog ni mchog gi rnal 'byor te /
analyzed: mchog ni mchog gi rnal 'byor te /
translated: The supreme is the supreme yoga,

original: de'i bdag po nyid kyis de rnams 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i bdag po nyid kyis de rnams 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because they arise by the nature of its lordship.

original: rnal 'byor ye shes zhes bya ba ni de skyed par byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ye shes zhes bya ba ni de skyed par byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The knowledge of yoga is so called because it produces that.

original: bla na med ces bya ba ni gsang ba gsum gyi rang bzhin nyid kyis 'di gzhan gang na med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bla na med ces bya ba ni gsang ba gsum gyi rang bzhin nyid kyis 'di gzhan gang na med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Unsurpassed means that it is not found anywhere else, by the nature of the three secrets.

original: de ltar don rnam pa bzhis sngags btu ba so sor rgyas par bshad pa bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar don rnam pa bzhis sngags btu ba so sor rgyas par bshad pa bstan nas /
translated: Thus, having taught the extensive explanation of the individual picking of the mantra with four topics,üîΩnow, in order to teach the extensive explanation of the individual picking of the seed with four topics, he says:

original: da ni sngags bzlas pa'i phan yon brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni sngags bzlas pa'i phan yon brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to state the benefits of mantra recitation,

original: de'i yan lag mdor bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de'i yan lag mdor bstan pa ni /
translated: the branches of that are briefly indicated:

original: man ngag ji bzhin zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: man ngag ji bzhin zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: As it is taught, he who recites and so on.

original: gang zhes bya ba ni bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: gang zhes bya ba ni bsgom pa'o //
translated: The he refers to the meditator.

original: man ngag ji bzhin zhes bya ba ni ji ltar bla ma'i gdams ngag go //
analyzed: man ngag ji bzhin zhes bya ba ni ji ltar bla ma'i gdams ngag go //
translated: As it is taught means as it is taught by the guru's instructions.

original: zlos pa zhes bya ba ni sngon du btus pa'i sngags ni tshig gam yid kyis 'jug pa la sogs pa rnams la sbyar ba goms par byed pa ste /
analyzed: zlos pa zhes bya ba ni sngon du btus pa'i sngags ni tshig gam yid kyis 'jug pa la sogs pa rnams la sbyar ba goms par byed pa ste /
translated: Recites means that he who has previously collected the mantra, whether verbally or mentally, applies it and cultivates it.

original: de yi dngos grub rgya cher 'gro //
analyzed: de yi dngos grub rgya cher 'gro //
translated: His powers will increase greatly.

original: zhes bya ba dang 'brel to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba dang 'brel to //
translated: This is connected.

original: ci'i phyir zlos she na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zlos she na /
translated: Why does he recite?

original: de'i phyir dngos grub phyir ni zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir dngos grub phyir ni zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Therefore it is said, for the sake of powers.

original: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub kyi don du'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub kyi don du'o //
translated: For the sake of mundane and supramundane powers.

original: ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How?

original: de'i phyir lung bzhin gyis zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir lung bzhin gyis zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Therefore it is said, according to the scriptures.

original: ji ltar rgyud du bstan pa'i cho gas so //
analyzed: ji ltar rgyud du bstan pa'i cho gas so //
translated: According to the ritual taught in the tantras.

original: de'i zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor pa'i'o //
analyzed: de'i zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor pa'i'o //
translated: ‚ÄúHis‚Äù refers to the yogi.

original: rgya chen ni rgya che ba dang zab pa'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: rgya chen ni rgya che ba dang zab pa'i rang bzhin no //
translated: ‚ÄúVast‚Äù is the nature of vastness and profundity.

original: dngos grub ces bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyi mtshan nyid can no //
analyzed: dngos grub ces bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyi mtshan nyid can no //
translated: ‚ÄúAccomplishment‚Äù is characterized by Buddhahood.

original: 'gro zhes bya ba ni thob par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: 'gro zhes bya ba ni thob par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúWill go‚Äù means will attain.

original: tshe 'di nyid la zhes bya ba ni mthong ba'i chos nyid la'o //
analyzed: tshe 'di nyid la zhes bya ba ni mthong ba'i chos nyid la'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIn this very life‚Äù means in the very same life.

original: sngags shes pas zhes bya ba ni sngags kyi de kho na nyid la mkhas pa'o //
analyzed: sngags shes pas zhes bya ba ni sngags kyi de kho na nyid la mkhas pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThe knower of mantra‚Äù is skilled in the reality of mantra.

original: de ltar sngags bzlas pa la phan yon mdor bstan pa bshad nas /
analyzed: de ltar sngags bzlas pa la phan yon mdor bstan pa bshad nas /
translated: Having explained the benefits of mantra recitation in brief,

original: de rgyas par bshad pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de rgyas par bshad pa'i phyir /
translated: in order to explain that extensively,

original: ye shes chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te ;
analyzed: ye shes chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te ;
translated: he says ‚Äúgreat intuition‚Äù and so on.

original: de zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor pa'o //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúHis‚Äù refers to the yogi.

original: ye shes chen po zhes bshad pa'o zhes bya ba dang 'brel to //
analyzed: ye shes chen po zhes bshad pa'o zhes bya ba dang 'brel to //
translated: It is connected with ‚Äúis explained as.‚Äù

original: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes mngon du byed pas na ye shes chen po dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes mngon du byed pas na ye shes chen po dang ldan pa'o //
translated: Since he actualizes nondual intuition, he is endowed with great intuition.

original: sku gsung thugs kyi rnal 'byor skyes //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs kyi rnal 'byor skyes //
translated: The yoga of body, speech, and mind is born.

original: zhes bya ba ni rnam par ma dag ba'i lus ngag yid gsum bzlog nas @113a * //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rnam par ma dag ba'i lus ngag yid gsum bzlog nas @113a * //
translated: This is because, having turned away from the impure body, speech, and mind,

original: rnam par dag pa'i lus la sogs pa skyed par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par dag pa'i lus la sogs pa skyed par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: one generates the pure body, etc.

original: gang zhig ces bya ba ni rnal 'byor pa'o //
analyzed: gang zhig ces bya ba ni rnal 'byor pa'o //
translated: One who is the yogi.

original: sngags bzlas zhes bya ba ni yi ge gsum mo //
analyzed: sngags bzlas zhes bya ba ni yi ge gsum mo //
translated: Reciting the mantra is the three syllables.

original: mtshungs pa med ces bya ba ni rang gi ngo bo dang 'bras bu las thun mong ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: mtshungs pa med ces bya ba ni rang gi ngo bo dang 'bras bu las thun mong ma yin pa'o //
translated: Incomparable is not shared with others in terms of its nature and result.

original: 'dod pa kun la longs spyod ces bya ba ni 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la longs spyod par byed ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'dod pa kun la longs spyod ces bya ba ni 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la longs spyod par byed ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: Experiencing all desires means enjoying the five sense objects.

original: 'di tsam gyis rgyas par bshad pa bstan nas /
analyzed: 'di tsam gyis rgyas par bshad pa bstan nas /
translated: Having taught the extensive explanation with just this much,

original: so sor rgyas par bshad pa brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: so sor rgyas par bshad pa brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: in order to state the individual extensive explanations,

original: gang zhig ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: gang zhig ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: he says one who, etc.

original: gang zhig ni sgrub pa po'o //
analyzed: gang zhig ni sgrub pa po'o //
translated: One who is the practitioner.

original: rtag tu zhes bya ba ni dus thams cad du'o ;
analyzed: rtag tu zhes bya ba ni dus thams cad du'o ;
translated: Always is at all times.

original: / sngags zhes bya ba ni sngar bshad pa'i yi ge gsum mo //
analyzed: / sngags zhes bya ba ni sngar bshad pa'i yi ge gsum mo //
translated: Mantra is the three syllables explained previously.

original: 'chang zhes bya ba ni 'jog pa'am brjod pa'o //
analyzed: 'chang zhes bya ba ni 'jog pa'am brjod pa'o //
translated: The term holding means placing or expressing.

original: mgur bar zhes bya ba ni des mtshon pa'i kha la'o //
analyzed: mgur bar zhes bya ba ni des mtshon pa'i kha la'o //
translated: The term in the mouth means in the mouth indicated by that.

original: yang na mgrin pas nye bar mtshon pa'i me la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam pa la 'jug pa la sogs pa'i rim pas 'chang bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: yang na mgrin pas nye bar mtshon pa'i me la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam pa la 'jug pa la sogs pa'i rim pas 'chang bar byed pa'o //
translated: Or else, holding means engaging in the form of the ma·πá·∏çala of fire, etc., indicated by the throat, etc., in the sequence of inhalation, and so on.

original: de kho na nyid legs par shes //
analyzed: de kho na nyid legs par shes //
translated: One who knows reality well.

original: zhes bya ba ni mdzes pa'i de kho na nyid rig pas na de kho na nyid legs par shes pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni mdzes pa'i de kho na nyid rig pas na de kho na nyid legs par shes pa'o //
translated: The term one who knows reality well means one who knows the reality of beauty.

original: dbugs kyi 'khor lo nye bar mtshon pa nus pa 'am /
analyzed: dbugs kyi 'khor lo nye bar mtshon pa nus pa 'am /
translated: The power of the indication of the wheel of breath,

original: sngags kyi de kho na nyid yongs su shes pa'o //
analyzed: sngags kyi de kho na nyid yongs su shes pa'o //
translated: or the thorough knowledge of the reality of mantra.

original: rtog pa kun yang 'grub par byed //
analyzed: rtog pa kun yang 'grub par byed //
translated: All desires are accomplished.

original: ces bya ba ni rnal 'byor pa 'di la rtog pa thams cad ni zhi ba la sogs pa'i bya ba thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni rnal 'byor pa 'di la rtog pa thams cad ni zhi ba la sogs pa'i bya ba thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: The term all desires means all activities such as pacification, and so on.

original: dkyil 'khor kun du zhugs pa dang // zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor la gtso cher yi ge gsum gyi rim pas rdzogs pa'i phyir dang / thams cad du ni dam tshig shes //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor kun du zhugs pa dang // zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor la gtso cher yi ge gsum gyi rim pas rdzogs pa'i phyir dang / thams cad du ni dam tshig shes //
translated: And penetrating all mandalas means that the three syllables are the principal thing in the mandalas, because they are complete in the stages of the three syllables.

original: zhes bya ba ni rgyud sde rnam pa lnga la yang 'os pa'i brda yongs su shes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rgyud sde rnam pa lnga la yang 'os pa'i brda yongs su shes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And knowing all pledges means that one knows the proper symbolic gestures in all five classes of tantra.

original: 'jig rten gsum po sgrub ces bya ba ni 'jig rten gsum gyi zhi ba la sogs pa thams cad sgrub par byed pa'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum po sgrub ces bya ba ni 'jig rten gsum gyi zhi ba la sogs pa thams cad sgrub par byed pa'o //
translated: And accomplishing the three worlds means that one accomplishes all the pacifying and so forth of the three worlds.

original: blo bzang zhes bya ba ni sngags kyi de kho na nyid yongs su shes pas mdzes pa'i blo gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: blo bzang zhes bya ba ni sngags kyi de kho na nyid yongs su shes pas mdzes pa'i blo gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: And having a good mind means that one has a beautiful mind, because one knows the reality of mantra.

original: rnal 'byong chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i rgya cher 'grel pa /
analyzed: rnal 'byong chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i rgya cher 'grel pa /
translated: The glorious Vajra Garland Tantra

original: pandi ta aa langka ka la shas mdzad pa /
analyzed: pandi ta aa langka ka la shas mdzad pa /
translated: is composed by the pa·πá·∏çita Ala·πÉkakala≈õa.

original: zab mo'i don shin tu gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba las le'u bco lnga pa'i rgya cher bshad pa'o /
analyzed: zab mo'i don shin tu gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba las le'u bco lnga pa'i rgya cher bshad pa'o /
translated: This is the commentary on the fifteenth chapter from Illuminating the Meaning,üîΩthe commentary on the glorious Vajra Garland Tantra.

original: // / de ltar le'u bco lnga pas sngags kyi de kho na nyid kyi yul la dri ba'i lan btab pa bstan nas /
analyzed: // / de ltar le'u bco lnga pas sngags kyi de kho na nyid kyi yul la dri ba'i lan btab pa bstan nas /
translated: Thus, having taught the reply to the question about the domain of the reality of mantra in the fifteenth chapter,

original: da ni @113b rlung gi grangs kyi rim pa dang gnas bstan pa dri ba'i lan brjod par 'dod nas le'u bcu drug pa ston par byed cing /
analyzed: da ni @113b rlung gi grangs kyi rim pa dang gnas bstan pa dri ba'i lan brjod par 'dod nas le'u bcu drug pa ston par byed cing /
translated: now, desiring to state the reply to the question about the teaching of the stages of the number and locations of the winds, he teaches the sixteenth chapter.

original: dang por re zhig de rtsom pa ni /
analyzed: dang por re zhig de rtsom pa ni /
translated: First, he composes it:

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Then, etc.

original: le'u bco lnga pa bshad pa'i rjes la'o //
analyzed: le'u bco lnga pa bshad pa'i rjes la'o //
translated: After the explanation of the fifteenth chapter.üîΩMoreover, etc.

original: gzhan yang zhes bya ba ni snga ma la ltos nas khyad par can nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan yang zhes bya ba ni snga ma la ltos nas khyad par can nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: is because of the distinction in relation to the former.üîΩListen, etc.

original: nyon zhes bya ba ni phyag na rdo rje nyan pa la sbyar ba'o //
analyzed: nyon zhes bya ba ni phyag na rdo rje nyan pa la sbyar ba'o //
translated: is to apply VajrapƒÅ·πái to listening.üîΩThe stages of the number, etc.

original: grangs kyi rim pa zhes bya ba ni rlung rnams la 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rigs pas bshad par bya zhes bya ba dang 'brel to //
analyzed: grangs kyi rim pa zhes bya ba ni rlung rnams la 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rigs pas bshad par bya zhes bya ba dang 'brel to //
translated: is to be connected with the winds, which are to be explained by the reasoning that will be explained.üîΩUnsurpassed, etc.

original: bla na med ces bya ba ni 'di las gong na med pas na bla na med pa'o //
analyzed: bla na med ces bya ba ni 'di las gong na med pas na bla na med pa'o //
translated: is because there is nothing higher than this.

original: de yang rags pa'i grangs nas brtsams te /
analyzed: de yang rags pa'i grangs nas brtsams te /
translated: Moreover, it is the enumeration of the gross,

original: shin tu phra ba'i grangs mtshon par byed pas so //
analyzed: shin tu phra ba'i grangs mtshon par byed pas so //
translated: and it is the illustration of the enumeration of the subtle.

original: ji ltar gnas pa'i zhes bya ba ni 'chad bzhin pa'i rim pas srog bskyed pa la rten nas so //
analyzed: ji ltar gnas pa'i zhes bya ba ni 'chad bzhin pa'i rim pas srog bskyed pa la rten nas so //
translated: As to in accordance with the location, it is in accordance with the sequence that is being explained, and it is based on the generation of life.

original: ji skad du 'chad par 'gyur ba las /
analyzed: ji skad du 'chad par 'gyur ba las /
translated: As will be explained:

original: bshang lam gsang ba'i bar gnas zhes bya ba gsungs so //
analyzed: bshang lam gsang ba'i bar gnas zhes bya ba gsungs so //
translated: The location is from the anus to the secret place.

original: rlung rnams kyi zhes bya ba ni srog la sogs pa rnams la'o //
analyzed: rlung rnams kyi zhes bya ba ni srog la sogs pa rnams la'o //
translated: As to of the winds, it is of the life-force and so forth.

original: ji lta ba bzhin du zhes bya ba ni phyin ci ma log pa'i ngo bos so //üîΩsngon gyi rim pas go rims su //
analyzed: ji lta ba bzhin du zhes bya ba ni phyin ci ma log pa'i ngo bos so // sngon gyi rim pas go rims su //
translated: As to in accordance with, it is in accordance with the unmistaken nature.üîΩ As to in the sequence of the former,

original: zhes bya ba'i don to //üîΩde ltar de rtsom pa'i rang gi ngo bo bstan nas dgos pa brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i don to // de ltar de rtsom pa'i rang gi ngo bo bstan nas dgos pa brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: it is in the sequence of the former.

original: gang gis thob pa zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: gang gis thob pa zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Thus, having taught the nature of the composition, in order to explain the purpose, it says, By whom the attainment...

original: rlung gi mtshan nyid yongs su shes par gyur pas so //
analyzed: rlung gi mtshan nyid yongs su shes par gyur pas so //
translated: It is by thoroughly knowing the characteristics of the winds.

original: srog ni thob par byed ces bya ba dang 'brel to //
analyzed: srog ni thob par byed ces bya ba dang 'brel to //
translated: It is connected with attains the life-force.

original: srog ni rdul phra rab rang gi ngo bo'o //
analyzed: srog ni rdul phra rab rang gi ngo bo'o //
translated: Life is the essence of the subtle atom.

original: skal ba bzang zhes bya ba ni mngon par zhen pa thams cad bzlog nas stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: skal ba bzang zhes bya ba ni mngon par zhen pa thams cad bzlog nas stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Good fortune means the essence of emptiness, having turned away from all clinging.

original: thams cad bdag nyid gnas zhes bya ba ni lus phung po lnga'i rang bzhin la khyad par byed pa nyid kyis rnam par gnas pa'o //üîΩgang gis yang dag yongs su shes //
analyzed: thams cad bdag nyid gnas zhes bya ba ni lus phung po lnga'i rang bzhin la khyad par byed pa nyid kyis rnam par gnas pa'o // gang gis yang dag yongs su shes //
translated: The self-abiding of all means that the body, which is the nature of the five aggregates, is present as the very nature of the deity.üîΩBy what is it known?

original: zhes bya ba ni rlung gang la phra mo'i ngo bo yongs su shes pas so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rlung gang la phra mo'i ngo bo yongs su shes pas so //
translated: By the knowledge of the subtle essence means by the knowledge of the subtle nature of the vƒÅyu.

original: rnal 'byor mchog ni zhes bya ba ni srog stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor mchog ni zhes bya ba ni srog stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa'o //
translated: The supreme yoga is the life vƒÅyu in the aspect of emptiness.

original: thob par byed ces bya ba ni thob par byed pa'o //üîΩyang dag ces bya ba ni rigs pa'i cha'i spyod pa las brtsams nas /
analyzed: thob par byed ces bya ba ni thob par byed pa'o // yang dag ces bya ba ni rigs pa'i cha'i spyod pa las brtsams nas /

original: shin tu mtshon par dka' ba'i dus kyi cha'i ngo bos phyin ci ma log pa'o //
analyzed: shin tu mtshon par dka' ba'i dus kyi cha'i ngo bos phyin ci ma log pa'o //
translated: The correct means that, beginning with the conduct of the part of reasoning, it is unmistaken by means of the essence of the part of time, which is very difficult to illustrate.

original: de ltar rnams pa gnyis kyis de brtsams pa bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar rnams pa gnyis kyis de brtsams pa bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught the composition of that [tantra] in two parts,

original: dngos su de bstan pa bshad pa'i phyir /
analyzed: dngos su de bstan pa bshad pa'i phyir /
translated: in order to explain the actual teaching of that [tantra],

original: de'i yan lag rlung gi bla na med pa'i mtshan nyid brjod pa'i @114a * //
analyzed: de'i yan lag rlung gi bla na med pa'i mtshan nyid brjod pa'i @114a * //
translated: the characteristics of the supreme wind, which is a branch of that [tantra], are stated.

original: yan lag rlung gi mtshan nyid yongs su mi shes pa'i nyes dmigs ni /
analyzed: yan lag rlung gi mtshan nyid yongs su mi shes pa'i nyes dmigs ni /
translated: The disadvantage of not fully understanding the characteristics of the winds is stated:

original: rlung gi mtshan nyid mi shes phyir //
analyzed: rlung gi mtshan nyid mi shes phyir //
translated: Because the characteristics of the winds are not understood,

original: zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes gsungs te /
translated: it is said.

original: phra mo'i rang bzhin 'chad par 'gyur ba rlung gi mtshan nyid yongs su ma shes na /
analyzed: phra mo'i rang bzhin 'chad par 'gyur ba rlung gi mtshan nyid yongs su ma shes na /
translated: If the characteristics of the winds, which will be explained as having a subtle nature, are not fully understood,

original: 'jig rten gsum ni rnam par 'khor //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum ni rnam par 'khor //
translated: the three worlds revolve.

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te ;
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te ;
translated: It is said.

original: 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa'i mtshan nyid can 'gro ba gzhan dang gzhan du skye bar 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa'i mtshan nyid can 'gro ba gzhan dang gzhan du skye bar 'gyur ba'o //
translated: [One] will be born again and again in other migrations, characterized by the desire, form, and formless [realms].

original: goms pa thob pa de yang ni //
analyzed: goms pa thob pa de yang ni //
translated: And that attainment of familiarityüîΩis said.

original: zhes bya ba ni rlung gi rang bzhin mtshon par byed pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rlung gi rang bzhin mtshon par byed pa'o //
translated: It is the characteristic of the winds.

original: goms pa zhes bya ba ni yang dang yang du mngon du phyogs par byas pas so //
analyzed: goms pa zhes bya ba ni yang dang yang du mngon du phyogs par byas pas so //
translated: Familiarity is [attained] by repeatedly turning towards [the winds].

original: thob pa zhes bya ba ni rnyed pa'o //
analyzed: thob pa zhes bya ba ni rnyed pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúObtainment‚Äù means acquisition.

original: de yang bla ma'i kha las zhes bya ba ni bla ma ni rdo rje slob dpon no //üîΩde'i sbyor ba shes pa'i kha las so //
analyzed: de yang bla ma'i kha las zhes bya ba ni bla ma ni rdo rje slob dpon no // de'i sbyor ba shes pa'i kha las so //
translated: Moreover, ‚Äúfrom the mouth of the guru‚Äù means that the guru is the vajra master.

original: rlung de'i mtshan nyid nye bar mtshon pa la sbyor ba ni de'i sbyor ba'o /
analyzed: rlung de'i mtshan nyid nye bar mtshon pa la sbyor ba ni de'i sbyor ba'o /
translated: The mouth of one who knows the yoga of that is the mouth of one who knows the yoga of that.

original: de shes pas na de'i sbyor ba shes pa'o //
analyzed: de shes pas na de'i sbyor ba shes pa'o //
translated: One who knows that is one who knows the yoga of that.

original: de'i sbyor ba shes pa'i kha ni de'i sbyor ba shes pa'i kha ste de las so //
analyzed: de'i sbyor ba shes pa'i kha ni de'i sbyor ba shes pa'i kha ste de las so //
translated: The mouth of one who knows the yoga of that is the mouth of one who knows the yoga of that.

original: de ltar rlung gi mtshan nyid yongs su ma shes pa'i nyes dmigs bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar rlung gi mtshan nyid yongs su ma shes pa'i nyes dmigs bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught the disadvantages of not knowing the characteristics of the winds,

original: de'i mtshan nyid bshad par dam bca' ba brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de'i mtshan nyid bshad par dam bca' ba brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: in order to state the promise to explain their characteristics,

original: rlung gi mtshan nyid ji bzhin du //
analyzed: rlung gi mtshan nyid ji bzhin du //
translated: he says, ‚ÄúThe characteristics of the winds, just as they are,

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: are taught in the tantras.üîΩ‚Äù

original: srog gi rang bzhin gyi rlung gi'o //
analyzed: srog gi rang bzhin gyi rlung gi'o //
translated: The characteristics of the life-force wind.

original: mtshan nyid ces bya ba ni rang gi ngo bos mtshan pa'o //
analyzed: mtshan nyid ces bya ba ni rang gi ngo bos mtshan pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúCharacteristics‚Äù means that which is characterized by its own nature.

original: ji srid du /
analyzed: ji srid du /
translated: ‚ÄúJust as they are‚Äù means

original: lo tshigs kyi zhes bya ba ni phyi'i dus kyis bsdus pa'i lo tshigs kyi mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: lo tshigs kyi zhes bya ba ni phyi'i dus kyis bsdus pa'i lo tshigs kyi mtshan nyid do //
translated: The characteristic of the year is the time period of the external year.

original: bshad par bya zhes bya ba ni brjod par bya ba'o //
analyzed: bshad par bya zhes bya ba ni brjod par bya ba'o //
translated: It should be explained means it should be described.

original: mdor bsdus nas ni zhes bya ba ni mdor bsdus pas so //
analyzed: mdor bsdus nas ni zhes bya ba ni mdor bsdus pas so //
translated: In brief means in summary.

original: sprin gyi dbal zhes bya ba ni dang po'i sangs rgyas rdo rje phreng ba'i rgyud chen por ji ltar rgya cher bshad pas de'i rjes su 'brangs pa nyid kyi sa 'dir ni bsdus nas bshad par bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: sprin gyi dbal zhes bya ba ni dang po'i sangs rgyas rdo rje phreng ba'i rgyud chen por ji ltar rgya cher bshad pas de'i rjes su 'brangs pa nyid kyi sa 'dir ni bsdus nas bshad par bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The Cloud's Banner is the Great Tantra of the Original Buddha Vajra Garland, since it is explained there in detail, it is said here, following that, it should be explained in brief.

original: de ltar mtshan nyid bshad par dam bca' ba bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar mtshan nyid bshad par dam bca' ba bstan nas /
translated: Having thus presented the promise to explain the characteristics,

original: dngos su de'i bshad pa ni dus ni drug ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: dngos su de'i bshad pa ni dus ni drug ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: the actual explanation of that is stated with the time is six, and so on.

original: dpyid dang / sos ka dang / dbyar ga dab ston dang / dgun stod dang / dgun smad kyi dbye bas so //
analyzed: dpyid dang / sos ka dang / dbyar ga dab ston dang / dgun stod dang / dgun smad kyi dbye bas so //
translated: Spring, summer, autumn, winter, the beginning of winter, and the end of winter are the divisions.

original: mdor bsdus nas ni zhes bya ba ni mdor bsdus pas so //
analyzed: mdor bsdus nas ni zhes bya ba ni mdor bsdus pas so //
translated: In brief means in summary.

original: lo tshigs zhes bya ba ni lo'o //
analyzed: lo tshigs zhes bya ba ni lo'o //

original: yongs su grags zhes bya ba ni brjod pa'o //
analyzed: yongs su grags zhes bya ba ni brjod pa'o //
translated: The term well known means that it is commonly accepted.

original: gal te de ltar yin na dus drug gis lor brjod pa yin na /
analyzed: gal te de ltar yin na dus drug gis lor brjod pa yin na /
translated: If that is so, then the year is described in terms of six times.

original: 'on dus ji lta bu yin @114b zhe na ;
analyzed: 'on dus ji lta bu yin @114b zhe na ;
translated: But what is a time?

original: de yi sbyor ba gnyis ni dus yin te //üîΩzhes bya ba gsungs te /üîΩnyi ma'i khyim gnyis la longs spyod pa'i mchan nyid can gyi zla ba gnyis kyi dus so //
analyzed: de yi sbyor ba gnyis ni dus yin te // zhes bya ba gsungs te / nyi ma'i khyim gnyis la longs spyod pa'i mchan nyid can gyi zla ba gnyis kyi dus so //
translated: A time is the conjunction of two of them.üîΩThe two times are the conjunction of two of the twelve houses of the sun, which are the periods of the two lunar months that have thirty days each.

original: dus gnyis bshad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dus gnyis bshad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The two times are explained as being the two periods of the sun's movement to the north and to the south.

original: dus de nyid zhag drug cu'o zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: dus de nyid zhag drug cu'o zhes gsungs te /
translated: That very time is sixty days.

original: nyin zhag drug cu ni dus zhes brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: nyin zhag drug cu ni dus zhes brjod par bya'o //
translated: Sixty days and nights are to be called a time.

original: gal te de ltar yin na nyin zhag gi tshad ji tsam du 'gyur zhe na /üîΩde'i phyir / nyin dang mtshan du nges pa la //
