analyzed: gal te de ltar yin na nyin zhag gi tshad ji tsam du 'gyur zhe na / de'i phyir / nyin dang mtshan du nges pa la //
translated: If that is so, then what is the measure of a day and night?

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Therefore it is said:üîΩIn the determination of day and night,

original: phal che ba'i dgongs pas mtshan mo dang nyin mo'i dbye bas nyin zhag ces bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ba'o //
analyzed: phal che ba'i dgongs pas mtshan mo dang nyin mo'i dbye bas nyin zhag ces bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ba'o //
translated: The measure of a day and night is the period in which the sun moves fifty yojanas.

original: nges pa la zhes bya ba ni dbyu gu drug cu'i dgongs pas zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: nges pa la zhes bya ba ni dbyu gu drug cu'i dgongs pas zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The term determined means that the day and night are calculated by sixty dhanus.üîΩHow long is a day and night?

original: nyin mtshan gyi tshad ji tsam zhen de'i phyir /
analyzed: nyin mtshan gyi tshad ji tsam zhen de'i phyir /
translated: Therefore, it is said:

original: nyin mtshan dbyu gu drug cu'o //üîΩzhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: nyin mtshan dbyu gu drug cu'o // zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Day and night are sixty dhanus.

original: phyi rol du zla ba dang nyi ma'i rgyu ba brjod par 'dod pas /
analyzed: phyi rol du zla ba dang nyi ma'i rgyu ba brjod par 'dod pas /
translated: Since the movement of the sun and moon is to be described externally,

original: phal cher ni dbyu gu drug cus nyin mtshan gyi grangs so //
analyzed: phal cher ni dbyu gu drug cus nyin mtshan gyi grangs so //
translated: the number of days and nights is generally calculated by sixty dhanus.

original: 'od gsal gyi skad cig gi mtshan nyid kyis chu tshod bzhi'i grangs la mi ltos pas so //
analyzed: 'od gsal gyi skad cig gi mtshan nyid kyis chu tshod bzhi'i grangs la mi ltos pas so //
translated: This is because it does not depend on the number of four hours, which is characterized by the moment of clear light.

original: de ltar na nyin mo chu tshod sum cu tham pa dang / mtshan mo yang de ltar ro //
analyzed: de ltar na nyin mo chu tshod sum cu tham pa dang / mtshan mo yang de ltar ro //
translated: Thus, there are thirty hours in the day and thirty in the night.

original: 'o na chu tshod kyi grangs ji lta bu zhe na /üîΩde'i phyir / chu tshod rtsa sha ka zhes grags //
analyzed: 'o na chu tshod kyi grangs ji lta bu zhe na / de'i phyir / chu tshod rtsa sha ka zhes grags //
translated: Well then, what is the number of hours?üîΩTherefore, it is said:

original: zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes gsungs te /
translated: The hour is known as a ≈õƒÅka.

original: re zhig phyi rol du ni chu srang drug cu la chu tshod kyi tshad de /
analyzed: re zhig phyi rol du ni chu srang drug cu la chu tshod kyi tshad de /
translated: Externally, the measure of an hour is sixty palas.

original: tsa sha ka zhes bya ba ni ming gi rnam grangs so //
analyzed: tsa sha ka zhes bya ba ni ming gi rnam grangs so //
translated: The term ≈õƒÅka is a synonym.

original: tsa sha ka'i tshad kyang ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: tsa sha ka'i tshad kyang ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is the measure of a cƒÅ·π£a?üîΩTherefore it is said:

original: de'i phyir / 'byung dang rngub pa'i dus drug la //
analyzed: de'i phyir / 'byung dang rngub pa'i dus drug la //
translated: The six times of exhalation and inhalation

original: tsa sha zhes ni rab tu grags //üîΩzhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: tsa sha zhes ni rab tu grags // zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: are well known as a cƒÅ·π£a.

original: dbugs 'byung ba dang rngub pa drug gi tsa sha zhes rab tu grags pa ni brjod pa'o //
analyzed: dbugs 'byung ba dang rngub pa drug gi tsa sha zhes rab tu grags pa ni brjod pa'o //
translated: The six times of exhalation and inhalation are well known as a cƒÅ·π£a.

original: skad cig ma drug la ni dbugs zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: skad cig ma drug la ni dbugs zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Six moments are one breath.

original: dbugs 'byung ba dang / rngub pa'i grangs kyi skad cig ma drug la'o //üîΩde nyid se gol gtogs pa'i tshad //
analyzed: dbugs 'byung ba dang / rngub pa'i grangs kyi skad cig ma drug la'o // de nyid se gol gtogs pa'i tshad //
translated: Six moments of the number of exhalations and inhalations is one breath.üîΩThat is the measure of a finger snap.

original: ces bya ba ni skad cig ma'i tshad ni se gol gtogs pa tsam mo //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni skad cig ma'i tshad ni se gol gtogs pa tsam mo //
translated: The measure of a moment is the time of a finger snap.

original: se gol gtogs pa'i tshad ji tsam zhe na /üîΩde'i phyir / thang cig gsum la skad cig go //
analyzed: se gol gtogs pa'i tshad ji tsam zhe na / de'i phyir / thang cig gsum la skad cig go //
translated: What is the measure of a finger snap?

original: zhes gsungs te /üîΩthang cig gsum gyi tshad ni skad cig ma'i tshad do //
analyzed: zhes gsungs te / thang cig gsum gyi tshad ni skad cig ma'i tshad do //
translated: Therefore it is said:üîΩThree lava is one muh≈´rta.

original: de yang yungs kar bskor ba tsam //
analyzed: de yang yungs kar bskor ba tsam //
translated: The measure of three lava is one muh≈´rta.üîΩThat is the time of turning mustard seeds.

original: zhes bya ba ni thang cig gi tshad ni yungs kar gyi 'bru la lag pa'i mthil lan cig bskor ba tsam mo //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni thang cig gi tshad ni yungs kar gyi 'bru la lag pa'i mthil lan cig bskor ba tsam mo //
translated: One moment is the time for the mustard seed to be touched by the finger once.

original: dbugs gsum la ni thang cig brjod //üîΩces bya ba ni nang du 'jug pa dang / gnas pa dang 'byung ba'i ngo bo dbugs @115a * //
analyzed: dbugs gsum la ni thang cig brjod // ces bya ba ni nang du 'jug pa dang / gnas pa dang 'byung ba'i ngo bo dbugs @115a * //
translated: Three breaths are called one moment.

original: gsum gyis thang cig ces brjod do //
analyzed: gsum gyis thang cig ces brjod do //
translated: Three breaths, which are of the nature of inhalation, abiding, and exhalation, are called one moment.üîΩThat is called one instant.

original: de ni yud tsam mo zhes bya ba ni dbugs kyi tshad ni yud tsam zhes brjod do //üîΩthang cig gsum la mig 'dzums te //üîΩzhes bya ba ni gcig gi ngo bo'i dbugs kyi rang bzhin gyi yud tsam gsum gyis ni mig 'dzums pa'o //
analyzed: de ni yud tsam mo zhes bya ba ni dbugs kyi tshad ni yud tsam zhes brjod do // thang cig gsum la mig 'dzums te // zhes bya ba ni gcig gi ngo bo'i dbugs kyi rang bzhin gyi yud tsam gsum gyis ni mig 'dzums pa'o //
translated: That is called one instant.üîΩThree moments are called one eye-blink.

original: de yang mig ni 'dzums pa tsam //üîΩzhes bya ba ni de yang zhes bya ba ni mig btsums pa'o //
analyzed: de yang mig ni 'dzums pa tsam // zhes bya ba ni de yang zhes bya ba ni mig btsums pa'o //
translated: Three instants, which are of the nature of one breath, are called one eye-blink.üîΩThat is called one eye-blink.

original: mig 'dzums pa zhes bya ba ni mig btsums pa tsam gyi tshad do //
analyzed: mig 'dzums pa zhes bya ba ni mig btsums pa tsam gyi tshad do //
translated: That is called one eye-blink.

original: gal te de ltar yin na /
analyzed: gal te de ltar yin na /
translated: If that is so,

original: mig btsums pa'i tshad ni ji tsam zhe na /
analyzed: mig btsums pa'i tshad ni ji tsam zhe na /
translated: what is the measure of one eye-blink?

original: de'i phyir / tsam gsum la ni mig btsums te //
analyzed: de'i phyir / tsam gsum la ni mig btsums te //
translated: Therefore, he says:

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te ;
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te ;
translated: The three ‚Äújusts‚Äù are closed eyes.

original: tsam yang tshad ji tsam snyam du mi shes na /üîΩde'i phyir / tsam ni thal mo brdabs pa'o //
analyzed: tsam yang tshad ji tsam snyam du mi shes na / de'i phyir / tsam ni thal mo brdabs pa'o //
translated: If one does not know the measure of ‚Äújust,‚ÄùüîΩtherefore he says:

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: ‚ÄúJust‚Äù is the clapping of the hands.

original: lag pa gcig gis lag pa gzhan la brdabs pa tsam zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: lag pa gcig gis lag pa gzhan la brdabs pa tsam zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is ‚Äújust like the clapping of the hands with one hand.‚Äù

original: nang du ni tsam po ji tsam du zhe na /üîΩde'i phyir / bde ba 'char ba gsum la tsam //
analyzed: nang du ni tsam po ji tsam du zhe na / de'i phyir / bde ba 'char ba gsum la tsam //
translated: If one asks, ‚ÄúWhat is the measure of ‚Äòjust‚Äô on the inside?‚ÄùüîΩtherefore he says:

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: ‚ÄúJust‚Äù is the arising of bliss in three.

original: rnam pa gsum gyi bde ba'i gnas skabs la tsam por 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnam pa gsum gyi bde ba'i gnas skabs la tsam por 'gyur ro //
translated: The state of bliss in three aspects is ‚Äújust.‚Äù

original: gal te de ltar yin na /
analyzed: gal te de ltar yin na /
translated: If that is so,

original: bde ba 'char ba gsum gyi tshad ji tsam yin zhe na /üîΩde'i phyir / de ni thig le 'pho ba'o //
analyzed: bde ba 'char ba gsum gyi tshad ji tsam yin zhe na / de'i phyir / de ni thig le 'pho ba'o //
translated: what is the measure of the arising of bliss in three?üîΩtherefore he says:

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: That is the transference of the drop.

original: mchog gi rnal 'byor ma dang yang dag par sbyor ba las thig le ni kun rdzob pa ste /
analyzed: mchog gi rnal 'byor ma dang yang dag par sbyor ba las thig le ni kun rdzob pa ste /
translated: The relative drop is from the union with the supreme yoginƒ´.

original: lan gsum du 'pho ba de ni bde bar brjod do //
analyzed: lan gsum du 'pho ba de ni bde bar brjod do //
translated: The transference of that three times is said to be bliss.

original: gal te de ltar yin na /
analyzed: gal te de ltar yin na /
translated: If that is so,

original: bde ba 'char ba'i tshad ji tsam yin zhe na /üîΩde'i phyir / sngags pa gsum la bde bar bshad //
analyzed: bde ba 'char ba'i tshad ji tsam yin zhe na / de'i phyir / sngags pa gsum la bde bar bshad //
translated: what is the measure of the arising of pleasure?üîΩTherefore it is said:

original: ces gsungs te /
analyzed: ces gsungs te /
translated: Pleasure is explained for the three mantra practitioners.

original: 'jig pa skye ba'i gnas gsum la bde bar bshad pa'o //
analyzed: 'jig pa skye ba'i gnas gsum la bde bar bshad pa'o //
translated: It is explained as pleasure for the three abodes of the arising of destruction.

original: sngar ma byung ba'i dngos po nyams su myong bas sngags pa dang bde ba dag 'dra ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sngar ma byung ba'i dngos po nyams su myong bas sngags pa dang bde ba dag 'dra ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because mantra practitioners and pleasure are similar, since a previously non-existent entity is experienced.

original: 'di ni g-yang sa 'jigs par brjod //
analyzed: 'di ni g-yang sa 'jigs par brjod //
translated: This is said to be the fear of an abyss.

original: ces bya ba ni sngags pa rang gi ngo bo ni g-yang sa 'jigs pa'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni sngags pa rang gi ngo bo ni g-yang sa 'jigs pa'o //
translated: The nature of the mantra practitioner is the fear of an abyss.

original: ri'i rtse mo la sogs pa las ltung ba las dogs pa skad cig ma'i ngo bo'o //
analyzed: ri'i rtse mo la sogs pa las ltung ba las dogs pa skad cig ma'i ngo bo'o //
translated: The nature of an instant is the fear of falling from the peak of a mountain, etc.

original: gal te de ltar yin na /
analyzed: gal te de ltar yin na /
translated: If that is so,

original: 'jigs pa ji lta bu'i ngo bo zhe na /
analyzed: 'jigs pa ji lta bu'i ngo bo zhe na /
translated: what is the nature of the fear?üîΩTherefore it is said:

original: de'i phyir / dus gsum la ni 'jigs par bshad //üîΩces gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir / dus gsum la ni 'jigs par bshad // ces gsungs te /
translated: Fear is explained for the three times.

original: 'das pa la sogs pa'i dus gsum gyis te /
analyzed: 'das pa la sogs pa'i dus gsum gyis te /
translated: It is for the three times such as the past, etc.

original: de las ma rdzogs pa de mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de las ma rdzogs pa de mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because that which is not completed is not observed.

original: phra ba ni skad cig mtshan nyid ces bya ba ni shin tu thung ba'i dus kyi cha'i rang @115b bzhin rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis reg par bya bas so so'i skye bo'i yul ma yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: phra ba ni skad cig mtshan nyid ces bya ba ni shin tu thung ba'i dus kyi cha'i rang @115b bzhin rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis reg par bya bas so so'i skye bo'i yul ma yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Subtle is called ‚Äúmomentary characteristic‚Äù because it is the nature of a very short time period, which is to be touched by yogis. It is not the object of ordinary beings.

original: dus gsum gyi ngo bo yang ji lta bu yin zhe na /
analyzed: dus gsum gyi ngo bo yang ji lta bu yin zhe na /
translated: What is the nature of the three times?

original: de'i phyir 'das pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'das pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, it is said ‚Äúpast‚Äù and so on.

original: bya ba rdzogs pa ni 'das pa'o //
analyzed: bya ba rdzogs pa ni 'das pa'o //
translated: The completed action is past.

original: da ltar dang zhes bya ba ni brtsams pa ma rdzogs pa'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: da ltar dang zhes bya ba ni brtsams pa ma rdzogs pa'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: ‚Äú Present‚Äù is the characteristic of the action that has begun but not finished.

original: ma 'ongs pa yi mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa yi mtshan nyid do //
translated: ‚Äú Future‚Äù is the characteristic of the action that has not yet begun.

original: zhes bya ba ni bya ba yang dag par ma thob pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bya ba yang dag par ma thob pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is called ‚Äúthe action that has not yet been obtained.‚Äù

original: gal te de ltar yin na /
analyzed: gal te de ltar yin na /
translated: If that is so,

original: 'das pa la yang rnam par gzhag pa ji lta bu yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'das pa la yang rnam par gzhag pa ji lta bu yin zhe na /
translated: how is the past also established?

original: de'i phyir / 'das pa'i mtshan nyid gsum du gsungs //
analyzed: de'i phyir / 'das pa'i mtshan nyid gsum du gsungs //
translated: Therefore, it is said ‚ÄúThe three characteristics of the past are taught.‚Äù

original: zhes bya ba ni 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i chas brtags pas so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i chas brtags pas so //
translated: This is because it is investigated in terms of the past, future, and present aspects.

original: de ltar yang ni skad cig gsum //
analyzed: de ltar yang ni skad cig gsum //
translated: And in the same way, it is said to be momentary.

original: zhes bya ba ni de bzhin du zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni de bzhin du zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning of ‚Äúin the same way.‚Äù

original: ma 'ongs skad cig gsum du bshad //
analyzed: ma 'ongs skad cig gsum du bshad //
translated: The future is explained as being momentary.

original: ces bya ba ni sngar bshad pa bzhin no //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni sngar bshad pa bzhin no //
translated: This is as previously explained.üîΩThen again, after that,

original: de nas slar yang zhes bya ba ni de'i rjes la'o //üîΩde ltar skad cig gsum gyi cha //
analyzed: de nas slar yang zhes bya ba ni de'i rjes la'o // de ltar skad cig gsum gyi cha //
translated: it is said to be momentary.

original: zhes bya ba ni re re la yang cha gsum du brtags pas so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni re re la yang cha gsum du brtags pas so //
translated: This is because each is investigated in terms of three aspects.üîΩTherein, the three aspects are the three aspects of the present.

original: de la cha gsum zhes bya ba ni da ltar ba'i cha gsum yang sngon bzhin du gsum du byas nas /
analyzed: de la cha gsum zhes bya ba ni da ltar ba'i cha gsum yang sngon bzhin du gsum du byas nas /
translated: Having made them into three, as before,

original: stong pa'i ngo bo brjod du med pa rnyed pa ste /
analyzed: stong pa'i ngo bo brjod du med pa rnyed pa ste /
translated: one attains the inexpressible nature of emptiness.

original: shin tu phra ba'i yongs su gcod pa stong pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: shin tu phra ba'i yongs su gcod pa stong pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the extremely subtle determination is empty.

original: de ltar dngos su bshad pa brjod nas /
analyzed: de ltar dngos su bshad pa brjod nas /
translated: Having thus explained the actual topic,

original: srog gi mthar thug pa'i grangs kyi rang gi ngo bo bshad pa'i phyir /
analyzed: srog gi mthar thug pa'i grangs kyi rang gi ngo bo bshad pa'i phyir /
translated: in order to explain the nature of the enumeration of the life-force,üîΩit is said:

original: ji srid rtog pa zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: ji srid rtog pa zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: As long as there is what is called ‚Äúconceptualization,‚Äù

original: phra zhing phra ba'i cha yongs su brtags pas so //
analyzed: phra zhing phra ba'i cha yongs su brtags pas so //
translated: because of the thorough examination of the most subtle aspects.

original: de srid du rtog pa stong pa zhes bya ba ni phra mo'i rnam par rtog pa'i cha rnams kyis ma bsgribs pa'i gnyis su de kho na nyid thams cad nye bar zhi ba'i rnam pa'o //
analyzed: de srid du rtog pa stong pa zhes bya ba ni phra mo'i rnam par rtog pa'i cha rnams kyis ma bsgribs pa'i gnyis su de kho na nyid thams cad nye bar zhi ba'i rnam pa'o //
translated: To that extent, there is what is called ‚Äúthe emptiness of conceptualization,‚Äù the aspect of the pacification of all that-ness which is not obscured by the aspects of subtle conceptualization.

original: thos par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni mngon sum du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thos par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni mngon sum du 'gyur ro //
translated: ‚ÄúOne will hear‚Äù means one will perceive.

original: rnal 'byor mchog ni mchog gi rnal 'byor gyi ngo bo'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor mchog ni mchog gi rnal 'byor gyi ngo bo'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThe supreme yoga‚Äù is the nature of the supreme yoga.

original: ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is it like?

original: de'i phyir srog ni gnas na zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir srog ni gnas na zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, it is said, ‚Äúwhen the life-force is arrested.‚Äù

original: srog gi rlung stong pa'i ngo bo la'o //
analyzed: srog gi rlung stong pa'i ngo bo la'o //
translated: In the life-force wind, which is the nature of emptiness.

original: bla na med ces bya ba ni snang ba thams cad nye bar bcad pas de la gong na gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bla na med ces bya ba ni snang ba thams cad nye bar bcad pas de la gong na gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúUnsurpassed‚Äù means that because all appearances are eliminated, there is nothing higher than that.

original: rnam par rtog pa'i grangs las 'das //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa'i grangs las 'das //
translated: ‚ÄúBeyond the enumeration of conceptualization‚Äù

original: zhes bya ba ni yul dang dus dang rnam pa rnams dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni yul dang dus dang rnam pa rnams dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
translated: means that because it is free from objects, times, and aspects.

original: de la phyogs kyi sgras ni shar dang la sogs pa'i yul brjod do //
analyzed: de la phyogs kyi sgras ni shar dang la sogs pa'i yul brjod do //
translated: The word ‚Äúdirection‚Äù refers to the east and so on.

original: dus kyi sgras ni /
analyzed: dus kyi sgras ni /
translated: The word ‚Äútime‚Äù

original: dus ni ston dpyid la sogs pa dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: dus ni ston dpyid la sogs pa dang ldan pa'o //
translated: refers to the time of autumn, spring, and so on.

original: rnam par rtog @116a * //
analyzed: rnam par rtog @116a * //
translated: The word ‚Äúconception‚Äù

original: pa'i sgras ni rnam pa ste /
analyzed: pa'i sgras ni rnam pa ste /
translated: refers to the aspect.

original: de la rtog par bya ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de la rtog par bya ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because it is the object of conception.

original: de ltar na phyogs dang dus dang rtog pa rnams so //
analyzed: de ltar na phyogs dang dus dang rtog pa rnams so //
translated: Thus, ‚Äúdirection, time, and conception.‚Äù

original: de rnams dang 'das pa ni stong pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de rnams dang 'das pa ni stong pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: ‚ÄúHaving passed beyond‚Äù them means ‚Äúemptiness.‚Äù

original: rigs pa'i mtshan nyid spangs pa dang // zhes bya ba ni mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa dag gis yongs su gcad par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rigs pa'i mtshan nyid spangs pa dang // zhes bya ba ni mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa dag gis yongs su gcad par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúHaving abandoned the characteristics of reasoning‚Äù means that they are not to be ascertained by direct perception or inference.

original: de'i srog ni shar nas zhes bya ba ni srog ni skyed par byed pa'o //
analyzed: de'i srog ni shar nas zhes bya ba ni srog ni skyed par byed pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIts life force arises in the east‚Äù means that the life force is the producer.

original: thim zhes bya ba ni de nyid la snga ma bzhin du brjod du med pa rtogs pa'i bdag nyid can no //
analyzed: thim zhes bya ba ni de nyid la snga ma bzhin du brjod du med pa rtogs pa'i bdag nyid can no //
translated: ‚ÄúDissolves‚Äù means that it is realized to be inexpressible, as before.

original: de'i zhes bya ba ni srog gi rlung rnam par shes pa dang bcas pa la'o //
analyzed: de'i zhes bya ba ni srog gi rlung rnam par shes pa dang bcas pa la'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThat‚Äù refers to the life-force wind together with consciousness.

original: gnyis med ces bya ba ni tha dad pas yongs su chad pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: gnyis med ces bya ba ni tha dad pas yongs su chad pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Non-dual means that there is no division by way of difference.

original: de nyid bsdus pa zhes bya ba ni brjod du med pa'i go 'phang bsdus pa'i ngo bo'o //
analyzed: de nyid bsdus pa zhes bya ba ni brjod du med pa'i go 'phang bsdus pa'i ngo bo'o //
translated: That is the essence of the state of the inexpressible, which is called the collected.

original: mthar thug pa'i gnas skabs su phra ba'i cha gang la yang mi dmigs pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: mthar thug pa'i gnas skabs su phra ba'i cha gang la yang mi dmigs pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: At the ultimate stage, because there is no observation of any subtle part, is the meaning.

original: de ltar don rnam pa bzhis rlung gi bla na med pa'i mtshan nyid bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar don rnam pa bzhis rlung gi bla na med pa'i mtshan nyid bstan nas /
translated: Thus, having taught the unsurpassable characteristic of the wind by way of four topics,

original: srog gi 'char ba'i rim pa brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: srog gi 'char ba'i rim pa brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: in order to explain the process of the arising of life,

original: de'i yan lag bshad par dam bca' ba ni /
analyzed: de'i yan lag bshad par dam bca' ba ni /
translated: the promise to explain its branches is

original: gzhan yang bshad par bya yis nyon //üîΩzhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: gzhan yang bshad par bya yis nyon // zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Next, I will explain, so listen!

original: phyag na rdo rje thos pa la sbyar ba'o //
analyzed: phyag na rdo rje thos pa la sbyar ba'o //
translated: The one who is to listen is VajrapƒÅ·πái.

original: gzhan yang zhes bya ba ni snga ma la ltos nas khyad par du byas pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan yang zhes bya ba ni snga ma la ltos nas khyad par du byas pa'o //
translated: Next means that it is distinguished in dependence on the previous.

original: srog ni thim dang 'char ba yis //
analyzed: srog ni thim dang 'char ba yis //
translated: Life is dissolution and arising.

original: zhes bya ba ni 'char ba ni skyed pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'char ba ni skyed pa'o //
translated: Arising is production.

original: thim pa ni 'jig pa'o //
analyzed: thim pa ni 'jig pa'o //
translated: Dissolution is destruction.

original: srog ni bshad par bya zhes bya ba dang 'brel ba'o //
analyzed: srog ni bshad par bya zhes bya ba dang 'brel ba'o //
translated: Life is to be explained.

original: de ltar bshad pa dam bca' ba bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar bshad pa dam bca' ba bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught the thesis,

original: dus kyi nges pa brjod par bya ba'i phyir /üîΩji srid skad cig la sogs rtogs //
analyzed: dus kyi nges pa brjod par bya ba'i phyir / ji srid skad cig la sogs rtogs //
translated: in order to state the determination of time,üîΩhe says,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: As long as there is conceptualization of moments, etc.

original: skad cig ni brjod du med pa'i ngo bo'o //
analyzed: skad cig ni brjod du med pa'i ngo bo'o //
translated: Moment is the inexpressible nature.

original: brjod du med pa'i rjes la rgas pa'i grangs kyi mthar thug pa'i rtog pa'am /
analyzed: brjod du med pa'i rjes la rgas pa'i grangs kyi mthar thug pa'i rtog pa'am /
translated: After the inexpressible, conceptualization reaches the end of the enumeration of old age,

original: yod pa dang med pa'i spros pa'i rtog pa'o //
analyzed: yod pa dang med pa'i spros pa'i rtog pa'o //
translated: or it is the conceptualization of the proliferation of existence and non-existence.

original: ji srid ces bya ba ni dus ji srid kyi bar du'o //
analyzed: ji srid ces bya ba ni dus ji srid kyi bar du'o //
translated: As long as means for how long.

original: kun nas zhes bya ba ni rnam pa thams cad kyis so //
analyzed: kun nas zhes bya ba ni rnam pa thams cad kyis so //
translated: Completely means in every way.

original: rab tu ma zhi ba zhes bya ba ni rnam par ma log pa'am /
analyzed: rab tu ma zhi ba zhes bya ba ni rnam par ma log pa'am /
translated: Not pacified means not reversed

original: spong ba ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: spong ba ma yin pa'o //
translated: or not abandoned.

original: de srid srog gi zhes bya ba ni dus de srid kyi bar du srog gi rlung gi gnas zhes bya ba ni rten no //
analyzed: de srid srog gi zhes bya ba ni dus de srid kyi bar du srog gi rlung gi gnas zhes bya ba ni rten no //
translated: For that long, the life means for that long, the abode of the life-force wind is called.

original: rten ni shes pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rten ni shes pa ma yin te /
translated: The abode is not consciousness.

original: gang gis she na /
analyzed: gang gis she na /
translated: By what?

original: de'i phyir / thar pa 'dod pa'i @116b rnal 'byor pas //
analyzed: de'i phyir / thar pa 'dod pa'i @116b rnal 'byor pas //
translated: Therefore, it is said:

original: zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes gsungs te /
translated: The yogi who desires liberation

original: de ltar dus kyi nges pa brjod nas /
analyzed: de ltar dus kyi nges pa brjod nas /
translated: Thus, having described the ascertainment of time,

original: srog gi bskyed pa'i ngo bo nyid brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: srog gi bskyed pa'i ngo bo nyid brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: in order to describe the nature of the generation of life,üîΩit is said:

original: bshad sgo gsang ba'i zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: bshad sgo gsang ba'i zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: The secret door of the anus

original: bshang sgo yang yin la gsang ba yang yin pas na bshad sgo gsang ba'o //
analyzed: bshang sgo yang yin la gsang ba yang yin pas na bshad sgo gsang ba'o //
translated: Since it is both the anus and secret, it is the secret door of the anus.

original: de dag gi dbus ni bar ro //
analyzed: de dag gi dbus ni bar ro //
translated: The middle of those is the middle.

original: der gnas pas na de la gnas pa'o //
analyzed: der gnas pas na de la gnas pa'o //
translated: Abiding there, it abides there.

original: ming ni ma skyes zhes bya ba ni ma skyes pa zhes brjod pa ste /
analyzed: ming ni ma skyes zhes bya ba ni ma skyes pa zhes brjod pa ste /
translated: The name is called unborn.

original: skye ba dang 'jig pa spangs ba'i phyir dang / sems kyi khams ma lus pa las 'byung bar 'gyur ba ste /
analyzed: skye ba dang 'jig pa spangs ba'i phyir dang / sems kyi khams ma lus pa las 'byung bar 'gyur ba ste /
translated: It is called unborn because it is free from arising and perishing, and it arises from all the elements of the mind.

original: 'di las ma lus pa skyes pa zhes bya ba byas nas so //
analyzed: 'di las ma lus pa skyes pa zhes bya ba byas nas so //
translated: Having made arisen from all here,

original: cha chen po zhes bya ba ni cha yang yin la chen po yang yin pas na cha chen po'o //
analyzed: cha chen po zhes bya ba ni cha yang yin la chen po yang yin pas na cha chen po'o //
translated: Great part means it is both a part and great, so it is a great part.

original: chen po'i sgras ni skye ba dang 'jig pa spangs pa nyid 'di la gsungs te /
analyzed: chen po'i sgras ni skye ba dang 'jig pa spangs pa nyid 'di la gsungs te /
translated: The word ‚Äúgreat‚Äù indicates the abandonment of arising and destruction.

original: gang yang bshang sgo dang gsang ba'i dbus su gnas pa ste /
analyzed: gang yang bshang sgo dang gsang ba'i dbus su gnas pa ste /
translated: And that which abides in the middle of the anus and the secret part,

original: ji ltar ma lus pa skyed par byed cing /
analyzed: ji ltar ma lus pa skyed par byed cing /
translated: how does it generate everything?

original: gang gi phyir dbus ni don med pa ste /
analyzed: gang gi phyir dbus ni don med pa ste /
translated: And why is the middle meaningless?

original: de bas na sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rgyud phyi ma'i man ngag gis brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: de bas na sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rgyud phyi ma'i man ngag gis brjod par bya ste /
translated: Therefore, it should be expressed by the later esoteric instructions of the tantras of all buddhas.

original: gsang ba'i mdud pa'i gnas so //
analyzed: gsang ba'i mdud pa'i gnas so //
translated: It is the place of the secret knot.

original: bshad sgo ni rdo rje'i kha'o /
analyzed: bshad sgo ni rdo rje'i kha'o /
translated: The door of explanation is the vajra space.

original: de dag gi dbus gang yin pa de ni bar te /
analyzed: de dag gi dbus gang yin pa de ni bar te /
translated: That which is in the middle of those is the middle,

original: thams cad kyi ngo bo dang bral ba lhan cig skyes pa'i gnas zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: thams cad kyi ngo bo dang bral ba lhan cig skyes pa'i gnas zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: which means the abode of the connate, free from the nature of everything.

original: de ltar ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de ltar ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not like that.

original: gang zhig 'jig rten du grags pa de'i don dang bcas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang zhig 'jig rten du grags pa de'i don dang bcas par 'gyur ro //
translated: That which is renowned in the world will have meaning.

original: de yang rnam shes dang bral ba //
analyzed: de yang rnam shes dang bral ba //
translated: And that is free from consciousness.

original: zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir thams cad kyi ngo bo dang bral ba'i gnas la rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir thams cad kyi ngo bo dang bral ba'i gnas la rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin no //
translated: This is because, in the state devoid of the nature of everything, there is not even the slightest thing that exists called consciousness.

original: rnam par shes pa med pas kyang rnam par gzhag pa ji ltar yin pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa med pas kyang rnam par gzhag pa ji ltar yin pa'o //
translated: And, since consciousness does not exist, how can there be a state?

original: rnam par shes pa med pa ci'i phyir thams cad stong pa'i rang bzhin ye shes med pa gang du de yod pa de thams cad rigs pas de'i bdag nyid kyis yod do //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa med pa ci'i phyir thams cad stong pa'i rang bzhin ye shes med pa gang du de yod pa de thams cad rigs pas de'i bdag nyid kyis yod do //
translated: Since there is no consciousness, why is it that everything is empty by nature, and that which exists there is all reasonable in its very nature?

original: de ltar gang zhig gnyis su rtog pa spangs pa'i gnas de ye shes kyi lus las 'das pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar gang zhig gnyis su rtog pa spangs pa'i gnas de ye shes kyi lus las 'das pa'o //
translated: Thus, that state which is free from the conception of duality is beyond the body of gnosis.

original: de nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir /
translated: For this very reason,

original: ye shes lus ni bdag med pa //
analyzed: ye shes lus ni bdag med pa //
translated: the body of gnosis is selfless.

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: This is what is being said.

original: de nyid ni yang dag par bdag med pa'i gnas so //
analyzed: de nyid ni yang dag par bdag med pa'i gnas so //
translated: That very [state] is the state of complete selflessness.

original: de nyid kyi phyir na /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir na /
translated: For this very reason,

original: ye shes lus ni bdag med pa //
analyzed: ye shes lus ni bdag med pa //
translated: the body of gnosis is selfless.

original: zhes bya ba de ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba de ni /
translated: This is what is being said.

original: cha chen po yi bdag med pa //
analyzed: cha chen po yi bdag med pa //
translated: The great part is selfless.

original: zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: This is what is intended.

original: der ni srog ni skyes pa mchog / ces bya ba ni de mchog gi dbang @117a * //üîΩphyug gi bdag med pa las mchog ni mchog tu gyur pa ste /
analyzed: der ni srog ni skyes pa mchog / ces bya ba ni de mchog gi dbang @117a * // phyug gi bdag med pa las mchog ni mchog tu gyur pa ste /
translated: the supreme lord of that, is the supreme man.

original: srog gi sgras ni mchog dga' ste /
analyzed: srog gi sgras ni mchog dga' ste /
translated: Life is supreme joy,

original: gang gi phyir thams cad gso bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir thams cad gso bar byed pa'o //
translated: because it nourishes everything.

original: kha cig kun gzhi rnam par shes pa zhes smra'o //
analyzed: kha cig kun gzhi rnam par shes pa zhes smra'o //
translated: Some call it the store-consciousness.üîΩOf all living beings,üîΩthose who have life are living beings.üîΩThe supreme man is the supreme man.

original: srog chags rnams kyi zhes bya ba ni gang la srog yod pa de rnams ni srog chags rnams so ;
analyzed: srog chags rnams kyi zhes bya ba ni gang la srog yod pa de rnams ni srog chags rnams so ;
translated: The supreme man is the supreme man.üîΩThe supreme man is the supreme man.üîΩThe supreme man is the supreme man.üîΩThe supreme man is the supreme man.üîΩThe supreme man is the supreme man.

original: / mchog tu brjod ces bya ba ni bla na med pa'i don sgrub pa'o zhes bya ba ni dga' ba'i 'od zer gyi phreng ba byed pa'i mkhan po'o //üîΩgzhan dag ni bshang sgo gsang ba zhes bya ba ni shes rab dang 'brel pa'i dbus su gnas pa ni /
analyzed: / mchog tu brjod ces bya ba ni bla na med pa'i don sgrub pa'o zhes bya ba ni dga' ba'i 'od zer gyi phreng ba byed pa'i mkhan po'o // gzhan dag ni bshang sgo gsang ba zhes bya ba ni shes rab dang 'brel pa'i dbus su gnas pa ni /
translated: The supreme man is the supreme man.üîΩThe supreme man is the supreme man.üîΩThe supreme man is the supreme man.üîΩThe supreme man is the supreme man.üîΩThe supreme man is the supreme man.üîΩThe supreme man is the supreme man.üîΩThe supreme man is the supreme man.üîΩThe supreme man is the supreme man.üîΩThe supreme man is the supreme man.üîΩThe supreme man is the supreme man.üîΩThe supreme man is the supreme man.üîΩThe supreme man is the supreme man.

original: chos 'byung gi dbus su gnas pa'o //
analyzed: chos 'byung gi dbus su gnas pa'o //
translated: The supreme man is the supreme man.

original: ming ni ma skyes zhes bya ba ni ma skyes pa zhes bya ba rnam par rtog pa thams cad kyi gnyen po nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: ming ni ma skyes zhes bya ba ni ma skyes pa zhes bya ba rnam par rtog pa thams cad kyi gnyen po nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The name is ‚Äúunborn,‚Äù because it is the antidote to all conceptual thoughts.

original: cha chen po zhes bya ba ni mngal gyi rtsa'i bdag nyid can nyid kyi cha chen po'i ri bong gis mtshan pa'i ngo bo'i rten gyi phyir ro //
analyzed: cha chen po zhes bya ba ni mngal gyi rtsa'i bdag nyid can nyid kyi cha chen po'i ri bong gis mtshan pa'i ngo bo'i rten gyi phyir ro //
translated: ‚Äú Great part‚Äù means that it is the support of the nature of the rabbit-marked moon, which is the great part of the nature of the channel of the womb.

original: de yang zhes bya ba ni chos 'byung gi rtsa'o //
analyzed: de yang zhes bya ba ni chos 'byung gi rtsa'o //
translated: ‚Äú That‚Äù means the channel of the source of phenomena.

original: rnam shes dang bral ba zhes bya ba ni rtag tu de dang lhan cig ma 'grogs pas bems po'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: rnam shes dang bral ba zhes bya ba ni rtag tu de dang lhan cig ma 'grogs pas bems po'i rang bzhin no //
translated: ‚Äú Free from consciousness‚Äù means that it is the nature of matter, because it is never accompanied by that.

original: ye shes lus ni zhes bya ba ni dngos po la phyi rol gyi don med kyang de'i snang ba'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: ye shes lus ni zhes bya ba ni dngos po la phyi rol gyi don med kyang de'i snang ba'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin no //
translated: ‚Äú The body of wisdom‚Äù means that although there is no external object in reality, it is the nature of the consciousness that appears as that.

original: yang na bar ma do'i ngo bo rnam par shes pa dang 'brel pas ye shes kyi lus can no //
analyzed: yang na bar ma do'i ngo bo rnam par shes pa dang 'brel pas ye shes kyi lus can no //
translated: Alternately, it has a body of wisdom because it is connected to consciousness, which has the nature of the intermediate state.

original: bdag med pa zhes bya ba ni lhag par gnas pa po bdag la sogs pa 'ga' zhig med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bdag med pa zhes bya ba ni lhag par gnas pa po bdag la sogs pa 'ga' zhig med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: ‚Äú Selfless‚Äù means that it is because there is no self or anything else that abides.

original: der ni skye ba zhes bya ba ni chos 'byung gi rtsa la'o //
analyzed: der ni skye ba zhes bya ba ni chos 'byung gi rtsa la'o //
translated: There, ‚Äúbirth‚Äù is in the nƒÅ·∏çƒ´ of the source of phenomena.

original: srog gi mchog ces bya ba ni rnam par shes pa'i bzhon pa'i ngo bo srog gi rlung mngon du byas pa'i dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las kyi stobs kyis so //
analyzed: srog gi mchog ces bya ba ni rnam par shes pa'i bzhon pa'i ngo bo srog gi rlung mngon du byas pa'i dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las kyi stobs kyis so //
translated: ‚ÄúThe supreme life‚Äù is the life-force wind, which is the nature of the mount of consciousness.

original: skyes pa zhes bya ba ni mer mer po la sogs pa'i ngo bos skyes pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: skyes pa zhes bya ba ni mer mer po la sogs pa'i ngo bos skyes pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: ‚ÄúArisen‚Äù means arisen in the form of the kalala, and so on.

original: srog chags rnams kyis zhes bya ba'i ni lus blangs pa rnams kyis so //
analyzed: srog chags rnams kyis zhes bya ba'i ni lus blangs pa rnams kyis so //
translated: ‚ÄúBy all living beings‚Äù means by those who have taken up a body.

original: mchog tu brjod ces bya ba ni de dang de'i las kyi dbang gis dam pa ma yin pa dang 'brel la yang rang gi ngo bo mi 'dor ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mchog tu brjod ces bya ba ni de dang de'i las kyi dbang gis dam pa ma yin pa dang 'brel la yang rang gi ngo bo mi 'dor ba'i phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúSupremely described‚Äù means that due to the power of that and that karma, it is connected with the non-supreme, but it does not lose its own nature.

original: de ltar srog 'char ba'i ngo bo bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar srog 'char ba'i ngo bo bstan nas /
translated: Having explained the nature of the arising of the life-force in that way,

original: de las kyang phung po la sogs pa bskyed pa brjod pa'i phyir ro //üîΩrnam par shes pa'i ngo bo rten //
analyzed: de las kyang phung po la sogs pa bskyed pa brjod pa'i phyir ro // rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo rten //
translated: in order to explain the generation of the aggregates and so on from that,

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: ‚ÄúThe consciousness is the support of the nature of the body.‚Äù

original: de nyid ni srog gi rlung bar ma do'i srid pa'i ngo bo la brten nas so //
analyzed: de nyid ni srog gi rlung bar ma do'i srid pa'i ngo bo la brten nas so //
translated: That is based on the life-force wind, the nature of the intermediate existence.

original: thog mar 'byung ba bzhi po la //
analyzed: thog mar 'byung ba bzhi po la //
translated: First, in the four elements,

original: zhes bya ba ni thog ma ni @117b dang po'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni thog ma ni @117b dang po'o //
translated: the first is the beginning.

original: 'byung ba bzhi po la zhes bya ba ni mer mer po'i gnas skabs la sogs pa 'byung ba chen po bzhi la'o //
analyzed: 'byung ba bzhi po la zhes bya ba ni mer mer po'i gnas skabs la sogs pa 'byung ba chen po bzhi la'o //
translated: In the four elements means in the four great elements, such as the stage of the kalala.

original: skyes pa yi ni ngo bor byed //
analyzed: skyes pa yi ni ngo bor byed //
translated: It produces the nature of the born.

original: ces bya ba ni rang gi ngo bo bskyed nas zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni rang gi ngo bo bskyed nas zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it generates its own nature.

original: rang gi gnas su zhes bya ba ni ma skyes pa'i rtsa'i gnas la'o //üîΩthim zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rang gi gnas su zhes bya ba ni ma skyes pa'i rtsa'i gnas la'o // thim zhes bya ba ni /
translated: In its own place means in the place of the unborn nƒÅ·∏çƒ´.üîΩDissolves means

original: brgyal bar 'gyur bar zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: brgyal bar 'gyur bar zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: it faints.

original: rnam shes las ni zhes bya ba ni rim pas yongs su smin pa thob pa las so //
analyzed: rnam shes las ni zhes bya ba ni rim pas yongs su smin pa thob pa las so //
translated: From consciousness means from the attainment of complete ripening in stages.

original: rlung skye'o zhes bya ba ni phung po lnga'i bdag nyid kyi rlung gi rnam pa'o //
analyzed: rlung skye'o zhes bya ba ni phung po lnga'i bdag nyid kyi rlung gi rnam pa'o //
translated: The wind arises means the aspect of the wind of the five aggregates.

original: de las zhes bya ba ni rlung las so //
analyzed: de las zhes bya ba ni rlung las so //
translated: From that means from the wind.

original: me ni skye bar 'gyur zhes bya ba ni dro ba'i mtshan nyid can 'byung ba'o ;
analyzed: me ni skye bar 'gyur zhes bya ba ni dro ba'i mtshan nyid can 'byung ba'o ;
translated: Fire is born means the element with the characteristic of heat.

original: / chu ni zhes bya ba ni gsher ba'i rang bzhin can no //
analyzed: / chu ni zhes bya ba ni gsher ba'i rang bzhin can no //
translated: Water is born means the element with the nature of wetness.

original: 'byung bar 'gyur zhes bya ba ni skye bar 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: 'byung bar 'gyur zhes bya ba ni skye bar 'gyur ba'o //
translated: It is born means it is produced.

original: de las zhes bya ba ni chu las so //
analyzed: de las zhes bya ba ni chu las so //
translated: From that means from water.

original: sa ni sa'i ngo bo sra ba'i mtshan nyid can las so //
analyzed: sa ni sa'i ngo bo sra ba'i mtshan nyid can las so //
translated: Earth is born means the element with the characteristic of solidity.

original: 'byung bar 'gyur ba ni bskyed pa'o //
analyzed: 'byung bar 'gyur ba ni bskyed pa'o //
translated: It is born means it is produced.

original: de dag rnams las zhes bya ba ni 'byung ba chen po bzhi yongs su smin pa'i gnas skabs rnams las so //
analyzed: de dag rnams las zhes bya ba ni 'byung ba chen po bzhi yongs su smin pa'i gnas skabs rnams las so //
translated: From them means from the four great elements in the stage of maturation.

original: phung por zhes bya ba ni lnga rnams la'o //
analyzed: phung por zhes bya ba ni lnga rnams la'o //
translated: In the aggregates means in the five aggregates.

original: 'byung zhes bya ba ni skye ba'o //
analyzed: 'byung zhes bya ba ni skye ba'o //
translated: It is born means it is produced.

original: de phyir zhes bya ba ni phung po lnga'i mtshan nyid can las so //
analyzed: de phyir zhes bya ba ni phung po lnga'i mtshan nyid can las so //
translated: Therefore means from the characteristic of the five aggregates.

original: skye mched rnams dang ni zhes bya ba ni mig la sogs pa nang gi skye mched dbang po'i rlung dang lhan cig tu gyur pa'o //
analyzed: skye mched rnams dang ni zhes bya ba ni mig la sogs pa nang gi skye mched dbang po'i rlung dang lhan cig tu gyur pa'o //
translated: In the sense bases means the internal sense bases such as the eyes, together with the wind of the sense faculties.

original: de las rnam shes rang bzhin rnams //
analyzed: de las rnam shes rang bzhin rnams //
translated: From that, the natures.

original: zhes bya ba ni de las zhes bya ba ni nang gi skye mched yul rnams kyis khyad par du byas pa las so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni de las zhes bya ba ni nang gi skye mched yul rnams kyis khyad par du byas pa las so //
translated: From that means from the objects that are distinguished by the internal sense bases.

original: rang bzhin rnams ni ye shes gsum dang lhan cig tu 'gyur bas rang bzhin 'byung bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: rang bzhin rnams ni ye shes gsum dang lhan cig tu 'gyur bas rang bzhin 'byung bar 'gyur te /
translated: The natures are the three intuitions, and so they are natures that arise, since they occur together with the three intuitions.

original: grangs bstan pa'i phyir brgya dang brgyad kyi sa lhag pa'i zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: grangs bstan pa'i phyir brgya dang brgyad kyi sa lhag pa'i zhes gsungs te /
translated: In order to indicate their number, he says, with the remainder of the one hundred and eight.

original: sngar bshad pa bzhin no //
analyzed: sngar bshad pa bzhin no //
translated: As explained above.

original: rim zhes bya ba ni 'di ni mtshon par byed pa ste /
analyzed: rim zhes bya ba ni 'di ni mtshon par byed pa ste /
translated: The word sequence indicates that this is an illustration.

original: cig car yang dus 'ga' zhig gi tshe na 'byung bar 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: cig car yang dus 'ga' zhig gi tshe na 'byung bar 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: It also means that they occur simultaneously at some time.

original: dga' ba'i 'od zer gyi phreng ba byed mkhan 'di skad ces smra ste /
analyzed: dga' ba'i 'od zer gyi phreng ba byed mkhan 'di skad ces smra ste /
translated: The one who makes the garland of the light rays of joy says this:

original: rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo rten //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo rten //
translated: The nature of consciousness is the basis.

original: zhes bya ba ni rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo stong pa nyid gsum gyi mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo stong pa nyid gsum gyi mtshan nyid do //
translated: The nature of consciousness is emptiness, which has the nature of the three intuitions.

original: gang gi phyir de la brten nas skye bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir de la brten nas skye bar 'gyur te /
translated: Because they arise in dependence on that.

original: dang po ni ma rig pa'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: dang po ni ma rig pa'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: The first is the characteristic of ignorance.

original: gnyis pa ni sems las byung ba'o //üîΩde ltar stong pa nyid gsum gyi mtshan nyid dus gsum @118a * //
analyzed: gnyis pa ni sems las byung ba'o // de ltar stong pa nyid gsum gyi mtshan nyid dus gsum @118a * //
translated: The second is the mental factor.

original: du spyod pa'i las so //
analyzed: du spyod pa'i las so //
translated: Thus, the characteristic of the three emptinesses is the activity that occurs in the three times.

original: de yang snang ba gsum gyi bdag nyid can de snang ba gsum gyi bdag nyid kyi phyir dngos po kun gyi bdag nyid ni mchog dga'o //
analyzed: de yang snang ba gsum gyi bdag nyid can de snang ba gsum gyi bdag nyid kyi phyir dngos po kun gyi bdag nyid ni mchog dga'o //
translated: Moreover, since it has the nature of the three appearances, the nature of all things is supreme joy, because it has the nature of the three appearances.

original: de bas na nang gi bdag nyid kyis 'byung ba bzhi pos srid pa'i rten ye shes rnam par 'byed par byed pa zhes bya ba sra ba la sogs pa rang gi rang bzhin du sgro btags nas rang gi gnas gsum du thim par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bas na nang gi bdag nyid kyis 'byung ba bzhi pos srid pa'i rten ye shes rnam par 'byed par byed pa zhes bya ba sra ba la sogs pa rang gi rang bzhin du sgro btags nas rang gi gnas gsum du thim par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, by its inner nature, the four elements that are the basis of existence, which is the wisdom that distinguishes, is said to dissolve into its own three places, having exaggerated the nature of its own solidity, and so on.

original: rang gi gnas ni bdag med pa'i go 'phang zhes brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: rang gi gnas ni bdag med pa'i go 'phang zhes brjod par bya'o //
translated: Its own place should be called the stage of selflessness.

original: de las zhes bya ba ni rgyu de las zhes bya ba'i don te /
analyzed: de las zhes bya ba ni rgyu de las zhes bya ba'i don te /
translated: From that means from that cause.

original: lugs 'dis 'byung ba chen po la sogs pa'i rim pa'i ye shes gsum dang / rang bzhin dang snang ba skyed par 'gyur zhes rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: lugs 'dis 'byung ba chen po la sogs pa'i rim pa'i ye shes gsum dang / rang bzhin dang snang ba skyed par 'gyur zhes rtogs par bya'o //
translated: One should understand that in this system, the three wisdoms of the stage of the great elements and so forth generate the nature and appearance.

original: de ltar don rnam pa bzhis srog las 'byung ba'i rim pa bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar don rnam pa bzhis srog las 'byung ba'i rim pa bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught the stage of arising from life through four topics,

original: de nyid kyi thim pa'i rim pa rgyas par bshad pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de nyid kyi thim pa'i rim pa rgyas par bshad pa'i phyir /
translated: in order to explain in detail the stage of dissolution of just that,

original: de'i yan lag de rtsom pa ni /
analyzed: de'i yan lag de rtsom pa ni /
translated: the composition of its branches is:

original: ji ltar skye ba de ltar gnas //
analyzed: ji ltar skye ba de ltar gnas //
translated: Just as there is arising, so there is abiding.

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Thus it is said.

original: 'byung ba chen po dang phung po dang skye mched la sogs pa ji ltar skyes pa de ltar de nyid du zhes bya ba ni rlung gi ngo bo la'o //
analyzed: 'byung ba chen po dang phung po dang skye mched la sogs pa ji ltar skyes pa de ltar de nyid du zhes bya ba ni rlung gi ngo bo la'o //
translated: Just as the great elements, aggregates, sense bases, and so forth arise, so they dissolve into just that, which is the nature of wind.

original: thim nas 'gro ba zhes bya ba ni nye bar sdud par 'gro ba'o //
analyzed: thim nas 'gro ba zhes bya ba ni nye bar sdud par 'gro ba'o //
translated: Having dissolved, they go means they go to gather.

original: rang bzhin zhes bya ba ni las kyi bag chags kyi dbang gis so //
analyzed: rang bzhin zhes bya ba ni las kyi bag chags kyi dbang gis so //
translated: Nature means by the power of the latent tendencies of karma.

original: dga' ba'i 'od zer gyi phreng ba byed ba'i mkhan po ni /
analyzed: dga' ba'i 'od zer gyi phreng ba byed ba'i mkhan po ni /
translated: The master who creates the garland of light rays of joy

original: ji ltar zhes bya ba ni rnam pa gang gis dang por skye ba'o //
analyzed: ji ltar zhes bya ba ni rnam pa gang gis dang por skye ba'o //
translated: How is it that they first arise?

original: de ltar ni rnam pa de nyid kyis thim nas so //
analyzed: de ltar ni rnam pa de nyid kyis thim nas so //
translated: In just that way, they dissolve.

original: gang gi phyir de rnams la 'gro ba gzhan med de ji ltar rnam par 'gyur ba rnam par gsal ba sprin gyi sgras khyab pa'i chu 'dzin pa'i tshogs rnams kyis sprin gyi tshogs rnams ma lus pa'i nam mkha'i ngo bo la khyab nas de nyid du thim par
analyzed: gang gi phyir de rnams la 'gro ba gzhan med de ji ltar rnam par 'gyur ba rnam par gsal ba sprin gyi sgras khyab pa'i chu 'dzin pa'i tshogs rnams kyis sprin gyi tshogs rnams ma lus pa'i nam mkha'i ngo bo la khyab nas de nyid du thim par
translated: Because they have no other destination, just as the entire mass of clouds, which are the source of the manifestation of forms, pervade the nature of the sky and dissolve right there.

original: 'gyur ba'o // rang bzhin de nyid ces bya ba ni rang nyid kyis zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'gyur ba'o // rang bzhin de nyid ces bya ba ni rang nyid kyis zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: That very nature means by itself.

original: de ltar de byed pa rtsom pa bshad nas /
analyzed: de ltar de byed pa rtsom pa bshad nas /
translated: Having explained the commencement of that activity,

original: de nyid kyis thim pa rgyas par bshad pa'i ngo bo nyid brjod pa'i phyir /üîΩrgyags pa bskyed pa'i rlung chen po ;
analyzed: de nyid kyis thim pa rgyas par bshad pa'i ngo bo nyid brjod pa'i phyir / rgyags pa bskyed pa'i rlung chen po ;
translated: in order to state the nature of the extensive explanation of the dissolution of just that,

original: / zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: / zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: he says, the great wind that generates intoxication.

original: zla ba dang nyi ma'i 'chi lta sa byung ba'i rjes la'o //
analyzed: zla ba dang nyi ma'i 'chi lta sa byung ba'i rjes la'o //
translated: After the appearance of the lunar and solar eclipses.

original: rgyags pa bskyed pa zhes bya ba ni thur sel gyi rlung gi ngo bo'o //
analyzed: rgyags pa bskyed pa zhes bya ba ni thur sel gyi rlung gi ngo bo'o //
translated: The one called ‚Äúproducing intoxication‚Äù is of the nature of the downward-voiding wind.

original: nyon mongs yid ni skul bar byed //
analyzed: nyon mongs yid ni skul bar byed //
translated: The afflicted mind is the instigator.

original: ces bya ba ni rang gi bag chags dang rnam par smin pa'i stobs kyis rnam par shes pa bskul ba @118b ste ;
analyzed: ces bya ba ni rang gi bag chags dang rnam par smin pa'i stobs kyis rnam par shes pa bskul ba @118b ste ;
translated: This means that by the power of its own habitual tendencies and karmic ripening, it instigates consciousness.

original: skye mched rnams ni sdud par byed pa zhes bya ba dang 'brel to //
analyzed: skye mched rnams ni sdud par byed pa zhes bya ba dang 'brel to //
translated: It is connected with ‚Äúthe sense-spheres are the gatherers.‚Äù

original: skye mched dang lhan cig par 'gyur ba'i rlung lnga por stobs chung bar byas nas /
analyzed: skye mched dang lhan cig par 'gyur ba'i rlung lnga por stobs chung bar byas nas /
translated: The five winds that accompany the sense-spheres are made weak,

original: rim gyis za bar byed ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rim gyis za bar byed ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: and gradually they are eaten. This is the meaning.

original: ci zhig byas nas she na /üîΩde'i phyir / stobs thob nas ni rnam ni rnam rgyal te //
analyzed: ci zhig byas nas she na / de'i phyir / stobs thob nas ni rnam ni rnam rgyal te //
translated: What is done?

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te ;
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te ;
translated: Therefore it is said: ‚ÄúHaving gained strength, the all-conquering one.üîΩ‚Äù

original: sdud pa'i gnas skabs su skye mched rnams nye bar sdud pa'i ngo bo stobs thob nas so //
analyzed: sdud pa'i gnas skabs su skye mched rnams nye bar sdud pa'i ngo bo stobs thob nas so //
translated: Having gained strength in the state of gathering, the sense-spheres are gathered.

original: de las rgyags pa chu yi rlung //
analyzed: de las rgyags pa chu yi rlung //
translated: From that, the wind of intoxication is the water-wind.

original: zhes bya ba ni mnyam gnas kyi ngo bo'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni mnyam gnas kyi ngo bo'o //
translated: This is of the nature of the abiding-in-place wind.

original: rgyags pa bskyed pa zab pa'i phyir //
analyzed: rgyags pa bskyed pa zab pa'i phyir //
translated: Because it produces intoxication, it is deep.

original: zhes bya ba ni thur sel gyi rlung gi ngo bo'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni thur sel gyi rlung gi ngo bo'o //
translated: This is the nature of the downward-voiding wind.

original: zab pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni skye mched nye bar sdud par byed pa la bya ba byas pa'o //
analyzed: zab pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni skye mched nye bar sdud par byed pa la bya ba byas pa'o //
translated: Because it is profound, it is the one that performs the function of withdrawing the sense-spheres.

original: phyung po rnams kyang sdud byed nyid //
analyzed: phyung po rnams kyang sdud byed nyid //
translated: It is also the one that withdraws the aggregates.

original: ces bya ba ni phung po lnga po rnams so //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni phung po lnga po rnams so //
translated: The aggregates are the five aggregates.

original: rim gyis lus chen sgrogs zhes bya ba ni nus pa bcom par byas nas so //
analyzed: rim gyis lus chen sgrogs zhes bya ba ni nus pa bcom par byas nas so //
translated: It is the one that gradually fills the great body, having destroyed the capacity.

original: lus chen zhes bya ba ni lus thams cad la khyab par 'gro bas 'dod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lus chen zhes bya ba ni lus thams cad la khyab par 'gro bas 'dod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The great body is the body that is desired to be pervaded by the wind.

original: de las rgyags pa'i cha ni 'byung //üîΩzhes bya ba ni gyen du rgyu ba'i rlung gi ngo bo'o //
analyzed: de las rgyags pa'i cha ni 'byung // zhes bya ba ni gyen du rgyu ba'i rlung gi ngo bo'o //
translated: From that, the part of pride arises.üîΩThis is the nature of the upward-moving wind.

original: rgyags pa'i chu zhes bya ba ni mnyam gnas kyi ngo bo'o //
analyzed: rgyags pa'i chu zhes bya ba ni mnyam gnas kyi ngo bo'o //
translated: The water of pride is the nature of the all-encompassing wind.

original: 'byung ba rnams ni bsdus nas kyang //
analyzed: 'byung ba rnams ni bsdus nas kyang //
translated: Having gathered the elements,

original: zhes bya ba ni sa la sogs pa rnams so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sa la sogs pa rnams so //
translated: the elements are earth and so forth.

original: go rims ji lta ba bzhin du zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: go rims ji lta ba bzhin du zhes bya ba ni /
translated: In accordance with the order,

original: rim pa gang zhig 'di nyid kyis sngar skyes pa'i rim pa de nyid kyis sdud par byed ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rim pa gang zhig 'di nyid kyis sngar skyes pa'i rim pa de nyid kyis sdud par byed ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is collected by the very same stage through which it was previously produced.

original: de las rlung gi btang bzung 'byung //
analyzed: de las rlung gi btang bzung 'byung //
translated: From that, the life-force wind arises.

original: zhes bya ba ni srog gi rlung gi ngo bo'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni srog gi rlung gi ngo bo'o //
translated: This is the nature of the life-force wind.

original: 'byung zhes bya ba ni 'chi ba'i gnas skabs su'o //
analyzed: 'byung zhes bya ba ni 'chi ba'i gnas skabs su'o //
translated: Arises means at the time of death.

original: rgyags pa'i cha ni za bar byed //
analyzed: rgyags pa'i cha ni za bar byed //
translated: The part of pride is consumed.

original: ces bya ba ni rgyags pa'i cha ni gyen du rgyu ba'i rlung ngo //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni rgyags pa'i cha ni gyen du rgyu ba'i rlung ngo //
translated: The part of pride is the upward-moving wind.

original: de nas kyang ni rlung mi sdud //
analyzed: de nas kyang ni rlung mi sdud //
translated: Then, the wind is not collected.

original: ces bya ba ni 'di ni gnas pa'i gzugs kyi phung po'i rlung ngo //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni 'di ni gnas pa'i gzugs kyi phung po'i rlung ngo //
translated: This is the wind of the aggregate of form that abides.

original: khyab cing zhes bya ba ni lus kyi tshogs thams cad la khyab pa'o //
analyzed: khyab cing zhes bya ba ni lus kyi tshogs thams cad la khyab pa'o //
translated: It pervades means it pervades the entire collection of the body.

original: phra ba zhes bya ba ni phra ba'i rgyus pa'i mtshams la gnas pa'o //
analyzed: phra ba zhes bya ba ni phra ba'i rgyus pa'i mtshams la gnas pa'o //
translated: It is subtle means it abides in the subtle joints.

original: sgrib par byed ces bya ba ni bar ma dor rlung dang lhan cig cung zad 'dres pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgrib par byed ces bya ba ni bar ma dor rlung dang lhan cig cung zad 'dres pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It obscures means it obscures slightly by mixing with the wind in the middle.

original: de las kyang mi zad btang bzung las zhes bya ba ni srog gi rlung gi ngo bo'o //
analyzed: de las kyang mi zad btang bzung las zhes bya ba ni srog gi rlung gi ngo bo'o //
translated: And from that, the inexhaustible, which is called the ‚Äúgrasping‚Äù is the nature of the life-force wind.

original: drag shul zhes bya ba ni khyab byed kyi rlung za ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: drag shul zhes bya ba ni khyab byed kyi rlung za ba'i phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúForceful‚Äù means that it devours the pervading wind.

original: rnam shes zhes bya ba ni bar mdo'i rnam par shes pa'o //
analyzed: rnam shes zhes bya ba ni bar mdo'i rnam par shes pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúConsciousness‚Äù means the intermediate state consciousness.

original: sgrib par byed ces bya ba ni khyab @119a * //üîΩpar byed ces pa'o //
analyzed: sgrib par byed ces bya ba ni khyab @119a * // par byed ces pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúObscures‚Äù means pervades.

original: skad cig ces bya ba ni 'di pa'i phung po dor ba'i skad cig ma las so //
analyzed: skad cig ces bya ba ni 'di pa'i phung po dor ba'i skad cig ma las so //
translated: ‚ÄúInstantly‚Äù means from the instant of discarding the aggregates of this life.

original: bsgribs nas de la rnam shes kyis //
analyzed: bsgribs nas de la rnam shes kyis //
translated: ‚ÄúHaving obscured it, consciousness‚Äù

original: zhes bya ba ni srog gi rlung gi bar ma do'i rnam par shes pa sgrib par byed pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni srog gi rlung gi bar ma do'i rnam par shes pa sgrib par byed pa'o //
translated: means that the intermediate state consciousness of the life-force wind obscures it.

original: bems po song nas zhes bya ba ni sngon gyi las kyi stobs kyis sngon gyi gnas skabs ma dran pas so //
analyzed: bems po song nas zhes bya ba ni sngon gyi las kyi stobs kyis sngon gyi gnas skabs ma dran pas so //
translated: ‚ÄúHaving gone to the inanimate‚Äù means that due to the power of previous karma, one does not remember the previous state.

original: brgyal bar 'gyur zhes bya ba ni dri zhim pa dang mi zhim pa'i bag chags kyi stobs kyis khyogs kyi bzhon pa lta bur zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: brgyal bar 'gyur zhes bya ba ni dri zhim pa dang mi zhim pa'i bag chags kyi stobs kyis khyogs kyi bzhon pa lta bur zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: ‚ÄúOne faints‚Äù means that due to the power of the latent tendencies of pleasant and unpleasant smells, one is like a passenger in a palanquin.

original: dag pa'i cha ni sgrib par byed //
analyzed: dag pa'i cha ni sgrib par byed //
translated: The pure part is the obscuring.

original: ces bya ba ni rnal 'byor pas kyang rim pa gnyis bsgoms pa 'am /
analyzed: ces bya ba ni rnal 'byor pas kyang rim pa gnyis bsgoms pa 'am /
translated: This is the yogi's meditation on the two stages,

original: sngags dang rlung gi de kho na nyid bsgoms pa dang / 'byung ba dang rngub pa drug gi rjes su dran pa bsgoms pas so //
analyzed: sngags dang rlung gi de kho na nyid bsgoms pa dang / 'byung ba dang rngub pa drug gi rjes su dran pa bsgoms pas so //
translated: or the meditation on the reality of mantra and wind, or the meditation on the mindfulness of the six inhalations and exhalations.

original: dag pa'i cha zhes bya ba ni zla ba dang nyi ma'i 'brel pa'o //
analyzed: dag pa'i cha zhes bya ba ni zla ba dang nyi ma'i 'brel pa'o //
translated: The pure part is the connection of the moon and sun.

original: dag pa zhes bya ba ni yongs su dag pa'i sems kyi ngo bor nye bar mtshon pas so //
analyzed: dag pa zhes bya ba ni yongs su dag pa'i sems kyi ngo bor nye bar mtshon pas so //
translated: Pure means the nature of the completely pure mind.

original: ma skyes ye shes zhes bya ba ni gdod ma nas ma skyes pa'i chos nyid kyi rnam pa'o //
analyzed: ma skyes ye shes zhes bya ba ni gdod ma nas ma skyes pa'i chos nyid kyi rnam pa'o //
translated: Unborn wisdom means the form of the primordial nature of non-arising.

original: mchog gi mchog ces bya ba ni srog gi rlung gis rnam bar shes pa'i ngo bo mtshon pas so //
analyzed: mchog gi mchog ces bya ba ni srog gi rlung gis rnam bar shes pa'i ngo bo mtshon pas so //
translated: Supreme of the supreme means the nature of the life-force wind.

original: de las thim par 'gyur pa'i srog ces bya ba ni rnam par shes pa dang lhan cig pa ste /
analyzed: de las thim par 'gyur pa'i srog ces bya ba ni rnam par shes pa dang lhan cig pa ste /
translated: The life-force that dissolves into that means together with consciousness.

original: rlung gi ngo bo mtshon pas rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid mtshon par byed pa'o //
analyzed: rlung gi ngo bo mtshon pas rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid mtshon par byed pa'o //
translated: The nature of the wind is indicated, and the nature of consciousness is indicated.

original: rnam shes dang ni mtshungs par ldan //
analyzed: rnam shes dang ni mtshungs par ldan //
translated: And is associated with consciousness.

original: zhes bya ba ni srog gi rlung rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid la sbyar ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni srog gi rlung rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid la sbyar ba'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because the life-force wind is applied to the reality of consciousness.

original: de yang le'u sum cu rtsa bzhi pa sdud par byed pa'i mkha' 'gro ma'i zhes bya ba las rang nyid kyis 'chad par 'gyur te ;
analyzed: de yang le'u sum cu rtsa bzhi pa sdud par byed pa'i mkha' 'gro ma'i zhes bya ba las rang nyid kyis 'chad par 'gyur te ;
translated: Moreover, that will be explained by himself in the chapter on the ‚ÄúGathering of the ·∏åƒÅkinƒ´s,‚Äù

original: 'dir ni phyogs tsam zhig bstan pa'o //
analyzed: 'dir ni phyogs tsam zhig bstan pa'o //
translated: and here only a portion is taught.

original: de ltar de nyid kyis thim pa'i rim pa rgyas par bshad pa'i ngo bo bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar de nyid kyis thim pa'i rim pa rgyas par bshad pa'i ngo bo bstan nas /
translated: Thus, having explained the essence of the extensive explanation of the stages of dissolution,

original: nye bar bsdu ba brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: nye bar bsdu ba brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: now, in order to explain the summary,

original: de ltar bshad ces gsungs te /
analyzed: de ltar bshad ces gsungs te /
translated: it is said, ‚ÄúThus explained.‚Äù

original: sngon du gsungs pa'i rigs pas so //
analyzed: sngon du gsungs pa'i rigs pas so //
translated: It is explained by the reasoning stated previously.

original: de nyid mchog gi rnal 'byor pa la bar ma do'i gnas skabs su de nyid sngon du 'gro pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid mchog gi rnal 'byor pa la bar ma do'i gnas skabs su de nyid sngon du 'gro pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: For the supreme yogin, at the time of the intermediate state, that is the essence that precedes.

original: srog ni zhes bya ba ni srog gi rlung la'o //
analyzed: srog ni zhes bya ba ni srog gi rlung la'o //
translated: ‚ÄúLife‚Äù is the life-force wind.

original: thim zhing 'char ba dang zhes bya ba ni yongs su ma shes pa'i gnas skabs na /
analyzed: thim zhing 'char ba dang zhes bya ba ni yongs su ma shes pa'i gnas skabs na /
translated: ‚ÄúDissolution and arising‚Äù is the state of complete nonrecognition.

original: skye ba dang 'jig pa skyed pa'i ngo bo'o //
analyzed: skye ba dang 'jig pa skyed pa'i ngo bo'o //
translated: birth and destruction are the nature of generation.

original: ji lta ba bzhin zhes bya ba ni ji ltar gnas pa'i ngo bos so //
analyzed: ji lta ba bzhin zhes bya ba ni ji ltar gnas pa'i ngo bos so //
translated: ‚ÄúAs they are‚Äù means by the nature of their abiding.

original: yongs su @119b shes zhes bya ba ni shes par bya ba'o //
analyzed: yongs su @119b shes zhes bya ba ni shes par bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThoroughly known‚Äù means to be known.

original: bla ma brgyud pa'i rim gyis 'byung //
analyzed: bla ma brgyud pa'i rim gyis 'byung //
translated: arises through the stages of the lineage of gurus.

original: zhes bya ba ni bla ma brgyud pa'i rim pas 'byung zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bla ma brgyud pa'i rim pas 'byung zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This means that it arises through the stages of the lineage of gurus.

original: de ltar don rnam pa gsum gyis de nyid la thim pa'i rim pa rgyas par bshad pa bstan nas rdo rje'i sku sgrub pa la rigs pa brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de ltar don rnam pa gsum gyis de nyid la thim pa'i rim pa rgyas par bshad pa bstan nas rdo rje'i sku sgrub pa la rigs pa brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: Having thus explained the process of dissolution into suchness in three topics, in order to state the logic of the accomplishment of the vajrakƒÅya,

original: de'i yan lag bshad par dam bca' ba ni /üîΩrigs pa gzhan yang bshad par bya //
analyzed: de'i yan lag bshad par dam bca' ba ni / rigs pa gzhan yang bshad par bya //
translated: the promise to explain its branches is made:üîΩ‚ÄúOther logics will be explained.‚Äù

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: And so on.

original: ji ltar sngar bshad rigs pas sems can rnams 'chi bar mi 'gyur ba /
analyzed: ji ltar sngar bshad rigs pas sems can rnams 'chi bar mi 'gyur ba /
translated: As explained above, sentient beings do not die.

original: de ltar rigs pa gzhan zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor pa la ltos nas khyad par can no//
analyzed: de ltar rigs pa gzhan zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor pa la ltos nas khyad par can no//
translated: ‚ÄúOther logics‚Äù are special in dependence on the yogi.

original: bshad par zhes bya ba ni brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: bshad par zhes bya ba ni brjod par bya'o //
translated: The phrase I will explain means I will express.

original: rdo rje'i sku ni sgrub pa'i phyir //
analyzed: rdo rje'i sku ni sgrub pa'i phyir //
translated: In order to accomplish the vajra body,

original: zhes bya ba ni bstan pa'i lus nyid sgrub par byed pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bstan pa'i lus nyid sgrub par byed pa'o //
translated: means that the body of the teaching itself is accomplished.

original: bcud len gyi sbyor ba'i thabs kyis zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bcud len gyi sbyor ba'i thabs kyis zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The phrase by means of the elixir preparation means by means of the method of preparation.

original: des ci zhig bya zhe na /
analyzed: des ci zhig bya zhe na /
translated: What is done by that?

original: de'i phyir gang gis zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir gang gis zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, it is said,

original: rdo rje'i sku sgrub par byed pa'i rigs pas so //
analyzed: rdo rje'i sku sgrub par byed pa'i rigs pas so //
translated: by means of the reasoning that accomplishes the vajra body.

original: 'chi med lus zhes bya ba ni gong du bstan pa'i lus so //
analyzed: 'chi med lus zhes bya ba ni gong du bstan pa'i lus so //
translated: The phrase the immortal body refers to the body taught above.

original: lus mchog ni zhes bya ba ni khyad par can gyi kha dog dang dbyibs dang yang dag par ldan pa'o //
analyzed: lus mchog ni zhes bya ba ni khyad par can gyi kha dog dang dbyibs dang yang dag par ldan pa'o //
translated: The phrase the supreme body refers to the body endowed with special color and shape.

original: thob pa ni rnyed pa'o //
analyzed: thob pa ni rnyed pa'o //
translated: The phrase attains means obtains.

original: yon tan rnams kyi rten zhes bya ba ni gong nas gong du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phel ba'i rgyur gyur pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: yon tan rnams kyi rten zhes bya ba ni gong nas gong du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phel ba'i rgyur gyur pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The phrase the basis of qualities means that it is the cause for the increase of roots of virtue from higher to higher.

original: yon tan rnams kyi rten zhes bya bar byas nas so //
analyzed: yon tan rnams kyi rten zhes bya bar byas nas so //
translated: Having made it the basis of qualities,

original: de ltar bshad par dam bca' ba bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar bshad par dam bca' ba bstan nas /
translated: Having thus presented the promise to explain,

original: de bshad pa'i dgos pa brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de bshad pa'i dgos pa brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to state the purpose of that explanation,

original: gang phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: gang phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: he says, ‚Äúbecause sentient beings in this age of conflict have short lives,‚Äù and so on.

original: rtsod pa can gyi dus 'di la gang gi phyir sems can rnams tshe thung ba ni lo brgya tsam du thub pa ste /
analyzed: rtsod pa can gyi dus 'di la gang gi phyir sems can rnams tshe thung ba ni lo brgya tsam du thub pa ste /
translated: In this age of conflict, because sentient beings have short lives, they live for only one hundred years.

original: de la lo lnga bcu ni mtshan mo gnyid kyis zad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la lo lnga bcu ni mtshan mo gnyid kyis zad par 'gyur ro //
translated: Of those, fifty years are exhausted by sleep at night.

original: lo nyi shu tsa lnga ni byis pa dang gzhon nu'i gnas skabs kyis so //
analyzed: lo nyi shu tsa lnga ni byis pa dang gzhon nu'i gnas skabs kyis so //
translated: Twenty-five years are exhausted by the stages of childhood and youth.

original: lo nyi shu tsa ldan kyang thos pa dang bsam pa dang bsod pa yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lo nyi shu tsa ldan kyang thos pa dang bsam pa dang bsod pa yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Even in twenty-five years, they do not complete listening, reflection, and meditation.

original: de'i phyir tshe thung ba zhes bstan to //
analyzed: de'i phyir tshe thung ba zhes bstan to //
translated: Therefore, it is taught that they have short lives.

original: tshe thung ba'i sems can rnams kyis so //
analyzed: tshe thung ba'i sems can rnams kyis so //
translated: It is for sentient beings with short lives.

original: mi zad ces bya ba ni zad mi shes pa'o //
analyzed: mi zad ces bya ba ni zad mi shes pa'o //
translated: ‚Äú Inexhaustible‚Äù means not exhausted.

original: thos pa dang bsam pa dang / bsgom pa rnams kyi go skabs med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thos pa dang bsam pa dang / bsgom pa rnams kyi go skabs med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no opportunity for listening, reflection, and meditation.

original: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir tshe thung ba rnams kyis cung zad kyang mi 'grub ste /üîΩde'i phyir 'bad pa @120a * //
analyzed: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir tshe thung ba rnams kyis cung zad kyang mi 'grub ste / de'i phyir 'bad pa @120a * //
translated: Therefore, means because those of short life do not accomplish anything at all.

original: thams cad kyis zhes bya ba ni shin tu yang brtson 'grus drag pos so //üîΩbrtan pa'i lus ni bsgrub par bya //
analyzed: thams cad kyis zhes bya ba ni shin tu yang brtson 'grus drag pos so // brtan pa'i lus ni bsgrub par bya //
translated: All efforts means with very intense effort.

original: zhes bya ba ni brten pa'i lus kyi thob pa la sogs pa nus pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni brten pa'i lus kyi thob pa la sogs pa nus pa'o //
translated: The body of the steadfast is to be accomplished means the attainment of the body of the steadfast, etc.

original: bsgrub par bya zhes bya ba ni bskyed bar bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya zhes bya ba ni bskyed bar bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: To be accomplished means to be generated.

original: de ltar de'i bshad pa'i dgos pa bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar de'i bshad pa'i dgos pa bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught the purpose of the explanation,

original: de nyid kyi don rnams zhu ba po'i bya ba brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de nyid kyi don rnams zhu ba po'i bya ba brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: in order to state the activity of the questioner with regard to the meaning of that,

original: phyag byas zhes bya ba ni phyag na rdo rje zhu ba pos so //
analyzed: phyag byas zhes bya ba ni phyag na rdo rje zhu ba pos so //
translated: Homage is paid means by VajrapƒÅ·πái, the questioner.

original: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa drug gi ngo bo'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa drug gi ngo bo'o //
translated: The Blessed One means the nature of the six tathƒÅgatas.

original: zhus zhes bya ba ni gsol ba 'debs par byed ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhus zhes bya ba ni gsol ba 'debs par byed ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: Asked means requested.

original: ci zhig byas nas she na /
analyzed: ci zhig byas nas she na /
translated: What was done?

original: de'i phyir phyag byas nas ni zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir phyag byas nas ni zhes gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, having bowed down,

original: lus la sogs pa'i sgo nas phyag dang bskor ba la sogs pa byas nas so //
analyzed: lus la sogs pa'i sgo nas phyag dang bskor ba la sogs pa byas nas so //
translated: having made prostrations, circumambulations, etc. with body, etc.

original: mgon po zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas lnga'i gtso bo'o //
analyzed: mgon po zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas lnga'i gtso bo'o //
translated: The Lord is the chief of the five Buddhas.

original: ye shes mchog ces bya ba ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i rnam pa'o //
analyzed: ye shes mchog ces bya ba ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i rnam pa'o //
translated: The supreme intuition is the form of natural luminosity.

original: rnal 'byor de nyid ces bya ba ni zung 'jug gi de kho na nyid do //
analyzed: rnal 'byor de nyid ces bya ba ni zung 'jug gi de kho na nyid do //
translated: The reality of yoga is the reality of union.

original: pha rol byon zhes bya ba ni mthar thug pa thob pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: pha rol byon zhes bya ba ni mthar thug pa thob pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
