translated: Having arrived at the other shore, one attains the ultimate.

original: ci zhig zhus she na /üîΩde'i phyir / 'chi ba med cing rigs par ni //
analyzed: ci zhig zhus she na / de'i phyir / 'chi ba med cing rigs par ni //
translated: What was asked?üîΩTherefore, it is said:

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: In the immortal and the rational,

original: 'chi ba med cing zhes bya ba ni gong du bstan pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
analyzed: 'chi ba med cing zhes bya ba ni gong du bstan pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
translated: The immortal is that which has the characteristics taught above.

original: rigs par ni zhes bya ba ni sbyor ba gang zhig go //üîΩji ltar yang dag thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: rigs par ni zhes bya ba ni sbyor ba gang zhig go // ji ltar yang dag thob par 'gyur //
translated: The rational is the application.üîΩHow is it attained?

original: zhes bya ba ni rnam pa gang gis phyin ci ma log pa nyid kyis 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rnam pa gang gis phyin ci ma log pa nyid kyis 'gyur ro //
translated: By what aspect is it attained without error?

original: de las zhus zhes bya ba ni phyi ma dang 'brel ba'o //
analyzed: de las zhus zhes bya ba ni phyi ma dang 'brel ba'o //
translated: The phrase please explain is connected with the following.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' snying rje che //üîΩzhes gsungs te /
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' snying rje che // zhes gsungs te /
translated: Vajrasattva is great compassion.

original: rdo rje ni stong pa nyid la sems dpa' ni dgongs pa gang la yod pa de ni rdo rje sems dpa' ste /
analyzed: rdo rje ni stong pa nyid la sems dpa' ni dgongs pa gang la yod pa de ni rdo rje sems dpa' ste /
translated: Vajra is emptiness, and sattva is the intention that is present in that.

original: de la bod pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //üîΩsnying rje che zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de la bod pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o // snying rje che zhes bya ba ni /
translated: He who is called by that name is Vajrasattva.üîΩGreat compassion

original: snying rje chen po rnam pa gsum //
analyzed: snying rje chen po rnam pa gsum //
translated: means the three kinds of great compassion.

original: zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning of the phrase.

original: de ltar bcom ldan 'das bstan du gsol zhes bya ba ni gsal bar mdzod cig pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar bcom ldan 'das bstan du gsol zhes bya ba ni gsal bar mdzod cig pa'o //
translated: The phrase please explain in that way, O Blessed One means please clarify it.

original: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni bod pa'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni bod pa'o //
translated: The phrase O Blessed One is an address.

original: de ltar de'i don nyid du zhu ba po'i bya ba brjod nas /
analyzed: de ltar de'i don nyid du zhu ba po'i bya ba brjod nas /
translated: Having thus stated the petitioner's activity in terms of its meaning,

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis mdzad pa bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis mdzad pa bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: in order to demonstrate the Blessed One's activity,

original: de'i yan lag bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung la 'jug pa ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa @120b gsungs te /üîΩgsol ba btab pa'i rjes la'o //
analyzed: de'i yan lag bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung la 'jug pa ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa @120b gsungs te /üîΩgsol ba btab pa'i rjes la'o //
translated: the Blessed One's speech is introduced with the phrase then the Blessed One said, and so forth.üîΩAfter the request, the Blessed One said, Excellent, excellent, VajrapƒÅ·πái!

original: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa drug pa'i rnam pa'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa drug pa'i rnam pa'o //
translated: The Blessed One, Vajra, is the form of the six TathƒÅgatas.

original: de nyid bya ba kun bsgrub go 'phang ni //
analyzed: de nyid bya ba kun bsgrub go 'phang ni //
translated: That itself is the state of accomplishing all actions.

original: zhes bya ba dang 'brel to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba dang 'brel to //
translated: This is connected with the above.

original: bya ba rnams thams cad ni 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa dag bskyed pa bzod pa mi nus pa'o //
analyzed: bya ba rnams thams cad ni 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa dag bskyed pa bzod pa mi nus pa'o //
translated: All actions are worldly and transcendent, and the state of being unable to produce patience.

original: go 'phang zhes bya ba ni 'dug pa'i gnas so //
analyzed: go 'phang zhes bya ba ni 'dug pa'i gnas so //
translated: State means a place to stay.

original: brtan pa'i lus zhes bya ba ni gong du bstan pa'i ngo bo'o //
analyzed: brtan pa'i lus zhes bya ba ni gong du bstan pa'i ngo bo'o //
translated: The body of the steadfast is the essence taught above.

original: ma pham pa zhes bya ba ni dus ma yin par 'chi ba rnams kyi sa pham par mi nus pa'o //
analyzed: ma pham pa zhes bya ba ni dus ma yin par 'chi ba rnams kyi sa pham par mi nus pa'o //
translated: Unconquerable means that it is not possible to conquer by untimely death.

original: yang dag ces bya ba ni phyin ci ma log pa'i ngo bos so //
analyzed: yang dag ces bya ba ni phyin ci ma log pa'i ngo bos so //
translated: Correct is by the essence of non-mistakenness.

original: de nyid rnams nges pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de nyid rnams nges pa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: That itself is called ascertainment.

original: de nyid ni /
analyzed: de nyid ni /
translated: That itself

original: sangs rgyas kyi mtshan nyid can la khyad par du thos pa dang / bsam pa dang bsgom pa'i mtshan nyid can gyis rnam par nges pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi mtshan nyid can la khyad par du thos pa dang / bsam pa dang bsgom pa'i mtshan nyid can gyis rnam par nges pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: has the characteristic of a Buddha, and is ascertained by the characteristics of hearing, reflection, and meditation. This is the meaning of ascertainment.

original: de nyid kyi rgyu mtshan gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid kyi rgyu mtshan gsungs pa /
translated: The reason for that is stated:

original: tshe ni thung ba yis zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: tshe ni thung ba yis zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Because life is short.

original: tshe thung ba rnams gsum gyi'o //
analyzed: tshe thung ba rnams gsum gyi'o //
translated: Short lives are for the three.

original: sems can rnams ni zhes bya ba ni khams gsum gyis bsdus pa rnams so //
analyzed: sems can rnams ni zhes bya ba ni khams gsum gyis bsdus pa rnams so //
translated: Beings means those included in the three realms.

original: bsgrub bya'i don zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas nyid kyi mtshan nyid can no //
analyzed: bsgrub bya'i don zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas nyid kyi mtshan nyid can no //
translated: The goal to be accomplished is characterized by Buddhahood.

original: sgrub mi 'gyur zhes bya ba ni tshe thung ba nyid kyi sa rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sgrub mi 'gyur zhes bya ba ni tshe thung ba nyid kyi sa rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: It will not be accomplished means that it will not be completed due to short life.

original: tshe ring ba ni 'os pa'o //
analyzed: tshe ring ba ni 'os pa'o //
translated: Long life is appropriate.

original: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni rgyu 'di las so //
analyzed: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni rgyu 'di las so //
translated: Therefore means from this cause.

original: tshe ring ba ni gong du brtan par gnas pa'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: tshe ring ba ni gong du brtan par gnas pa'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: Long life is characterized by stability above.

original: 'os pa ni rung bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'os pa ni rung bar bya'o //
translated: Appropriate means suitable.

original: dge ba yid ni rnal 'byor pa //
analyzed: dge ba yid ni rnal 'byor pa //
translated: The virtuous mind is the yogi.

original: zhes bya ba ni legs par byed pa'i sgom pa po rnams la zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni legs par byed pa'i sgom pa po rnams la zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This means those who are meditators who do good.

original: de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung la 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan dang bcas pa brjod nas /
analyzed: de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung la 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan dang bcas pa brjod nas /
translated: Having thus stated the reason for engaging in the speech of the BhagavƒÅn,

original: de rgyas par bshad pa brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de rgyas par bshad pa brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to explain that extensively,üîΩhe says,

original: de'i yan lag nang gi bdag nyid kyi rnal 'byor gyi ngo bo ni /
analyzed: de'i yan lag nang gi bdag nyid kyi rnal 'byor gyi ngo bo ni /
translated: The essence of the yoga of the inner nature is

original: de la thog mar zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de la thog mar zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: There, first of all,üîΩbecause it produces an ageless body, first of all,

original: rgas pa med pa'i lus sgrub par byed pas thog ma ni dang po nyid du'o //
analyzed: rgas pa med pa'i lus sgrub par byed pas thog ma ni dang po nyid du'o //
translated: in the beginning,

original: nang gi bdag nyid sgrub ces bya ba dang 'brel to //
analyzed: nang gi bdag nyid sgrub ces bya ba dang 'brel to //
translated: is connected with the statement, ‚Äúthe inner nature is accomplished.‚Äù

original: phyi rol gyi rkyen la mi ltos pas nang gi bdag gnyid du'o //
analyzed: phyi rol gyi rkyen la mi ltos pas nang gi bdag gnyid du'o //
translated: Since it does not depend on external conditions, it is inner.

original: blo bzang zhes bya ba ni de sgrub par byed pa la mkhas pa'o //
analyzed: blo bzang zhes bya ba ni de sgrub par byed pa la mkhas pa'o //
translated: Good intellect refers to skill in accomplishing that.

original: rnal 'byor ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: rnal 'byor ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What kind of yoga is it?

original: de'i phyir mchog ces bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir mchog ces bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, he says, supreme.

original: mchog ni skyes bu'i don mchog sgrub par byed pa'o //
analyzed: mchog ni skyes bu'i don mchog sgrub par byed pa'o //
translated: Supreme is that which accomplishes the supreme purpose of beings.

original: ji ltar zhe na /üîΩde'i phyir / lce ni rkan gyi dbus bzhar @121a * //
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na / de'i phyir / lce ni rkan gyi dbus bzhar @121a * //
translated: How is that?üîΩTherefore, he says,

original: ba ; / zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: ba ; / zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: the tongue is placed in the middle of the palate.

original: rkan gyi phugs su zhugs pa'i lce byas nas so //
analyzed: rkan gyi phugs su zhugs pa'i lce byas nas so //
translated: Having placed the tongue in the interior of the palate,

original: de la zhes bya ba ni lce de la'o //
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba ni lce de la'o //
translated: there, on that tongue,

original: tshig ces bya ba ni yi ge'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: tshig ces bya ba ni yi ge'i rang bzhin no //
translated: The words are the nature of the syllables.

original: bzla zhes bya ba ni dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: bzla zhes bya ba ni dgod par bya'o //
translated: One should repeat means one should place.

original: rang gis bzlas pa'i rnam pa dang / tshig tu yang brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: rang gis bzlas pa'i rnam pa dang / tshig tu yang brjod par bya'o //
translated: One should also utter the form of one's own repetition in words.

original: ci zhig byas nas she na /üîΩde'i phyir / sems dpa'i skyil krung bcas nas ni //
analyzed: ci zhig byas nas she na / de'i phyir / sems dpa'i skyil krung bcas nas ni //
translated: What is done?

original: zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, it is said: Having assumed the sattva posture,

original: bde bar gnas pa'i rgyu bcas nas so //
analyzed: bde bar gnas pa'i rgyu bcas nas so //
translated: having assumed the cause of comfortable abiding.

original: yang dag rnal 'byor zhes bya ba ni sems kyi 'jug pa 'gog pa'i rnam pa'o //
analyzed: yang dag rnal 'byor zhes bya ba ni sems kyi 'jug pa 'gog pa'i rnam pa'o //
translated: The correct yoga is the form of the cessation of mental engagement.

original: rjes dran bya zhes bya ba ni bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rjes dran bya zhes bya ba ni bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The recollection is the meaning of should be done.

original: sna rtser zhes bya ba ni kun rdzob kyi sna rtser ro //
analyzed: sna rtser zhes bya ba ni kun rdzob kyi sna rtser ro //
translated: The tip of the nose is the conventional tip of the nose.

original: dbugs ni mi 'byung ba zhes bya ba ni 'od zer gyi thig le bsgom pa'i bdag nyid can no //
analyzed: dbugs ni mi 'byung ba zhes bya ba ni 'od zer gyi thig le bsgom pa'i bdag nyid can no //
translated: The breath does not move is the nature of the meditation on the bindu of light rays.

original: mi bya zhes bya ba ni bya ba ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: mi bya zhes bya ba ni bya ba ma yin pa'o //
translated: The should not be done is not to be done.

original: gal te de ltar yin na /
analyzed: gal te de ltar yin na /
translated: If it is so,

original: ci zhig bya zhe na /
analyzed: ci zhig bya zhe na /
translated: what should be done?

original: de'i phyir / rang gi khar ni dgag par bya //
analyzed: de'i phyir / rang gi khar ni dgag par bya //
translated: Therefore, it is said: One should block in one's mouth,

original: zhes bya ba ni rang nyid kyis so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rang nyid kyis so //
translated: This is by oneself.

original: rkan gyi gnas son zla ba ni //
analyzed: rkan gyi gnas son zla ba ni //
translated: The moon that has gone to the place of the palate

original: zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems zla ba'i rnam pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems zla ba'i rnam pa'o //
translated: is the bodhicitta in the form of the moon.

original: bzhu bar bya zhes bya ba ni lce'u chung gi sbyor bas so //
analyzed: bzhu bar bya zhes bya ba ni lce'u chung gi sbyor bas so //
translated: It should be melted by the yoga of the uvula.

original: ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How?

original: de'i phyir sngags kyi rnal 'byor zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir sngags kyi rnal 'byor zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, it is said, ‚Äúby the yoga of the mantra.‚Äù

original: 'chad par 'gyur ba'i sngags kyis zhes bya ba dang 'brel zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'chad par 'gyur ba'i sngags kyis zhes bya ba dang 'brel zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The mantra that will be explained is connected with the meaning of ‚Äúshould be melted.‚Äù

original: lce'u chung gi sbyor bas zhu bar byas nas so //
analyzed: lce'u chung gi sbyor bas zhu bar byas nas so //
translated: Having melted by the yoga of the uvula,

original: rlung gi rnal 'byor gyis zhes bya ba ni thur sel gyi rlung 'bab pa'i sbyor bas so //
analyzed: rlung gi rnal 'byor gyis zhes bya ba ni thur sel gyi rlung 'bab pa'i sbyor bas so //
translated: by the yoga of the wind, by the yoga of the downward-voiding wind,

original: btung zhes bya ba ni bdud rtsi myong bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: btung zhes bya ba ni bdud rtsi myong bar bya ba'o //
translated: it should be drunk, it should be tasted as nectar.

original: rnal 'byor mchog ces bya ba ni mchog gi sgom pa po'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor mchog ces bya ba ni mchog gi sgom pa po'o //
translated: The supreme yogƒ´ is the supreme meditator.

original: phyi rol gyi bza' ba la mngon par ma zhen pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: phyi rol gyi bza' ba la mngon par ma zhen pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that he is not attached to external food.

original: rtag tu zhes bya ba ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i dus kyi mthar thug pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rtag tu zhes bya ba ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i dus kyi mthar thug pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: ‚ÄúAlways‚Äù means until the end of the period that will be explained.

original: de ltar rang gi ngo bo bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar rang gi ngo bo bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught the essence,

original: dus kyi nges ba brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: dus kyi nges ba brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: in order to teach the determination of the time,

original: mtshan phyed kyi dus tshod mthar zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: mtshan phyed kyi dus tshod mthar zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: he says, ‚Äúat the end of the period of midnight.‚Äù

original: mtshan phyed kyi rjes la'o //
analyzed: mtshan phyed kyi rjes la'o //
translated: After midnight.

original: ji srid thun gcig ces bya ba ni thun gsum pa rdzogs pa'o //
analyzed: ji srid thun gcig ces bya ba ni thun gsum pa rdzogs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúFor as long as one watch‚Äù means the end of the third watch.

original: mi 'pho ba zhes bya ba ni gzhan yid la mi byed pas mi brtan pa ma yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: mi 'pho ba zhes bya ba ni gzhan yid la mi byed pas mi brtan pa ma yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: ‚ÄúWithout moving‚Äù means not unsteady, because one does not attend to anything else.

original: de srid sngags ni bzla zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de srid sngags ni bzla zhes bya ba ni /
translated: ‚ÄúRecite the mantra‚Äù

original: nang gi bzlas pa'i bdag nyid kyi ngo bos so //
analyzed: nang gi bzlas pa'i bdag nyid kyi ngo bos so //
translated: means with the essence of inner recitation.

original: rnal 'byor pas zhes bya ba ni sems kyi 'jug ba 'gog ba sgom pa @121b pos zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pas zhes bya ba ni sems kyi 'jug ba 'gog ba sgom pa @121b pos zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: ‚ÄúThe yogƒ´‚Äù means one who meditates on the cessation of mental activity.

original: rdo rje'i lus ni byed pa po //
analyzed: rdo rje'i lus ni byed pa po //
translated: ‚ÄúThe vajra body is the agent‚Äù

original: zhes bya ba ni lus brtan par byed pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni lus brtan par byed pa zhes bya ba'i don to //

original: de ltar dus kyi nges pa bstan nas /

original: mchog ces bya ba ni mchog go //
analyzed: mchog ces bya ba ni mchog go //

original: shes nas zhes bya ba ni shes par bya ba'o //
analyzed: shes nas zhes bya ba ni shes par bya ba'o //

analyzed: mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni 'gegs pa'i tshig go //

analyzed: rigs ba ji lta bu zhe na /

analyzed: de'i phyir / kun la dang por 'byung ba ni //

analyzed: dang por ni thog ma nyid du'o //

translated: The sixteen supports are the four great elements, because they are the nature of the four individual elements.üîΩ The body is the body of all sentient beings.

analyzed: de'i yan lag bshad par dam bca' ba ni /

translated: The sixteen are the sixteen parts of the body.üîΩ The

analyzed: smin ma'i dbus gnas zhes bya ba ni rlung gi 'khor lo'i gnas so //

analyzed: dbye ba 'khyil pa zhes bya ba ni aa dang ra dag gis sad par byed pas na dbye ba ste ;

analyzed: bstan pas zhes bya ba ni ming gis so //

analyzed: bshad pa yin zhes bya ba ni rab tu grags pa'o //

original: pa dang zhes bya ba ni 'bar zhing gsal ba'i rnam pa nyid kyis gzi brjid 'bar ba dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: pa dang zhes bya ba ni 'bar zhing gsal ba'i rnam pa nyid kyis gzi brjid 'bar ba dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The clear means that it is radiant with the brilliance of the aspect of blazing and clarity.

original: gang po dang ni zhes bya ba ni longs spyod kyi 'khor lo'i lam nas ro myang ba nyid kyis yongs su tshim pa'i phyir gang ba'o //
analyzed: gang po dang ni zhes bya ba ni longs spyod kyi 'khor lo'i lam nas ro myang ba nyid kyis yongs su tshim pa'i phyir gang ba'o //
translated: P≈´r·πáa means filled, because of being satisfied by the experience of the path of the enjoyment wheel.

original: gsum pa yin no zhes bya ba ni rnam pa gsum mo //
analyzed: gsum pa yin no zhes bya ba ni rnam pa gsum mo //
translated: The third means the third type.

original: rim pa zhes bya ba ni rtsa'i dbyibs kyi rim pas so zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rim pa zhes bya ba ni rtsa'i dbyibs kyi rim pas so zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The order means the order of the shape of the channels, that is the meaning.

original: sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i rtsa'i ming bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i rtsa'i ming bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach the names of the channels of the emanation wheel,

original: yang dag shugs dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: yang dag shugs dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: [the BhagavƒÅn] declares, the perfect force, and so on.

original: yang dag par byang chub kyi sems shugs kyis 'bab pas na yang dag shugs so //
analyzed: yang dag par byang chub kyi sems shugs kyis 'bab pas na yang dag shugs so //
translated: The perfect force is the perfect bodhicitta force.

original: shin tu shugs zhes bya ba ni de las kyang lhag par 'bab pas so //
analyzed: shin tu shugs zhes bya ba ni de las kyang lhag par 'bab pas so //
translated: The great force is the flow of that [bodhicitta] in excess.

original: shin tu bzang ba dang zhes bya ba ni tshim par byed pa'i bzang ba gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: shin tu bzang ba dang zhes bya ba ni tshim par byed pa'i bzang ba gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The very good is that which has the good of satisfaction.

original: bzang por 'gro ba zhes bya ba ni bzang ba ni ye shes kyi me dang byang chub kyi sems 'gro ba'i phyir bzang por 'gro ba'o //
analyzed: bzang por 'gro ba zhes bya ba ni bzang ba ni ye shes kyi me dang byang chub kyi sems 'gro ba'i phyir bzang por 'gro ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúGoing to the good‚Äù means that because of the going of the fire of intuition and the spirit of enlightenment, it is going to the good.

original: stobs chen dang ni zhes bya ba ni rgyu dang ye shes kyi rim pa'i dus su byang chub kyi sems 'gro ba dang 'od ba la stobs chen po dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: stobs chen dang ni zhes bya ba ni rgyu dang ye shes kyi rim pa'i dus su byang chub kyi sems 'gro ba dang 'od ba la stobs chen po dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúGreat strength‚Äù means that at the time of the stages of cause and intuition, the spirit of enlightenment has great strength in going and coming.

original: mi bzod che zhes bya ba ni rgyud kyi rim pa'i dus su ye shes kyi me'i rten du gyur pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: mi bzod che zhes bya ba ni rgyud kyi rim pa'i dus su ye shes kyi me'i rten du gyur pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúGreat patience‚Äù means that at the time of the stage of the continuum, it is the basis of the fire of intuition.

original: mdzes chen zhes bya ba ni shin tu yang dus gnyis la 'dod par bya ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: mdzes chen zhes bya ba ni shin tu yang dus gnyis la 'dod par bya ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúGreat beauty‚Äù means that it is to be desired in both of the two times.

original: mdun du skyes pa zhes bya ba ni a'i yi ge'i ngo bo la brten nas skye ba thob pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mdun du skyes pa zhes bya ba ni a'i yi ge'i ngo bo la brten nas skye ba thob pa'i phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúBorn in front‚Äù means that it is born in dependence on the essence of the letter A.

original: rgyags pa'i rtags ni zhes byang chub kyi sems kyi mtshan nyid kyis rgyags pa'i rtags su gyur pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyags pa'i rtags ni zhes byang chub kyi sems kyi mtshan nyid kyis rgyags pa'i rtags su gyur pa'i phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúSign of intoxication‚Äù means that it is the sign of intoxication by the character of the spirit of enlightenment.

original: rgyags pa'i cha zhes bya ba ni rdul skyes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyags pa'i cha zhes bya ba ni rdul skyes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The part of intoxication is because of the arising of passion.

original: rgyags pa'i chu dang zhes bya ba ni chu skyed par byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyags pa'i chu dang zhes bya ba ni chu skyed par byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The water of intoxication is because of the generation of the water element.

original: rgyags pa myos byed ces bya ba ni rgyags pa ni 'dod chags la sogs pas gnas skabs gzhan thob pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyags pa myos byed ces bya ba ni rgyags pa ni 'dod chags la sogs pas gnas skabs gzhan thob pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Intoxication is the intoxicant because of the attainment of another state through passion, etc.

original: rgyags dang zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems kyis myos ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyags dang zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems kyis myos ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Intoxication is the intoxication because of the intoxication with the spirit of enlightenment.

original: rgyags pa'i rgyu mthun zhes bya ba ni kun rdzob kyi bde ba chen po'i rnam 'gyur nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyags pa'i rgyu mthun zhes bya ba ni kun rdzob kyi bde ba chen po'i rnam 'gyur nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The concordance with intoxication is because of the manifestation of conventional great bliss.

original: rgyags pa'i rlan dang zhes bya ba ni rtag tu byang chub kyi sems kyis brlan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyags pa'i rlan dang zhes bya ba ni rtag tu byang chub kyi sems kyis brlan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The moisture of intoxication is because of the constant moistening with the spirit of enlightenment.

original: rgyags pa 'chang ba zhes bya ba ni khu ba brtan pa 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyags pa 'chang ba zhes bya ba ni khu ba brtan pa 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The bearing of intoxication is because of the nature of holding the firm semen.

original: rtsub @126b dang zhes bya ba ni ye shes kyis mes reg bya rtsub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtsub @126b dang zhes bya ba ni ye shes kyis mes reg bya rtsub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The roughness is because of the roughness of the touch of the fire of intuition.

original: mkha' 'byung zhes bya ba ni mkha' ni bde ba chen po'i nam mkha' la'o //
analyzed: mkha' 'byung zhes bya ba ni mkha' ni bde ba chen po'i nam mkha' la'o //
translated: The sky-born is in the space of the great bliss.

original: 'byung ba ni 'gro ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: 'byung ba ni 'gro ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The born is because of the going.

original: glang po dang zhes bya ba ni dbyibs kyis thung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: glang po dang zhes bya ba ni dbyibs kyis thung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The elephant is because of the shortness of the shape.

original: dbugs mi bde ba dang zhes bya ba ni blo skyed par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dbugs mi bde ba dang zhes bya ba ni blo skyed par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The suffocating is because of the production of the mind.

original: g-ya' zhes bya ba ni g-ya' ba'i 'bras bu skyed par byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: g-ya' zhes bya ba ni g-ya' ba'i 'bras bu skyed par byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The itching is because of the production of the fruit of the itch.
